user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vlad Krem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfsSxfiVeGMo8NvOkenoWKHurc6dsFpVcxk--VxpDZoxfS9TU8vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was recommended by a local and I would say it was a total hit.
We went before rush hour and had a lot of tables available, but shortly after that it filled in quite quick. The menu is simple and not very big, mainly pasta. No pizza. And some local favorites. However, is something that surprised me that a restaurant with such a good recommendation in history didn't really follow the way the food was served.
We did start with the salad but we also had appetizers and main courses so we got the salad. Then we got the main courses and we kind of got the appetizer at the end which was a little bit weird.
Other than that you could tell that they are using good ingredients and local products because everything seemed fresh and made well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDO3W6eH5fqa4MUbbenn-1I&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-10-15"},{"Name":"Tiberiu Dragnuta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt0X8VU6C2tJ6EAWRSgZo4FuGzr79hO9cDrdgVhhvkhECd_8gR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good experience and friendly staff. The food and the drinks come pretty fast and the vibe is really nice overall.

The food is good and I definitely recommend the Assassina pasta. The Ragu pasta was missing salt and cheese also the meat had some fat parts in it, we didn‚Äôt really enjoy it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCq9aTqJSdDB-5xaewb54NT&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Pawe≈Ç Berestecki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFJ4P5r6_31QP5STlkuTxlqyRf-R10ICPQOjdh66t56REtacC_5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was absolutely fantastic. We ordered a variety of dishes, but the seafood was definitely the highlight. The wine was excellent, and even the appetizers were delicious. We honestly couldn‚Äôt stop eating and probably left a few kilos heavier, but with zero regrets üòÇ The shrimp were specific to the region, and our waiter took the time to explain what made them different from those in other regions, which was such a nice touch. We finished the meal with a complimentary shot of limoncello, which made the whole experience even more memorable. A truly wonderful evening from start to finish üçã‚ú®","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBca60SmolYhQmLAk6-Bhi5&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Natalie Asbo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXohrSFoQc1i_u3K6XcT9IBoC6PNsWhdWWMQ-wgr0sGe_3oecI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was gorgeous! Large portions and very reasonably priced. We went at lunch time and there was no que which was fabulous.
The bruschetta starter was amazing and good to share been two!
I had the beef ragu which did not disappoint.
My husband had the fungi spaghetti with truffles and it was absolutely amazing!
We are so delighted that we got to try this little gem. Worth the visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBIwxlCceLUREneh4dhbUBa&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-9-8"},{"Name":"Diane Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbBsNNVzbA4zkTIFB06TxaorfMWYxxKvOpRh6eFBna-3MIcuYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was attracted by the Google reviews but was greatly disappointed after the experience. First, service was lacking as we were directed to a table in the most crowded section and directly beside a heater that was blazingly hot. We then asked for a change of seat but was given a shrug to choose anywhere on our own. Secondly which is the most important, the food was overly salty. The orecchiette was salty to the extent that I could not swallow more than 3 mouthful. The antipasti platter was also mediocre and not worth ‚Ç¨25. The serving was big but given the taste of the food, it is a problem rather than a plus. Overall, it was the worst meal I had so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAoXLgI2oG2FSwuNanV7PoR&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Ana Paula Heidrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUz7VUyRaETImNIUJTMIRrRlj3bjOMIEUEOOx7lz5LlvxKax52=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food of this place was amazing! Based off solely on flavour, I would recommend this place to everyone. However the service is bad, they forgot one of the plates, we had to reorder dessert a couple of times to finally get it and the electric power went down a couple of times while we were there because they had too much things running at once... they charge a 2euro service fee per person so you'd think they would have good service... all and all if you have time and patience the food is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDshlvvrWfos3s5n6Nm0uHw&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"kawane roberta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMD5vW6Ga6dDfIKNJZBdqXIog_MA283nlmw93P4Sz6RBnJS4rh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"When we arrived there was a huge queue, but it moved quickly. The service was excellent, very attentive staff. However, the carbonara was terrible,the worst I‚Äôve had in Bari, with a strong eggy taste and smell ü§Æ. The glasses also had an unpleasant odor. The other dishes were good, but overall I was disappointed, I expected much more. My advice is clear: don‚Äôt order the carbonara.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDsoTE6ZlpUr0zFRvq3S9Tb&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-8-26"},{"Name":"Chien Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCaAhl3dwuV09tdl4dZaVXQ_X0WhYNOYWCsDdSnaO7JvayH1p2Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is perfect, sitting in the old town in Bari having dinner watching people passing by. The food is good with generous portions and good price but the reason for 4* is that it‚Äôs not really outstanding from other good places we have tried on this trip and the last ones. Highly recommend when you‚Äôre in Bari though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2ZlQtAI87oZpR4pJcTCf8&fid=0x0:0xca08c6f58a45dc7c"],"When":"2025-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adriana Nyagulova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX5NNdnDFXboARA_v1TPEM2b8Q20TUDSyULA3q4QPGQHiFOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience here. The food was absolutely exceptional ‚Äî fresh, flavorful, and truly delicious. The service was very attentive, and the staff were incredibly warm and welcoming. They treated us with so much kindness, which made the whole experience even more special. As a lovely gesture, we were even offered a shot of limoncello from the house at the end. We would definitely come back and highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAA3Re7ITJTsmOKmnjlhTQ&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Denis Treskanica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrmIkkkJlkKR4kuq-jLiqKwbqiVSMmaxHZaZZG4NyE1OGfIBSxxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to La Cantina dello Zio on recommendation, and it fully lived up to it. The restaurant is located in the center of Bari, has a warm and pleasant atmosphere, and is almost always full, its a great sign. The staff is extremely friendly, fast, and efficient. A special mention goes to the mother and son from our region, with whom we had great communication and instantly felt welcome. The food is domestic, rich in flavor, juicy, and simply fantastic. Combined with the lively and authentic atmosphere, this is exactly the kind of place you want to return to. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC70ERY3xUSdGWAD4QgM98a&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Tiberiu Dragnuta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt0X8VU6C2tJ6EAWRSgZo4FuGzr79hO9cDrdgVhhvkhECd_8gR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was amazing about this place, the food, the staff, the atmosphere, everything.

I definitely recommend any pizza which has a really good dough, and the tiramisu, which you have to try.

The waiter was fun and friendly even though he seemed tired.

They recognised us and they gave us complementary bruschettas and limoncello shots.

Overall I definitely recommend this place to have a nice dinner with your friends or family (or by yourself, no judging, haha)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDyQcMC6niHP97X_Kki3Mxu&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Jen Buchignani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2QECHgKETfvAHs28kakLdYwcZzSjjrgx-TYXMvmGdH0I5miY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment we walked in, we were enveloped in warmth and hospitality that made us feel like cherished family members. The intimate atmosphere strikes the perfect balance‚Äîcozy and inviting like your own dining room, yet elevated with impeccable professionalism.

Our server, Mauricio, delivered what can only be described as flawless service. Attentive without being intrusive, knowledgeable, friendly, funny, and genuinely invested in making our experience memorable‚Äîhe exemplified what outstanding hospitality looks like. His service alone would warrant five stars!
The entire wait staff was amazing with smiles and great service.

And then there‚Äôs the food‚Äîabsolutely phenomenal! Every dish was a masterclass in flavor, with each bite revealing layers of rich, carefully balanced taste. The portions were remarkably generous‚Äîwe‚Äôre talking enough for a satisfying second meal the next day.
Perhaps most impressive? The prices were incredibly reasonable. We would have gladly paid double at comparable establishments for food of this caliber.

This is the kind of restaurant that spoils you for anywhere else. Outstanding in every conceivable way. We cannot recommend it highly enough!‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBIcGPqYa0irxZHej33itbe&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"Marko Kaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyYMRoZOqV9U--vciEcCoYTm6CDAxMSjgOBwYsfVr-fexx8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In Old Town Bari

We stumbled upon this place as we explored Old Town Bari. The tables outside were full, the plates looked excellent - and everyone was happy...

So we took a table for two inside. A tiny little table, with grand aspirations!

Service with a smile was provided by the entire crew...they all moved so quickly, with such purpose, my first thought was that they were the owners - you know that energy that I mean - attention to detail, friendly smiles, and immediately filled empty glasses. Oh, wait - they were never empty!

Our order was taken quickly, bruschetta brought to the table (we didn't order, it was automatic), olives...

The menu is pretty extensive (and very affordable) - but we were in Bari so had to have the orecchiette - I had it with frutti di mare (clams, mussels, shrimp and a fabulous red sauce), my wife had it with turnip tops...the juxtaposition of earth and sea was pretty amazing.

I am not typically a huge pasta guy... but... There was not a piece left on my plate. Perhaps one of the simplest, but best, meals I have ever had.

Grazie Zio for such a wonderful meal and a great experience! Magnifico chef!

To the Owner - your employees show incredible love for what they do!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXpFfV4_YrLvZn5STirqda&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Charles Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRo77FX4BHZQlFYOFT23W4Ck9DqwU8t8YWLiGrbLoe3fjrAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was referred here by some friends I met, and I honestly don't regret it one bit. It feels like a family-run restaurant, and the atmosphere is so warm and welcoming. The quality of food is absolutely top-notch-everything was prepared with such care and attention to detail. The staff was incredibly helpful and attentive, making sure we felt right at home. It's no-frills, yet the quality is through the roof. The rumors are true-you absolutely have to experience it for yourself. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA87geFk5D1ak-X6lVwO6uS&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmZBBU_nnznYp3b75VcG3NZ4VRdD9VEDH_knm42UbQbvScgnj_IA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came around noon and were sat immediately, but waited about an hour for food but they brought out complimentary bruschetta! The line to get seated after we got drinks got very long. At least an hour-hour 30 minutes wait time.  It was absolutely worth the wait - fantastic pasta! Very good portion sizes and amazing flavors. Really nice atmosphere outside with mix of tourists and locals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAwO5CWXkNv2GJ07-9yWpqI&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Narelle Zagami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTywbf7mxYK7dVOdlGVKt-qzYysRSoDRQeEYvotMYkNVejsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was wonderful. Authentic and the best carbonara! Mario and Anna were amazing they were literally running to look after everyone. We had a 20 min wait for a table but didn‚Äôt mind. Also we have been in Sicily and Puglia for 3 months and this was the first time we were given the complimentary limoncello after dinner. Which we really appreciated. Thanks a lot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDsugjlORe3peN89kt2_hTe&fid=0x0:0x3f29301ac4e8d935"],"When":"2025-10-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alberto Seghezzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX2mixO0j7D2Eqzt8fmJgMjcUMLU9WOmCqe_wEy8C_ASawMJGF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place in the heart of bari.
We got to spend a lovely night in this Resturant, enjoy traditional and modern food, creating a perfect and surprising mix in tastes.
The service and atmosphere felt great since the beginning and the overall price is definitely worth for the quality of the food.
Will come back for sure","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCea32aYcmqtCQD3Tcocj3B&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Valentina Fantauzzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlQcWXQ-UNkO0SBfOjmznvvIACHelmdFlB-zI80Kl28H_DwzGt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Radicale is one of those places that truly represents the new wave of Puglian cuisine.
The menu is seasonal, well thought out and deeply rooted in local ingredients, yet presented with a modern and refined approach. Every dish feels intentional: clean flavors, excellent balance, and great attention to detail without ever being overcomplicated.
The atmosphere is contemporary and welcoming, perfect for a relaxed but high-quality dining experience. Service is attentive and professional, making you feel comfortable from start to finish.
Radicale is ideal if you‚Äôre looking for a place where tradition meets creativity in a very natural and honest way.
Highly recommended for anyone who loves good food and thoughtful cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDilWBfm-OahMGoIkYFh3Ym&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Attila Rektenvald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVozOY0uNeavupSJrAO1NfGUDktmb_4V6GhpPchQr6g3UtC-ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice atmosphere, perfect music for the mood. The food was delicious, the tiramisu made the evening 100%. The staff was extremely kind. Special range of spirits, gins, rums and whiskies. Overall 10/10.
I had the Veal Carpaccio, and the Mediterranean red tuna tartare.
Thank you for the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHipF5weaNAOQsjExh91HD&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2025-11-29"},{"Name":"Adelina Cardas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHJqVkIM4hLDELgsHIlx3lzObOq_WP_kfWAtgRRrF2mT7JTIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We wanted a nice dinner for my husband‚Äôs birthday, so we searched for a restaurant with lots of good reviews for a special occasion. I made an online reservation, but since it was a Monday, there were plenty of tables available.
We ordered several dishes:
Oysters ‚Äì probably the best we‚Äôve ever had! Very big and fresh.
Mini tartar cones (beef and tuna) ‚Äì unfortunately, these had no flavor at all, not even salt. The beef ones were slightly sweet because of the cone, which didn‚Äôt really work.
Fried anchovies ‚Äì listed as their ‚Äúfavorite of the month,‚Äù but sadly tasteless, even with the sauce that came with them.
Pasta dishes ‚Äì I had the Tagliolino with honey and truffle, and my husband had the garlic, oil and scampi pasta. We chose them because of the great reviews, but they were both disappointing. The truffles had no aroma or flavor, and overall, neither dish was special.
Dessert (coffee crumble) ‚Äì this was actually great! We really enjoyed the taste and texture.
A few other disappointing details: when I made the reservation online, I specifically asked if they could put a candle on my husband‚Äôs dessert for his birthday. They asked for my name when we arrived, so I assumed they had seen the note, but they didn‚Äôt do anything. Later, I noticed another customer blowing out a candle on their dessert, which made me feel ignored and frustrated.
Also, the wine situation wasn‚Äôt ideal. They didn‚Äôt have the first bottle we asked for, we switched to another one, and in the end, they brought something else entirely ‚Äúbecause that‚Äôs what they had.‚Äù
Overall, we left disappointed. The service wasn‚Äôt terrible, but for a place with such great reviews, we expected much more from both the food and the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjeFhAXsokunIVUNtknXQl&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Christina Parrella Grunwald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlGqf-c0jv4zDJ2BvienNPH1m5NETTXScjrWFXpWzznb083aGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located just off one of the main shopping strips in Bari‚Ä¶ this place was great. Service was some of the best we received in Puglia. Everyone was kind and so accommodating especially since we are traveling with two small children. The food was excellent!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB6-5pkKT5eJzi_H3g2pnwF&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2025-8-25"},{"Name":"Smriti Jha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpChpGKfcZqZwiKfvcYy5kVOqnYmMwYed6GSkNVQpjuIFtcOv7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a amazing experience. Staff were polite and welcoming. I ordered pasta and French fries. Quantity here is good. I ordered two items but it can be eaten by 2 person. Price is also reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxkIKBFfeUMoTYhr5TK9Et&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"andrea bello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSXaQ2SALOe8scvgUTCn2KkZEFSKi2ACAZi2qyHDwYekPe8Kq1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An outstanding dining experience in Bari

Radicale Restaurant truly stands out as one of the finest dining experiences in Bari. From the moment we arrived, the atmosphere felt refined yet welcoming, with a beautifully designed space that strikes the perfect balance between elegance and comfort.

The cuisine is creative, well-executed, and clearly driven by high-quality ingredients. Each dish was thoughtfully presented and full of flavor, combining Mediterranean traditions with a modern, innovative touch. The tagliolini aglio e olio with scampi tartare and caviar were an absolute highlight of the evening ‚Äî perfectly balanced, delicate yet deeply flavorful, with the sweetness of the scampi and the briny elegance of the caviar elevating a classic dish to an exceptional level.

The menu shows great attention to seasonality, and every course felt carefully crafted and harmonious.

The service deserves special praise: professional, attentive, and knowledgeable without ever being intrusive. The staff took the time to explain the dishes and made us feel genuinely cared for throughout the evening.

The wine selection is excellent and well curated, perfectly complementing the menu. While the prices reflect the quality and level of the experience, they are absolutely justified by the overall standard of food, service, and ambiance.

Radicale is the ideal choice for a special occasion, a romantic dinner, or anyone looking to experience contemporary Italian cuisine at a high level in Bari. Highly recommended, a place we will gladly return to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvgMY5DMubwo7yBE1mYb4o29Vdx0m3lHJXCEq72xzz91AaB7E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were impressed by all the dishes we had here! We love the red prawn tartare and the truffle pasta the most, but the other dishes were amazing too!

Everyone visiting Bari should check Radicale out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCuup3VDsZyo6jTX5fP93Va&fid=0x0:0x7dc4188fea957296"],"When":"2025-7-18"}]

[{"Name":"Komlos Albert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz_lb2v3EhuU76sjLiqKGwwelSOz6j-ao6-oSH3F2pzqU60Yy8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, good atmosphere, nice service. One of the nicest prepared steaks i had in Italy. The bombette was delicious, the best I had in Puglia. For main the Filetto all‚ÄôArtu was very tender, well prepared, cream sauce on top! Can highly recommend this place over other steak places in Bari","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAtUNT-gg3lgoncOVv1AVAt&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Franti≈°ka O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZAKg7LePntF3s2g_Vt2Rb5Vy9hiz0-cOA14IAyxIrWiuTr6HMhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am not a meat person and I chose this restaurant blindly as a surprise for my partner. Even I have to admit that the steak was great and it was such a pleasure to visit and I am glad I decided to celebrate in here. The staff was so kind and helpful, the restaurant was full but we didn‚Äôt have to wait for long, place is beautiful and has a good vibe.

PS: I definitely recommend reserve the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_CK9xwyH0_yMS26Bj5DkT&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"Patrik Pero≈°a","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6Ig5TGLUhZo7B0cPeZStnLrrB4e2scHgYToWvnc2IPLQw0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic and delicious steaks ‚Äì cooked to perfection! The atmosphere is cozy, the service is attentive, and the overall experience makes it a place you‚Äôll want to come back to. Definitely worth a visit to relax and enjoy a great meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEIeIpoedq6m7Iw&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2025-5-27"},{"Name":"H K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJB9RSgtYvdgX2fjfFFgwU8vYI4KvO8jOWPqWyKQpqulZf9WGWNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really loved the quality of the meat here and the tiramisu was amazing. The presentation of the steak was amazing. I fell in love with the whole interior of this restaurant. I‚Äôd love to come back. Exquisite food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEN-WrJThxr_w8AE&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2025-6-6"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDPuA4XUnPvgSCi6KYfkKV2LzmqoICY0stel9zF0G3dsoAsI64=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for meat lovers. I ordered sliced beef. It is so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBiuKsbEVNWB4x912ya7Vg2&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2025-9-25"},{"Name":"Denis Iancu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzz2CQUdPmBK21kKORJSsPnFU-X3QOZUcXsFPXWA5BnE2VD2Dd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is very good, drinks are also good. The place is cozy and looks very nice and chic. But the best thing about this place is the staff! These guys are amazing people and very friendly! Please let the manager know that the two staff members ( one boy & one girl) deserve a medal! Thank you very much guys! I strongly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICXsNySEw&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Haikal Lokman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDppErF6CepQGwLYQyFlhwdao2oiqTHPYYwa8XRWh-mw1H2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The steaks were world class, it‚Äôs a perfect place for a steak lover. The meats are delicately dry aged past the 40/60 days mark (depending on the breed) creating some of the most tender great tasting meat I‚Äôve had.

Vino selection is fantastic, bottles or by the glass.

I loved this place so much I visited it twice during my short stay in Bari! I also had to book a ticket to Florence to benchmark how the florentina Chianina breed compares to some of the Lombardy gems served here.

Rustic deco and well trained staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDLpfjsHQ&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Irene Moustopoulou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaXdDU0OOFisMYD-IXVlNcGg9ZzSwEO_1GLktA2NTHuCJF5gYIJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Sappori Solari just because we craved a good steak...
And i have to say that we were both more than impressed!
For starters we got the beef carpaccio and the ragu pasta to share and i have to say that the ragu was one of the best and most flavourful I've ever had in my life ....and no I'm not exaggerating...trust me . Later on we had one bistecca fiorentina about 1,2 kg to share and some side dishes and oh boy everything was so fine... The steak was cooked rare and served on a cast iron plate witch you could continue the roasting as far as you wanted and of course we ate it medium rare.. perfection! We accompanied our dinner with a glass of local red wine as suggested by our very kind and helpful waiter!
Many thanks to the whole service team and my love to the chef and his kitchen team !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDFpa-grwE&fid=0x0:0x9b5bec50f78863d2"],"When":"2023-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paulina W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILQWD6Ao-gWEQ83AqIlDezYr1ZTU7MVcRNNA9-xpChLOLvcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Mastro Ciccio in Bari and I‚Äôm absolutely delighted! The place has an amazing vibe ‚Äì modern yet cozy, with a beautiful view of the city streets. The food is simply outstanding. The fried panzerotto was crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and packed with flavorful filling. The tomato focaccia tasted like the true essence of Puglia ‚Äì simple, fresh, and full of flavor. It‚Äôs the perfect spot for a quick, local, and delicious meal. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Bari!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaGuVwhb3wwyDmv0zmVZxQ&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-12-1"},{"Name":"Paul B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOeyt0O01pJ0WYw3RK59CNN-N8BvU7A8_V8loRanQoZFVOHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mastro Ciccio was recommended to me by the Free Walking Tour guide and I am so glad he did.
Though it looks like a fast food restaurant, it‚Äôs the perfect spot for a quick, local, and delicious meal. The food is simple, full of flavour and portion size is good and is definitely value for money.
Its modern and comfortable inside, plus it has an outside terrace. Opening hours are good.The queues may look long but the actual waiting time is quite short and worth it.
Only intended to pop in once, but as the food was good,  I  went back the following night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDy1VMjlpQPS3G1LO56Br56&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Trinh Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnEassYJgagY31TXB9GR35-agN11mt0bqaU9b1H6L1YRu-5qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is this waitress who are super nice and cheerful. She was mistaken with the combo salad i ordered, so she gabe me a bottle of water for free. Even the manager was really helpful and make sure i‚Äôm satisfied with the food. Great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBWYCYK6V_EUBGD72CELdm8&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"Raluca Puiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVx497b5gun52eZalEjs0bBU3Ce-nU01c_Q5nzgKGoO-LE-r6f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the heart of old Bari, on Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, lies MastroCiccio ‚Äì a place less formal than a traditional restaurant, but full of personality and energy. The brand presents itself as a declaration of love for Puglia: ‚ÄúMordi la Puglia‚Äù is their slogan, and every panino, fritto, or specialty served seems to tell a local story made from simple, carefully chosen ingredients. Nothing more original, nothing more authentic: Puglia in a panino ‚Äì the MastroCiccio Bari experience.

Bari has a special kind of energy ‚Äì a mix of sea air, sunshine, and good vibes, where food is not just nourishment but a way of life. Here, among the old streets and the smell of freshly baked focaccia bread, we discovered MastroCiccio ‚Äì the place where street food becomes art, and every panino tells a story about Puglia, flavor, and passion.

The name MastroCiccio hides a story of resilience and determination. It all began as a childhood nickname, linked to the stature of Fabio Mastrandrea ‚Äì the founder of the brand ‚Äì but over time, it became a symbol of his personal journey and transformation into a mark of strength and professional success.

Founded in 2002, MastroCiccio has grown steadily, and after more than two decades in the world of fast gastronomy, it has become a benchmark of quality and tradition in the heart of Bari.

At MastroCiccio, the menu overflows with panini featuring octopus, burrata, panzerotti, seafood sandwiches, and other typical Puglian products ‚Äì all displayed at the counter, ready to catch your eye before you even sit down.

Memorable flavors between ambiance and crowds

The star of the show is, of course, U Pulp! ‚Äì the octopus panino. The octopus was tender and perfectly seasoned, while the bread was crisp on the outside and soft and juicy inside. At the same time, the panzerotto and burrata left their mark with creamy texture and Mediterranean flavor. Although the crowd almost made us give up, every bite proved that the wait was worth it ‚Äì the intensity and freshness of the dishes make MastroCiccio a stop you simply can‚Äôt miss.

Another dish that caught our eye was the Burrozza Biancorossa ‚Äì a burrata reinterpreted in a spectacular way: lightly fried until the outside turns golden and crisp while the inside stays soft and velvety. Under the delicate cheese crust lies a flavorful filling of Modena IGP mortadella, basil pesto (without garlic), olive oil, and a touch of pepper. The result is a delicious contrast between creamy and crunchy, between the delicacy of burrata and the boldness of the filling ‚Äì a true homage to Italian culinary refinement.

An exotic Panzerotti also drew our attention, and we couldn‚Äôt resist trying it. The New Capagnore is a spectacular reinterpretation of Puglian tradition ‚Äì an explosion of flavors that surprises from the first bite. The black dough, made from Altamura semolina and vegetable charcoal, hides a creamy, aromatic filling: slow-cooked octopus, silky burrata, melted mozzarella, and roasted tomatoes that add a sweet-tangy note. A parsley and anchovy pesto, completed with extra virgin olive oil and a touch of pepper, ties all the flavors together in perfect harmony. A dish that combines visual beauty with refined taste ‚Äì intense, Mediterranean, and unforgettable.

Raffo beer completed the feast perfectly ‚Äì smooth, refreshing, and full of local character, making room for the octopus to dance freely.

Tips to make the most of your MastroCiccio experience
‚Ä¢ Visit during off-peak hours (after lunch or in the early evening) to avoid long queues.
‚Ä¢ Definitely try the octopus specialties or those featuring local stars like burrata and seafood for the most authentic experience.
‚Ä¢ Eat your sandwich soon after receiving it ‚Äì it‚Äôs best when fresh, and you can always take your photos first.
‚Ä¢ Bring some patience ‚Äì popularity comes with crowds.
‚Ä¢ At lunchtime, due to the high customer flow, the indoor temperature can rise a bit (perhaps also because of limited air conditioning) and space can feel a little tight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhANdbF6svYssyYHjMNarRnK&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Enrei Pata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIwyQyrUrUS5oo5MBJN5VJrsbf4318ONTjorI3-QEwxHL7S3sC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited Mastro Ciccio in Bari and totally understand why it‚Äôs so famous! I got the Moooh menu with crunchy pulpo and my girlfriend had the orecchiette con le cozze ‚Äî both dishes were bursting with flavor and perfectly cooked. The place was packed, full of locals and tourists, but the staff handled it well. We paid around ‚Ç¨31 for two menus including drinks, and honestly, worth every cent. The cute atmosphere and quality food make it a must-visit in Bari‚Äôs city center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8IZr70XAuvzO3mqId-AkX&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Yasen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNuLdeN6463kD7IGDCprOisKXVXiy-TZmuDyeb9ePH0S7KPVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must-visit spot in Bari! They serve amazing octopus sandwiches ‚Äî big, fresh, and incredibly tasty. The portions are generous and full of flavor. It‚Äôs a popular place, so you might have to wait a bit during busy hours, but it‚Äôs absolutely worth it. Definitely one of those local experiences you shouldn‚Äôt miss while in Bari!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqMCvclq_bkyO1v0bR-GDG&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"D√°vid Friedrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Iw6brZwANduUmsqjTj1gQKsdxQkB57RKqM6N4U3OtW5rLbJz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A recommended place to eat if you come to Bari in my opinion. It is kind of a fast food restarant, but not the typical one, that is a huge plus.
For me the octopus sandwiches were the favourite food in Bari.
My only negative comment that the cozz&  pupozz we had in the menu, was very oily/greasy. All the other food was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCyZXVkmxsOIoiyO2z7IyJ_&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Stanislav Markov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtx4mLlqYu-Ym46X_CGw1gmZWc2imGYtTkOOkBRXXuDWcb-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved it! The food was amazing, they gave out free samples while you waited and we would absolutely come again. ONLY - we waited around 30 minutes and I couldn‚Äôt understand why, as when I got to the counter in a minute I had ordered and paid. A lot of people were before us and I do not know why we waited so long, as the process is fast. Imo you should put a second cashier and screens from which you can directly order, as maybe 20-30% of the people waiting went somewhere else after the 10th minute of waiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALZ9ndKr6FVYgEl4cmD9_V&fid=0x0:0x9eb4a306afb7e7da"],"When":"2025-10-20"}]

My friend and I went there looking for a risotto we saw online. Although it was no longer on the menu, the chef kindly accommodated our request and it was simply incredible. Our server Gabrielle was very polite and professional. 10/10. My favourite dining experience in Bari","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQP0_yxOtdCWAPcDihd52k&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Jeremy G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXEzj1aad0VIrFiFc8DYgAYRBlBVX_1Mi9GECHQFBUl6208Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I ate here on 29 May. Food was incredible, and I was really surprised at how large the portions were for how they were priced. The lobster was huge, and for only 40 euros‚Ä¶ this would have been double the price in many spots in Western Europe or North America. The service was a little slower as it was a Friday night, but hard to complain when the food is this great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELmZ1K3Vz8H1twE&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2025-5-31"},{"Name":"Kate Cast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWht-FBH2S_BBJZsMqaSMi1MX-TorsyFCrO50oBXQgyLZkIda3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice presentation of the plates. Very nice atmosphere. A bit antic style but also elegant. Great service. My branzino fish came with kind of sweet salad and and potatoes cake gratin which all together is very particular mix but not really my taste. My bf took pasta with branzino which was well balanced and he really enjoyed the combination of red grapes with it. They also offered us a small ‚Äúsporca musso‚Äù which was small dessert as thank you from the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICZ2pXO4gE&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Sol√®ne Aubert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnrdV-tUL6oB7hKo2TxqkyT2NdUBUfb_1sW4U2jTaxxLRD1LYP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing time at Ristorante Opera.
The service was amazing and quick. I ordered the tris tartar and the crab spaghetti and it was delicious. I highly recommend these dishes as they were both full of flavours and very fresh.
The prices are very reasonable since it‚Äôs high quality food, I ate for the same price in other restaurants in Bari where the quality of the service and the food were not this high. I went here by myself and was offered appetizers and  sweet treats at the end of the diner.
The atmosphere is warm and intimate, I think it is an amazing place for dates as well.
Best restaurant experience so far in Bari.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC91Lq6Lg&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Francesca De maggis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqjGdTNYK0dKEBz-fKAZchHZeQLBcggNnWpA3EWwOAt42ozQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant!!! It‚Äôs guarantee of high quality Italian food, great service and elegant location. Very particular Italian dishes enriched with international preparations and ingredients. SUPER RECOMMENDED!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1kdzU8QE&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Teodor Novakov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa4d-gfXh0sKoRp7tgxqnXoih25itAlWwbILVV2JnQVrOoYms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited Ristorante Opera during our stay in Bari, and it was truly one of the most memorable dining experiences of our trip!

From the moment we arrived, we were impressed by the elegant yet cozy atmosphere. The staff were exceptionally friendly, attentive, and happy to guide us through the menu.

The menu offers a wonderful variety of Apulian specialties, all prepared with fresh, local ingredients. We tried several dishes, and each one was delicious, beautifully presented, and perfectly balanced in flavor. The pasta was outstanding, and the seafood was fresh and tender.

The wine list is also excellent, with carefully selected local wines that complemented the dishes perfectly.

The location is convenient, and it‚Äôs lovely to take a short stroll after dinner. Overall, we felt relaxed, welcomed, and truly special. This dinner will be a lasting memory from our trip to Bari.

üí° Recommendation: If you are in Bari, don‚Äôt miss Ristorante Opera ‚Äì it‚Äôs perfect for a romantic dinner or a special family occasion. Definitely worth every praise!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura Zaugg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdIb1315Ez7FRQVnzUzWB06mVVkC1Zr0c3oblpiOaQApGpfeoibg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great seafood dinner here. Everything we ordered was brought quickly to the table (we were a group of eight). The food convinced taste wise as much as from an aesthetical point of view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICazMeCRw&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2021-7-24"},{"Name":"Enzo M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdfzCA5bS2sy1bR6TfZjfnff2VMnP0k6_q_j8m8Xn60P9KMciUxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good seafood restaurant in the central part of Bari next to Town Hall. Great friendly service and elegant ambience. I love the more adventurous combinations of seafood with fruit and acidic tastes and this makes a place for pleasant surprises prepared by chef Lello Lonigro. Very strongly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDCloDiYg&fid=0x0:0x48276b5b8f02272a"],"When":"2020-9-25"}]

The wine was amazing and the waiter had great recommendations for food and wine - try the Luminaire wine when you get there. It is so great that we decided to go twice, and the second time around was just as impressive as the first, which is extremely rare. Perfecto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICz6uORtAE\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e25af400e5a1595"],"When":"2024-6-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justyna M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkiSPu6TWR50yRHM3S4nVwoIo4KDNViDK9mjnkVKL-qU6LQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On the last evening of our trip, we saw all the great reviews and decided to go ‚Äî and we‚Äôre so glad we did! The food was incredible ‚Äî the best steaks of our lives, and at a very reasonable price. All the sides, from the salad and potatoes to the wine, were amazing. We can‚Äôt wait for our next trip to Bari so we can come back to this restaurant! And we can‚Äôt forget about the staff ‚Äî every single one of them was so friendly and helped us choose the perfect dishes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC3GdJmSQhZz55mUyaFeW8W&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-8-5"},{"Name":"Rob Speld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzheFbX1GbzSR-KhbU7GU4CR1TY29oonz5pGYSXjAxyweUcOELIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The quality of the meat is excellent, cooked with care over fire and full of flavor. Prices are very reasonable for what you get. The sides and condiments are quite basic, so there‚Äôs some room for improvement there. Adding warmer lighting could also really enhance the atmosphere. Still, a very enjoyable experience and a spot I‚Äôd gladly return to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATBnuKN_LvVptYFFUa2n_V&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-8-8"},{"Name":"Magdalena Georgieska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOogP15WBKnht9wKW7PdiURXE9iTj_KAM6FXOGiU9lIY9h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Antonio was very pleasant and he gave the right recommendations regarding the food and wine. The Spanish beef was well matured and full of flavour. The gorgeous slice of grass fed beef was marbeled by yellow fat. The beef was cooked to perfection, medium rare. The starter was equally impressive and consisted of tartar Angus beef and raw sausagees. The price was reasonable and the service was excellent. This place is highly recommended ü•∞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCQCyPC1xX9CHdR008ZwWzp&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"Cansu Kaplan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt3_I5ItiEaxbxq9mCkRTyTccHMbTmtvZftBr28aiP4VtUBSsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We didn‚Äôt really enjoy the raw meats. Considering the price, the burger was especially good, but it was incredibly hard to eat and felt more like a regular dish than an actual burger. The cooked meat, however, was quite good, and the service was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBr1UvlqBMapExkyRlqgwxw&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"Lucas Scheiblecker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8teOCFIdPCfoBE_q1uFe970HD8wo1dxh5PYvAkNz-F-szLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food. The quality and Selection of the meat cuts was outstanding. Great execution. Definitely a top recommendation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAQB7irSCsXDaV2HqGUBClK&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-11-3"},{"Name":"Laurent LAURENT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrRK8QKi87CEGAMPgCSKj79tjKwtH0lfMjsEwG76VnZKlCow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A diamond in the middle of the real Bari where people really live and not in "rbnb vecchio Bari".
Meat from around the world is cooked perfectly
Wine is amazing and not stupidly priced.
Same for the meat.
And the service is very amicable.
An amazing dinner worth the walk.
I will definitely come again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUs0T8EWA5o6B8kJTj8tZW&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-8-9"},{"Name":"Lukas Gruncl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5f6MCr4axW57hIUFVsWeu1ZFMioOc_S2eI39lEqq2KCpMh4M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An Unforgettable Steakhouse Experience at La Moderna Brace

Everything was absolutely perfect ‚Äì from the first bite to the last sip. La Moderna Brace offered us not just a meal, but a full-on culinary experience with flawless service and a warm, authentic atmosphere.

We had:

ü•© Japanese Wagyu Carpaccio ‚Äì silky, delicate, and beautifully balanced.
üå≠ Raw Sausage ‚Äì surprisingly refined, rich in flavor, and a true highlight.
üî• Black Angus T-Bone ‚Äì bold, juicy, perfectly grilled ‚Äì a steak lover‚Äôs dream.
üêÑ Swami Wagyu Rib Eye Steak ‚Äì simply extraordinary. Incredibly tender and full of flavor ‚Äì it melted in the mouth.

And the best part? All of this came at a very fair price, making this place a true hidden gem.
If you‚Äôre looking for one of the best steak experiences in town, La Moderna Brace should be at the very top of your list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDqgiTm2V0avOHtmI1xXbk4&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-7-19"},{"Name":"Oeil Jumratsilpa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy_7vy7fh3syiYCQqHWeF5BNPWX_aQ-GZOkNIkFlbAD5F0PuKa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Possibly some of the best bombette you can get in Bari! You can order one at a time and mix all the different types. My favourite is with salami picante and gorgonzola. Lovely people and amazing wine too. Always have to come back here when I‚Äôm in Bari.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCElqAb90NswoS92dtAaV0r&fid=0x0:0x4c0530e672101c57"],"When":"2025-9-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLclBlv81hFZcfpK2QSjfmDWN3wuhhbyCJd56SzW2WSRMjNAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, fantastic service in a great location! After a fabulous first meal here, I loved it so much I came back again and again! The food was fabulous, authentic and unique (like the chef had carefully crafted each dish rather than feeling mass produced like in some tourist spots). I liked that the portions weren't ginormous, they were just right - so I could enjoy an entree, main and dessert (and limoncello, of course). It's also in a beautiful location in the square, and the staff were amazing - Angelo was my waiter, always very friendly and helpful despite my limited Italian! I will definitely be back on my next visit to Bari!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBu9Ikde6Iw7A43ADuNdQaj&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-7-18"},{"Name":"Damian G√≥recki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjWLDRXc1JuFSMvpNelNtyYTDZLUXwEbiWO7Hy3jWNppmZUNnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is located in the very center, but you can tell that it's not just for tourists. The service is fast and friendly. The food was good, especially the traditional orecchiette cime di rapa, but I have a few comments about the monkfish. It wasn't bad, but it was probably the worst I've ever had. I didn't like the sauce, and the fish itself lacked depth of flavor. The portion was also small for the price. However, the white wine was excellent. The limoncello at the end was a kind gesture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHuNhS3AOWtPFKEsmzK5wR&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"Hilen Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYyTOwQXZWrLTdHJuhHzQDCp-99WW_1wLjnnRIQQC0x1hTyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellence üåü
Great pugliese dishes, well flavoured and fresh. We had an amazing time, definitely recommend, totally worth it. Please just remember to book a table in order to help with the service üòäüôèüôå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC9f2TIsZmfxJmHBKhnaMMl&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-8-26"},{"Name":"Tereza Postulkov√°","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaIvuzlowsm69oKAV5Xwm2QyjHLzZPDF5u8goo3QWjnTYwqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were a group of six and got a table even without a reservation, which was great.

Most of the dishes were well-prepared and tasty. The only real disappointment was the beef steak, which was tough. We mentioned it to the staff, and they kindly removed it from the bill.

Expect slower service and avoid the steak!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAh16kC9OhYl_pJYLo0CWsT&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-7-4"},{"Name":"Raluca Berescu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSUVvRHfSZKhx4rK6jmZSbxxtaTIDdAPr5Rz89JEEvvNga3JKz2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well, another place in Bari that is understaff. The food was okeish, we had pasta and melanzane to eat since other options that we tried to order were out of stock. But nothing so exquisite for the price charged. Anyway, we think we were lucky because we were there at the oppening, the rest of the people, that came afterwards were waiting for very long. We waited also for the dessert, asking 2 times for it. Maybe it is a rule in Bari to wait patiently but we are not accustomed to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6UonJUQ2VbJECowfpi0Oe&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"Mindy Jagpal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsv136lSkUvjQ5F0fBlut0ufXlhPn1l3RqipBZ6yAVdVjGSg8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came across this lovely restaurant ‚Äì great atmosphere and brilliant service. Special mention to the staff, especially Pedro, Tommy, Ivan, Dorana and Gioio, who made the experience extra enjoyable. The food was absolutely delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBCQQz8gwUaOMk4L0n5cqh5&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"Jamie Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFlKsyePp5rsyg_wDEHHrHMAgFOBIGhNjejmKE_SHITunJsV3z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In town from London, and this is an easy 5 stars üåü. Leagues above the others with miserably long queues and tacky music. It‚Äôs great food, served in a stylish atmosphere by exceptionally friendly people. We left stuffed to the brim with pasta and travel tips. We ate too quick to take great photos, t‚Äôwas gorge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA8-tx92UoXHJg9sMW9FpIV&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Luciana Pagliara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKDqdBGtRNp8tfC2QN5seb5y4sbLhXHVkVX0ApGFEDP997ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I celebrated my birthday here and it was perfect. From the warm welcome to the good vibes, everything felt special. The menu was tailor-made for me, respecting my preferences, and the food was 10/10. Beautiful space, impeccable service, true Apulian hospitality. Thank you for making this day unforgettable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBI3_9x78ggYV_jnfQ5gD2A&fid=0x0:0xf1c8deb9e8f8a451"],"When":"2025-7-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"IChago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI3N9wnT6-aaPhU4jQL2PGAie6k491ddBz4dVPB1qmu5EJK7aG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stumbled upon this restaurant for dinner after a long, busy day‚Äîand what an incredible surprise it turned out to be! The atmosphere inside is calm and beautifully designed, offering a perfect setting to unwind. The service was warm and attentive, and the food truly exceeded our expectations.

The menu features creative takes on classic dishes, elevating them with unique ingredients and thoughtful preparation. For example, the pasta with figs and fish was absolutely delicious‚Äîan unexpected yet perfectly balanced combination. Every dish we tried reflected care, skill, and originality.

Compliments to the chef for such a memorable dining experience. We highly recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCU5u7G42_GNl3_y3sco_hm&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2025-7-1"},{"Name":"Giancarlo Angelucci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9NC_mxdeG8hXiHngIh2sltEEg3Jp1Fk3jtMXDCPXCFw4tc_AiNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food. Best monkfish I ever had. Everything was perfectly executed and staff are knowledgeable and polite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDSeHFBlEJ7eH315M1CvKKZ&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"Larisa Mla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcoHkE_SLCkNLRfOuM1Mw1EGWJfo6xDzHg8BfOdJdYAnzNtn9N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful place with very fresh seafood. The service was excellent and the food has an interesting twist to classic dishes. We particularly loved the antipasti recommended by the waiter and the wine pairing. The atmosphere inside is classy yet comfortable and provides a perfect dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKENGVicft-p7lEw&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"Clara Ruiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd48JhsooI1wRbnPb4X5o-GWHQBDsKDfKMZv0h3cnA1xstIugV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to have lunch to Samuele Pastanella restaurant on our last day in Puglia after being enjoying for more than 10 days around.
Food we had there was definitely the best in the whole trip.
Pasticcioto as starter was one of the best choices we could have and the tuna was delicious together with the pasta with lobster.
The restaurant is lovely inside, the seats are very comfy and the light is perfect. Service was top. Long life to this new place. Definitely my big recommendation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZopGqNw&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2023-9-27"},{"Name":"Camille Farrington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVV9XqMZu7EhT8MDq9Ja0ksYym4gIMejN1ApmtBRBwJ4IPFu83L=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful atmosphere, and the best meal I've had in a long time. We got the 4 course tasting menu, and every dish was spectacular. Highlights were the primi pasta course with shrimp, squid ink and lemon zest, and the fantastic tiramisu and caramel cannoli. Our server was also wonderful -- overall an excellent experience. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aleksander P≈Çawski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo4-K9GFsPMAIm0fmyMhDWzHmw3yjHyDnIb-_Lo727nSEhsEG0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is elegant but not overly elegant, because you feel comfortable here. All the dishes we chose were flawless. Bravo to the chef! Raw fish, octopus with fava, tuna tataki, as well as a perfect combination of cod and sea bass in one dish, and finally almond cannolo - everything was delicious. A very good wine (recommended by the waiter) completed the whole experience. The service throughout the dinner was impeccable. We highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICr8v-Ebg&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Keith Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKMfqC6vjYAedHiJyx0TCNQeYOMY5Qtn7zitbDR_fozWzL8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We liked this restaurant. The food was very tasty: well-cooked straightforward dishes, with a very good choice of wines. The restaurant is clearly popular with locals, usually a good sign. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vito Delle foglie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVru3Eeck9iPGfHnJUHChcNfCxc0vsrqmvMqfq3Plbf5GpCfQI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think that I never try something like this, the view, the taste and the vibes in this restaurant are much different than a classic restaurant.
This wasn‚Äôt just a dinner, was the best experience of my life. Looking already to be back in Bari just to enjoy again the ‚Äúquadro di mare‚Äù and that amazing oysters Gillardeau","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDo3PWL1gE&fid=0x0:0x988856d0d94017c6"],"When":"2025-4-22"}]

If you are used to big portion food, be sure to order a few more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDerMaJ4gE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf66d24bc2d794c60"],"When":"2022-10-4"},{"Name":"Dominykas Rentelis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo_XHSWT4o7g0mDp68gehUfNFK2htZDoB42_oJf7rzglLXnB3h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh this restaurant is really fabulous. The owner speaks in English, you can ask about the best wine that suets your dish. The food was delicious, we ate rizoto with sea food and it was the best. This is the place that you must visit here in Bari.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4hKKD_gE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf66d24bc2d794c60"],"When":"2018-1-12"},{"Name":"Camila Bolehan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVLmLnqQk3-MSh-h4pi-lPe2uWaa_G_IQ-Ecl-gs8ahOYvKNcd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Inadequate waiter who is rude. I wanted to order a dessert, and my boyfriend a main course. When I asked for dessert and fruit, he started shouting \"it's not possible\", because dessert belongs to the bar, and you can order it only from the restaurant üò≥ and started pointing his finger to the street!, without waiting for my boyfriend to order. Why add desserts to the menu if I can't order them? What kind of inappropriate attitude towards customers? I am very disappointed with the service at this restaurant. And the waiter with a beard and an earring in his ear is simply abnormal. Teach your waiters how to communicate with customers!!!! Why should I pay for this service?? The main course was delicious, but the serving of desserts needs better ü•≤ I would rather cut seasonal fruits at home. I do not recommend this restaurant, because the mood is spoiled for the whole evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDJqsX0tQE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf66d24bc2d794c60"],"When":"2023-7-14"},{"Name":"Dan Rusan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwMfL4JtoXMbQ0cPaQrOqJ1UWedSfgO3Hfw4UWrag-LOvn1d53hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good seafood risotto. We ate on the terrace because we didn't have a reservation, and it was very hot there, being a greenhouse effect under the shadows.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICbiszLwgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf66d24bc2d794c60"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Max R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhKM5weqbo1yVZH_ct1IJT2asml1GDasZpspxfjwLFG0MbNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you like seafood this is the place to go. They serve a variety of Apulian seafood specialities. If you are not into seafood like me you can still have very nice pasta or a meat dish! The place is a bit pricier then other but worth it! Went here during lunch time and it was no problem of getting a table but the place was still busy. For going here at night I would make a reservation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID42tKmMg\u0026fid=0x0:0xf66d24bc2d794c60"],"When":"2019-2-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Flemming Friis Eriksen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwiovNnxZiUQdyWiBy27pTf0c0c-FttGKUQmevC05Uxgkt7n0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the 8-course tasting menu with 5 glasses of wine, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The atmosphere was warm and cozy, striking a perfect balance between elegance and a relaxed, welcoming vibe.

We never found ourselves waiting for a wine refill ‚Äì the service was attentive without ever being intrusive. Each wine pairing was thoughtfully selected and complemented the locally inspired dishes beautifully.

The space itself was lovely, with a unique personal touch: the paintings on the walls were made by the chef‚Äôs mother, adding both charm and character. Every course was a visual delight ‚Äì each dish felt like a small piece of art on the plate.

All in all, a memorable evening that truly celebrated local flavors, artistry, and hospitality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAOkKAyOGp5TJw-lIY9-xuJ&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2025-8-26"},{"Name":"Murat Celik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcjfeXEG0lnGNrPSzj22YNUtMOypUtRGuCHTb_WQnSemoxJ-6d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During my Bari vacation, I went to La Bul Ristorante on a recommendation and had a wonderful dining experience. La Bul, distinguished by its simplicity, friendly atmosphere, and elegance, was truly an extraordinary experience for me. The decor is understated but with lovely touches. It was especially meaningful that the artwork on the walls was the work of the chef's mother.

I opted for the menu, which focused on traditional Puglia cuisine. Both the appetizers and the main course were excellent. The staff were very attentive and knowledgeable. The drink pairings were also excellent, and the sommelier was very talented and helpful. I highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcQMXerHGo-Teu7J-MIh2a&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2025-9-9"},{"Name":"Gabriel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHH34ordoA6_3heoveArVsPExcRun0gJOPefl1dLczisSRJdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TOP experience. We took the 5 course + wine experience. The chef and staff really know what are doing. Good job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3gJnIdWX17PVpYYdEgVRs&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Rob Sonke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjDxzAbxAW5l-UNivwVhfAm8IWkXjG1Ig04EgSPaukoGPoCgp-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great dinner with three friends. It was a calm Wednesday evening but didn‚Äôt bother. Food was awesome, wines combined nicely and the service very good and comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJKJ1a7pyKPbjwE&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2025-5-25"},{"Name":"Simone Eats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmP5p2Tm8hd2x5RbWfQhYJMmwjIJXZqHOUoUR2_0EAEH1lMr40og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great evening at La Bul in Bari, Italy, opting for the chef's surprise tasting menu. The food, while very good, lacked that wow factor‚Äîcreative and fresh, yet missing the mark on creating lasting memories. The wine selection, featuring many local options, was a strong point, but the service, while pleasant, didn't quite reach the level of excellence found in comparable fine dining establishments.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIClgLyuQQ&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Gillian Colabella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzkx0dLSLJKM8zS_aIlI42nsmsxdy4pWEw8G8LKCW9bMObXII=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This discovery was such a surprise!!! Amazing food and wines served by a professional and competent staff! A must in Bari! Can‚Äôt wait to return !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAq8k_avAwWWfCt7zwI0nHe&fid=0x0:0xc49dc4b5fc8189d3"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"adriana Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjxeEoOrJwE__5FCcJV9iey27p_6n3IYP4_Fljl0LoqXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a place I highly recommend in Bari! The food was excellent ‚Äî every dish from the 8-course dinner was delicious, beautifully presented, and made with high-quality ingredients. The service was outstanding, and the chef was incredibly attentive, making sure we were well taken care of throughout the evening. A truly memorable dining experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liz Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH1wfRHmG-ujw1d3IZ9wlsukUmrjMRX59sXK9bqnfnj7PX_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant. The blind tasting menus are brilliant. We did the 4 course with 3 wines. Would recommend. Definitely worth a visit when in Bari.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"aaron ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUedKhJUYcpILu0tyHl4-TNQgakL6LNzSiS3eCGFWmL2HezWLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok. I don‚Äôt even know where to start. I was wandering around Bari and needed to kill some time before a certain focaccia shop opened. I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôve done right in this world, but fortune smiled upon me this night. Martinelli was empty so I popped in for a glass of wine while I waited for my focaccia dreams to come true. Well‚Ä¶ I never left Martinelli because dreams came true that I hadn‚Äôt even had yet. The small and beautifully designed space quickly filled up after I arrived, so again: incredible fortune. Giulia is incredible. The wine she recommended was perfect fit based on what I asked for, and then I started to taste the food. I had to leave Bari the next day, and I had NO idea about the food in this place but now I crave it daily. I had a sandwich with salmon, swordfish, and‚Ä¶ something else. Dang! I forget. The sandwich was INCREDIBLE! The wine Giulia recommended to pair was again: perfect. And now I had to taste more. Enter a new face: Shiva. Another incredibly nice and helpful person! They made some dessert tasting platter of heaven, and I took one bite slowly at a time, each with a different flavor: pistachio, peanut butter, white chocolate, dark chocolate, and finally coconut. Between the staff who felt like friends, and the incredible food, chill music, and beautiful space, I was in heaven!

Honestly; I crave this food daily and cannot wait to return to see these wonderful people. Thank you Giulia and Shiva for the most wonderful, unexpected evening!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDhKlnERIBRFUg3CxWJVp3m&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Margarita Tovstolyak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp17tCjym6jAUMS4MW_SVYsXVhMkMi_cU_oKA1ebx9Ksare5cG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre ever in Bari, don‚Äôt miss this place! Hands down the best seafood sandwiches - prawns, octopus, seafood you name it - absolutely delicious! In fact we couldn‚Äôt resist and ordered another round of same sandwich. Prawn is definitely my favorite one. The team is super friendly and welcoming. Can‚Äôt wait to come back and will recommend it to everyone visiting Bari ü§ç Bravo and keep it up! ü§ç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBlSh5safFDlzLyjyV2ZzF7&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-10-29"},{"Name":"Thomas K√∂nig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRjVGBwU7wiUsDO1O8Lxd_mIuFsRruD-Z-XYp4wbUIDNyWAuI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Martinelli Bar is a true hidden treasure ‚Äì a place where style, flavor, and atmosphere blend seamlessly into a perfect experience. From the very first moment you step inside, you‚Äôre embraced by an elegant yet cozy vibe that makes you want to stay for hours.

The two girls working that day were simply outstanding ‚Äì warm, attentive, and effortlessly charming. You could feel that everything they did came straight from the heart, with genuine passion and attention to detail.

The drinks? Pure perfection. Each one was beautifully crafted, full of creativity, and bursting with flavor. And the food ‚Äì absolutely exceptional. Every bite was a small masterpiece, refined and delicious, made with the finest ingredients.

The location and setting are just as impressive ‚Äì stylish, inviting, and radiating that irresistible Mediterranean charm that makes Bari so special.

In short: Martinelli Bar is far more than just a bar ‚Äì it‚Äôs an experience. If you‚Äôre in Bari, make sure not to miss this stunning spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD83GKD5Wdjtr2mUc4lYJUN&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"anZdig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0lKsCw_pOcnCbviLNdi4TsiFmlGl0qCdCWBosueIcVJKxy5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a cozy spot, and this place delivered exactly that. The staff was very welcoming and gave us great suggestions. We enjoyed a lovely house-made cocktail that was unique and memorable. The sandwiches were delicious, made with fresh ingredients, and the squid tartare was an unusual and tasty twist. The dessert was also very original, something we haven‚Äôt tried anywhere else. Overall, it‚Äôs definitely a place worth visiting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhByR1OHABPH6pdpNBhBdDkC&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-8-7"},{"Name":"boris saviƒá","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVv_gjJtc6jKIJQWyX-AkMdB4UYVJrY5823jDrCEOePNMcTRebY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best sandwich type of meals we had. They offer seafood fillings and there is a vegetarian choice as well. Food really tasty, good drinks and personal is really nice and kind. End very clean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAk0s4QZkCy3vUt5AoKrDQS&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"David Newgarden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFRGCrJPrggdmdhxqrOQJpy0wnjFv7GGZIodn9Bgfh6iwUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fish sandwiches - perfect lunch.   We had St Teresa with amberjack fillet, eggplant gratine and a smoked cheese.  They didnt have vegan sandwich on menu, so I had Fortinonsandwich with grilled zucchini, mozzarella, olive paste, caramized tomatoes and onions, and sunflower seeds.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCRy8gIEScD_QIIALeuFrak&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Pawel Korpalski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRDkV08NCj72axOriRtVhKyxMPaeG8oUpgsYjmt44Gui8TnSwnfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just amazing! We stopped there 4 friends‚Ä¶ two of us couldn‚Äôt stop just on one sandwich! It was just magical! Quality of product and service! We ware mesmerise by Mariano who gave us great tips about Bari! We would definitely back to this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB--d0ld40tMvmkhjkh5LID&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-9-15"},{"Name":"Lieneke Happel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNaP2jbKlSNoWkA1imJjXE887qMJJzWqoujpZd6x3m4WHHHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought a sandwich for my flight in the afternoon, based on the great reviews and was not dissapointed!

Super fresh ingredients, prawns were incredible!

Very friendly service, would have loved to have time to stay for a drink, looked super nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAyisEVYo9uCLP0P2y70LNg&fid=0x0:0x1c635426c0d3d8cd"],"When":"2025-9-28"}]
