user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C√©dric Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf8EDNtMHRjtTYT1iitZ9r809xXrWl6G-8SBUAaxGrROCV8tU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This charming restaurant is located in the old town of Bari, near the sea on a picturesque little street, with a nice and quiet terrace. If you don't mind spicy food, you should definitely try the local specialty, spaghetti all'assassina. All the other dishes we tried we very good too. Top notch, simply one of the best restaurants I've been to in Italy, south of Rome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDykg1QmLrkx1jIP0pn2Vd4&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-12-27"},{"Name":"Damian G√≥recki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjWLDRXc1JuFSMvpNelNtyYTDZLUXwEbiWO7Hy3jWNppmZUNnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is where we had the best dinner during our stay in Bari. Everything was delicious, so good. The biggest surprise was the dish made with rice, potatoes, and shells. So simple, so perfect. Traditional cuisine from Bari is great. I‚Äôm also delighted with the pasta with zucchini, fish, and shrimp, I love these flavors. Add to that fresh sea bream and very good white wine. What more could you want? The restaurant is located on a side street, it has a cozy vibe. Fast and friendly service. You need to make a reservation because it's a popular place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhANE8CFmhbzFteqNmSTxALI&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-9-20"},{"Name":"Karina Aneva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdUuESF_rNCqnnG0bdY7wDTIbZ_A_mpnmAuOm9dPpj0tfc1dpt-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience! The octopus was tender and tasty, the seafood pasta full of flavor and variety, and the tiramisu creamy and delicious. The waiter helped me choose a perfect wine. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC_fiNoVKuPLGUi9EInat5x&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"Larisa Mla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcoHkE_SLCkNLRfOuM1Mw1EGWJfo6xDzHg8BfOdJdYAnzNtn9N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There were options for different dietary preferences, but it‚Äôs a slow dinning experience. We chose different dishes and the waiter warned us they are fully booked and that the food will take about 40 minutes to be served. We ordered some antipasti so that helped as we were quite hungry, but the quality of the food was very good. The house wine was also very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPKugPmI6_a1vAE&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"–°–æ—Ñ—å—è –ö–æ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–≤–∞","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZ8NjXSSSTmGF4BxwX7QpW_-UiH8BCOlGmRnNobcsNwjsMCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a great restaurant with amazing food and welcoming staff. Reserve in advance or come really early - it‚Äôs hard to get a place. Highly recommend Orata fish and Pasta with seafood. Would definetely come one more time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDeefA5q92AyPVgYaObbamn&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-8-24"},{"Name":"Vassal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrw1u27m1PrGIWCy2kK8rPDlo7FbuJ3Qnm8d0pYwe7XpGY4ANklg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding food & service!
Warmly looked after Joe who recommended some local dishes to Bari.
We booked an inside table because of the charm & warm ambience.
Our next booking will be outside for something different & looking forward to trying their mussels in white wine.
One of our favorite thus far.
We ordered the Cozze ripiene as entree to share. Mains were, Cavatelli ai frutti di mare & Polpo arrosto con patate & a house wine.
Perfect meal to end our day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCNRPQBR3ZveHIJEAiVEo6v&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-8-31"},{"Name":"sude","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6srfGUU-eMHrQTCIIq8xMH62guJUf4DA5PkoLlDPy9MeaZOe1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly kind waiting staff, amazing food, best I‚Äôve had in Bari! It was so good we had to go twice during our vacation. The owner, location, house wine, and wine selection was really good, we tried half the menu and everything was great. The deserts were really fresh too. Make sure you make a reservation. The prices are incredibly reasonable. Thank you for a wonderful experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB__9TZ04tQbtK4bZ6-9EZO&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-7-25"},{"Name":"Michael Goff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPe_CYXFa6JhkgRZvc65_utGlEhRIX1yaytBKUK3Ggb8kTHIOk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance and flavors were everything I was waiting for! I ordered the cavatelli ai frutta di mare, and heaven was served. Nestled inside Barivecchia which already spills over romance and adventure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCSiyyyGCRgO_oo-LWct1dV&fid=0x0:0x340a2366db0c0c97"],"When":"2025-11-21"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mateusz Wykrƒôt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWggMbxj9P0Fn9qs1JToc1EU6de4FEU0WdzNgurC3IZ4g-TCVgWAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mr Burrata is definitely a place worth visiting while in Bari! The panini with burrata and various toppings were absolutely delicious ‚Äì fresh ingredients, great flavor combinations, and excellent quality.\n\nThere was quite a long line (we waited almost an hour, probably because it was Christmas Eve), but it was totally worth it. The staff were friendly and efficient despite the rush. A spot that truly lives up to its great reputation!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCZfsRGnftYT0Q8Mwu-a2n9\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Preslav Tsanov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLjZqN9ncZpEPAwTpvD0EkCm0H0xuFPlNkx8pDg123gpRxIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Italian sandwich made with very fresh ingredients. The burrata is truly fresh and creamy, and the cold cuts are sliced on the spot in front of the customers, which really makes a difference. High-quality products, great balance of flavors, and very satisfying. Definitely recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCfyfR2em_H2Tr6SWUuucOx\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Vic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISULX3Mt0HOXWGxaOGEHys0n9MOkmUxokx7h4CHu-oJ9kqlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the real deal!! Fresh made to order panini, meats sliced while you wait, whole burrata in each bun choice of garnishes. Price was very reasonable for the quality. Can't say enough great things. Might have to wait a short while but it's worth every second. I would highly recommend eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_ZEAlq4X4N28KB31_YiH9\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-12-13"},{"Name":"Damian G√≥recki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjWLDRXc1JuFSMvpNelNtyYTDZLUXwEbiWO7Hy3jWNppmZUNnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place. I'm shocked that such a large bun, filled with whatever ingredients you want (ham, vegetables, cheese, pistachios, etc.) and with a huge burrata, costs only 5 euro. It's crazy. It's very cheap and very good. Delicious. The service is friendly and fast. You have to come here when you are in Bari. It's a must!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC1gmq7OGZ9aX6E4Ou2ewjE\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-9-23"},{"Name":"Jakub Dydy≈Ñski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXap7Xe3ICZn2vMRINS7Cy_6jg-mbN5JlpyYNP71eR8AyFTvDqe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It‚Äôs fine for the price and size. Buratta is good. True buratta. Beside that ingredients don‚Äôt match well, but there is a basilico or pistachio sauce on the bottom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAOx11Q734_z1sEKyyffnFN\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"P Glen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0kl0Q-9a-COdRVgFn_ptOTOyYFpEYAelFtQKizBsVihAMiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This might be the best sandwich I‚Äôve ever had. Definitely the best meal I had in Bari. The price was great 5-7 euros depending on the meat selection. Also, they are extremely friendly and clear on the options available and possible selections. This is a must try if you‚Äôre in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdRmX4kqV4pbfiKZG_N1oM\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-9-4"},{"Name":"Natalie Sheldon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Wep6Kwtw2jChkF6SLuXRjaIZC7yGpVtU6VlXOo52HgmhN1Q7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is pure happiness. There is usually a long queue but the guy that prepares the panini is very patient and helpful. You can get the panino with a full burrata and any other ingredients you might want only for 5 euros. The taste was exceptional! I got the panino with burrata, mortadella, pistachio cream, balsamic cream and a bit of Parmesan flakes and it was amazing. Would 100% recommend to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEKyFgtyxusWyhgE\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-5-14"},{"Name":"Dagmara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjRPdpvU-YWI2ZVw3kqQqn_3YHVT7NeWayzPM15GwTYJiFrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most surprising sandwich I‚Äôve ever had ‚Äì absolutely delicious burrata and amazing service! The lady was really kind and explained everything step by step, asking what I‚Äôd like to add. All the ingredients were fresh and healthy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBhTrYpI45GmHzTjDh1aymm\u0026fid=0x0:0x78f9e7e04a22571"],"When":"2025-7-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Zuza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXU1N0_pg6PUNdsmLITlgi8iNdakddj-XWlvonOl2zLwgDmgtFP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant gave us for the beginning of our experience a nice appetizer - colourful and very tasty cheesy little thing.
I ordered the puttanesca spaghetti, which turned out as a really nice salty experience, the burned pasta was just so soft and a little crunchy which made it so fabulous. And for the dessert a mousse from olive oil and pistachios - very nice.
Only one minus - waiters were kinda too pushy with grabbing our plates every possible moment when we might finished something, which I don‚Äôt find attractive, made the meal hasty, but besides that they were very nice to us and concerned about everyone satisfaction.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNXYn3UyqDtevEEj4bfyDs&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-8-29"},{"Name":"Mark LoGiurato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxBY64_wC7TBCXlH972PcMDIc487I-s0yySpIwZ24S6aKw5K22pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cool hip place to get fantastic spaghetti assassin!  It's not for everyone but it definitely has an unusual but good flavor.  We had both the traditional red sauce and the yellow tomato sauce. The yellow was sweeter but just as good as the original. The staff is very friendly with very good service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCPUC2gu_8oBfWidQqro4wO&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-6-25"},{"Name":"Mika Arai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvJGuVp4iHY7FPxtUGTHoPd1fk55OnKmskRP6rWu7FcbNNHjajYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant opened at 7:30pm. We ordered the classic assassineria pasta and pork tacos. Highly recommend if you're visiting Bari!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBwVNAYCpss4i4xg_BRj9dP&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-11-7"},{"Name":"Iulia Stempurszki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDGzivLY5__VPEXsDBf_2I7kyCNIk2N8fCM_iTJtjhvX37ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, i had an issue with my reservation but they still managed to find me a table although without reservation it is impossible to find a table..and yeah, the food it is amazing!! Urban L‚ÄôAssassineria did not disappoint!

Thank you for the warmest welcome, amazing service and incredible quality of food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC3BQLuSTphva329PC3faIJ&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"C J.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx5rgjobko-V1pVYlzFoMl4wjRsTsHgzQSM91AwdPA5ltlag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent pasta, but a couple of the dishes we ordered were far too salty. Try one of the pastas with fresh cheese, as it offset the salt and made for a more enjoyable plate. Overall we liked it, but we weren‚Äôt blown away. I suggest the chef lay off the salt a bit.

Very friendly and efficient service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICXjYOtngE&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Caroline Lima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnfm1lkgpmeR3cyIv-7MNJkhavLJm_wPRmCUmWgGZFletJC2JO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to try spaghetti alla assassina for the first time. It was great! The options of sauces were incredibly diverse and very difficult to choose only one.
Great service. Overall everything was great.
Although, this kind of pasta is not really my cup of tea: the burned spaghetti thingy - but it was very interesting, tasty and worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDI9p_VMA&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-4-9"},{"Name":"Paola Pagano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc4sbgehuxmylHVhrkfc_zR_CdTWRPF8-CSRDtGPsG2R7V0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing culinary experience. Omicidio polposo was a great choice.
If you have it for dinner, I'd recommend having a walk helping to digest before sleeping, not what I did üòÇ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmPdFiUMS72y0_boDsP3hJ&fid=0x0:0x1b6c6524fa57c495"],"When":"2025-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiroshi Imahori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3ZmFvFE-mQp6GQROJjZSJKjXvJU7BkD5A8OyT6MLsKjUMyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I dined alone at this restaurant and ordered spaghetti all‚Äôassassina accompanied by a glass of red wine. The flavor was quite distinctive - an experience that may vary depending on personal taste. The total cost was 30 euros.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBfact9nAVo5YP9pW4oOqr-&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2025-11-21"},{"Name":"Marlene Rusnak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgy65DY59PuSoc07TqPVZ5NLDlMGCgnlWON5FhnNa7iZP-Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved Gola!! It was our go to place when we were staying in Bari. Everything was wonderful from the staff to the creative food menu to the hours which was so convenient for us. Wish we could have taken Gola with us to Rome!ü•∞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA6ktynmQuDrbdVQH67h2kL&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2025-9-18"},{"Name":"Cory Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5Fhaapx8f4_0iT8vyXb_U1-fgueMkHFDxVG6tdzBpYs4zAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One word for this place - amazing!

From the moment you walk in, you feel like part of the family here. The owner and his staff are extremely welcoming and keen to ensure you have a wonderful dining experience!

We had the octopus, caprese salad and salmon to share as starters and all of them were amazing!

For main, we had the famous Puglian spaghetti all‚Äôassasina (even better‚Ä¶ with gluten free pasta)! As a symptomatic coeliac I felt very safe eating here and all of the staff were very knowledgeable about cross contamination!

After travelling throughout Puglia, I can say that you will not find a better spaghetti all‚Äôassasina anywhere else!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAAHZXC-2w2_DHiMPwWz52O&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2025-7-12"},{"Name":"Adriana Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfHRV9oe6hccMG8-zkUxiewDLVl-GjYftlhKYuWoP3i5jBG44p2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a dinner party for my dad's birthday last week here and the quality of the food was beyond spectacular!

Fresh, tasty and very well presented! You can tell they do their job with passion and attention to details!

Being a vegan blogger myself I was very pleasantly impressed about their knowledge about dietary requirements, intolerances and cross-contamination.

I'm definitely going back when in Bari!

You must try their "assassina". It's their signature dish and the best one I've had!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICRi9_72AE&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2023-4-10"},{"Name":"Sara K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOqCizYAGKPaj6pw4E-rgGCSQYF_FmrqoP3JTCr-r_nrbgLNzj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a lovely restaurant! The staff were so kind and the food was just incredible. Seriously, me and my brother agreed that the ‚ÄúPulp Fiction‚Äù was the best octopus we‚Äôve ever had and not to mention it was presented so beautifully!! The pastas were also amazing with freshly made sauce and you could just taste that it was made properly. I recommend coming here especially to try the octopus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC2oYabMQ&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2022-4-22"},{"Name":"muhamad rausyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLhs7npCYofLJFjxLBLiohqzbW_gMppOopJk1BOyiMOLwHIE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a spaghetti with prawn, it appeared delicious to me. The taste is different from what I experienced in my country. The real Italian spaghetti is awesome","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICH-I7rRg&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Yiannis Verginadis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKNkGT-CPDIWb-sXVKAt9AkZ_2rQ9pNuDczNNfQV_f6R_wCEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good restaurant! Big portions and really tasty food! Try the tuna carpaccio! They also offer the homemade chips with BBQ sauce as a starter! The guy who served us was so polite and fast! Don't forget to tip!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICur52VuwE&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2022-8-9"},{"Name":"Matev≈æ Bo≈°nak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLslTIPy58mKtKU-pqpOIOZOcbvkYXX4kl-tuOVTaj-gfWAOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a hamburger, received well done beef patty and a bunch of potatoes... I haven't heard of a burger without a bun...
Bottled water was served although we didn't order one and was included in the bill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICHwuGjWw&fid=0x0:0x3f11c7257f9f5ced"],"When":"2024-9-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_DCGmCFcKV9mp0MTFmgDUEB94znBAdb_3er6SG5i662DYnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this restaurant on New Year‚Äôs Eve and had a very pleasant experience. The menu was standard, which gave us the freedom to choose what we wanted. Prices were very good, especially considering the occasion.
The food was excellent, in particular the beef steak, which was cooked perfectly and full of flavor. Overall, great value for money and a nice atmosphere for New Year‚Äôs Eve. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDWteqPo1UzYAj8fXJXvsF8&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Kristi Giannotta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfwmrgCDxEP8pNHktDQlOaenfUHV98F-tcFp38VoQg55em=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here on 3 different occasions while visiting Bari. Our hotel recommended this place and we were blown away with the quality of the meat and the upbeat service in the garden area! We had the best sausages, homemade desserts and even the digestivi was top quality! We HAD to come back for their hamburgers the next night!! Bravo üëè  We also spent our last night in Italy at this restaurant. Antonio was a pleasure every time. We will visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2arbqn-1DdGxnLuJfz5lC&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Patty Chafatelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0_Be8KZNgPdIxzgSRZeoAu_H00L_sMPaFUE7AP5kojSzjS9E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mixed meat plate was delicious. I think the most exquisite part was the hot sausage it‚Äôs made in house and it is superior in flavor and texture! Make sure you order the grilled vegetables they are magnificent! But the highlight of the meal was an absolutely magnificent creamy, sultry and delicious. Don‚Äôt leave the restaurant without ordering this! Sorry I was so involved in enjoying it. I forgot to take a picture of it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC5TmAUzQmbtkKNDpqIIMiZ&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"Yu Suet Ying","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw65oDFn_vxTp2esoRK5i6yqPMP-pk-qY8JxRuFU8pmPm_iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is tasteful and the service is very good.  The staff are very passionate about making customers satisfied.  Zoya served us very well and seated us in the garden area. Thanks and we enjoyed dining there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC3fWF40lCIJnvjVzQqJY0C&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-6-21"},{"Name":"Ema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQwR5_LvhASNF_qVhPVN6i0FPlU5uepFjiEsTJ2BL391kSKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is located in very city centre of Bari, it‚Äôs a steakhouse and also a pizzeria serving Bari-style pizza. The pizza is very tasty and proposed with gourmet recipes, including fresh sausages. The meat is very good and well dry aged, deserving the experience. There is a very good selection of beers and wines. The service is quick and kind, the price is convenient. Perfect for dinner out with family and friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwyYX9Fw&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-3-26"},{"Name":"Komlos Albert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz_lb2v3EhuU76sjLiqKGwwelSOz6j-ao6-oSH3F2pzqU60Yy8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was good but nothing special nor outstanding, average by Italian standards. Service but not personal, they were in a rush. The waitresses were not so talktive when asking questions about the food. The waiter guy was cool tho, when he came he explained the details and offered home made limoncello.

The table we had should be fixed, it almost collapsed. They forgot to apply the discount from Fork, had to ask for it.

Very reasonably prices place but there are better steak places in town","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"toshkandi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTssZ_bTdDBWQJO27FjardaSXdK6N2vcpUQKhzc07R17oQGco=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent, fantastic, memorable and unique experience! Niko - the manager, he is an extremely warm person, with an incredible heart! He makes the entire evening unforgettable. The food is excellent - meat is top level, the desserts are amazing. Niko gives you suggestions, recommendation, he makes the food more tasty! We were a loud group of 9 people, but he knows how to handle customers and to provide an unique atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCggez_KA&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-2-17"},{"Name":"Nick M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdVJKNHFjTukpwYSW0mKTIaPgwcDUzZAU85QNBub2TF5uOJGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The owner was a bit too much for my taste, very cocky and macho. The food was decent but nothing outstanding. The hamburger was not raw but blue, I asked for it to be done better. Very loud place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJ3Ly5b3ro6RKg&fid=0x0:0x557c243a3fa24dcd"],"When":"2025-6-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cristina Plaza Fern√°ndez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuPZZLEh9-Ml4s49NDUGFUA8ruQ9nmrHmclYgeGnI4mbPQcz7l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fascinating Caf√© in Athens for books lovers. Mindful service.
The Matcha here is too sweet, so we didn‚Äôt like it, however the coffee and the yogurt was tasty. And the sandwich looked yummy.
There is a limit to stay (2h).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8uD85J-PqvKxa9vkDEb2r&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Min","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsztzrZ2UiDtsY3BMs5zBf6QkpJuUezImtoxZl_UCEVIGDW_0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the carrot cake, rooibos tea, and mosaic, and everything was good! The mosaic is quite sweet, though, so if you prefer something lighter, you might want to try another dessert. The atmosphere is calm and relaxing, with books around and a cozy vibe that makes it a great spot to unwind. It‚Äôs perfect for small groups, but larger parties might have trouble finding a seat. Also, try to visit early if you want to grab one of their croissants!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmV7uibu6Ub3cFEYanU2gp&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"Hovus Beefington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3d7Ti82eXPIQr7kBqrgphMaeZayJabGtuYIoXRMs7sF8JS7U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great vibe going on with the books. Loved the service and extra biscuit on the side along with the latte art. Thing is, the coffee was a little lukewarm. This is easy to fix - the person can simply put boiling water in the cup to heat it up before adding the coffee. Next time i come athens i will get the coffee and will taste the difference! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB65WVAyRxXwqLzJGBkvCFu&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Miki Red","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6rTBQMS8hTWsozX8XsLuEoNsP6l-vZTpVytV3X3X3ig9Lrzxk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the pleasant, cozy atmosphere among the books, where you can chat peacefully and enjoy delicious coffee.
What‚Äôs a bit annoying is that cigarette smoke from the street sometimes drifts inside and creates an unpleasant smell. But this is Greece, and it‚Äôs rare to find a place completely free of tobacco smoke here.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcq8Mbgi0XBFaZBoXZwQIk&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-10-14"},{"Name":"AB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed this place, especially the setup and outdoor seating. The bookstore has a wonderful selection of books in both English and Greek. I had a matcha, which I did not expect to enjoy as much as I did. It was much better than I thought and I would definitely go back for it. It is not ceremonial grade but it is the best I have had in an area not known for matcha and when the colour is not a prominent green. My partner also really liked his coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCYVqpOGItp_84EvO9ovwoe&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-9-10"},{"Name":"ernie jillson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsqFzIuTNNe8Dh6OJeqqEQXehAgX7QpBdpo5y1WWeb0fBmETuH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped  in for an evening coffee and a little bite while visiting Athens. The Atmosphere was really cool book shop relaxing and quiet. Coffee and food was great and affordable, our server  Nicko was excellent. If in Athens stop in and enjoy the view","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCsepmQQM09aghLMu5Rg3Kj&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Angela Nathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWExVNihloH5lr2eexlMWv6rfSWIIvWWI2XUNFoacwpbfKMKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Is Little Tree a bookstore with a caf√©, or a caf√© that happens to sell books? Hard to tell, and that‚Äôs part of its charm. The boundaries blur here: the street drifts in, and the caf√© spills out, echoing Athens‚Äô love of thresholds that merge public and private space.

Recommended by our host, Little Tree was the perfect place to pause near the Acropolis for our family holiday: local, shaded, unhurried. We were seated at the built-in window seat, half inside, half out, ideal for sipping a cappuccino and watching the city go by.

Excellent coffee, fresh orange juice, yummy sandwiches, and shelves of books to browse. What‚Äôs not to love? üåø‚òïüìö","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCDLNbRkqx1_UAEucjKmGI9&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"Corey Barnard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPFjYQeqyYJUhXu2tcC9o9nR6eHoRVk2eY1xF36k7CI_5G4ec4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an absolutely amazing breakfast here! They serve turkey sandwiches and pastrami sandwiches as well as Greek yogurt bowls with granola and fresh fruits

They do not have egg sandwich options if that is what you are looking for. They have fresh juice and delicious drinks as well.

The seating area was incredibly pleasant and very clean, we really enjoyed our time here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAb21UopszL-kYrUr00mZs3&fid=0x0:0x54f8ff37020d4f3a"],"When":"2025-6-21"}]

[{"Name":"Alexa Zdanevych","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNgTYV8jSM7INesLrI89HCDzg_tCznVXajvz8H-cK-uD58eVpr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of all the places we tried coffee, this one is definitely among the best! The coffee is rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced ‚Äî I had a double cappuccino, and it was amazing.
The staff is super friendly and welcoming, and the overall atmosphere makes you want to stay a bit longer. If you sit on the terrace, there‚Äôs a small extra charge (+‚Ç¨0.30), but it‚Äôs totally worth it for the view and the vibe.
it‚Äôs self-service: when your order is ready, you‚Äôll get a notification beep and then go inside to pick up your tray.

Highly recommend this spot if you appreciate good coffee and cozy caf√©s with great service! ‚òï‚ú®","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAETqiugqfeeIexoJl-ASrp&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-10-14"},{"Name":"m31t4r","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUi3365m8tUA21AAHNRvj-6Z-cF5qBlOlwR4-3P1AXC4d4cL8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great caf√©! The coffee‚Äôs rich, the desserts are light and delicious, and the staff is super friendly. Got there by accident, but had such nice time I had to come back once more. Would definitely recommend going (& trying the banana bread), and I can‚Äôt wait to visit again üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCSMdzkjsSrzNqzqUFYNDpG&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-11-27"},{"Name":"JohnTsikoudakis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuZ3Qc3NTkvDTlxSNrx4-401INTjhfStNAqf6vDbxLn9yN9h0M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool, contemporary, no fuzz, no much interaction. Just great coffee on a great spot.
Its all about great coffee after all isn‚Äôt it?
Cold brew stood out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCsYNXW2gdyFH60ZVCbh7-S&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"Chris Kendall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFljxWMRJYwJaS0Ff6AGUEo8gMw97FI0_2dHGalCq_IctsbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great local coffee shop! Come in and get a double latte!
Smooth flavor, no sugar needed.
This is what coffee is supposed to taste like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDImeQ0SSwmK4CQWes9rCzb&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-11-24"},{"Name":"Daniel Rueda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBtXxnb3BOTWCUk717oVGgPAddGsNbxQzVBQ_CxJScRAp-IgBt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee shops is chic, a bench sitting area inside. It has plenty of sitting outdoors with shade. So great for hot summers in Athens. The freddo cappuccino with oat milk was very bold and smooth. It‚Äôs a cool vibe with great coffee. I recommend to hang with friends! It‚Äôs a great place to catch up with someone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBbpoduMJuHnRQN4zkhNYlu&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-6-24"},{"Name":"Ella Cranston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIavMD7fhhkyXcHjVPjH46AXbp9ObOMe-SWzhFuSyNEAX1WbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place.  Came here a few times for coffee and was never disappointed.  The staff is lovely, the coffee is delicious, and the environment is great and very welcoming.  Despite it being busy at certain times, the staff is always on top of it and very fast.  Things are also at a very reasonable price :).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAbhEp2C5XIJ2fH67jP0wAv&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-8-2"},{"Name":"Dat L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ37Q9mn4Q5zEWuVgyWpr721Tf1WUoz_ChUnGa0lUMx4pYXPp8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not my favorite coffee. Wasn‚Äôt very tasty to me but the ambiance is nice. It‚Äôs definitely an area where you lounge, relax and have a cup of coffee. They do charge you extra if you plan on enjoying your coffee there as opposed to take away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpSzHUlUiuhYhksj3jjrYT&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2025-9-20"},{"Name":"Yuhng Yeap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1ly4jQkN0eNplOB-cw7hTivV98Nlrh9w7Dlc3McOtciQMi6lc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely one of the best lattes I had in my life. It had a nice mild sweetness to it that I absolutely loved, the texture is also very smooth too. I also got their amazing brownie, not too sweet with a strong chocolate flavor, I definitely recommend it.

The shop is pretty small, but have a big outdoor seating area. The staff are very nice too, they helped me reserve a seating when they saw I was struggling to find a seat in the packed caf√© after getting my food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDvwIfRHA&fid=0x0:0x5f0498b540d79282"],"When":"2024-12-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria Zeee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxV7u7f_CEyxOQbC8qPVk0Nx9w-E4S_sBX9O-SMAi41bRFd8nPxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place, except the cats üêà since I am allergic to them. But the owners and servers are super nice in giving me their spots to let me sit where cats won't bother me.
The Greek salad is the freshest and best o ever had. What a great way to welcome a first  timer to Athens.
Hangout here for hours till my friends showed up to join me.
Very relaxing. Exactly what I needed after long day bus ride from Albania.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXD5RHjU3jr_HHSv3bfJDm&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"markos paterakis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_hkBJZBOS7dT6vZUp5qixm8WyJB3SdnllMLAeVOjHJnFvMiEu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Laluk is a lovely spot in Athens! It‚Äôs in a really nice location ‚Äî perfect for relaxing any time of day. The atmosphere has great vibes, cozy yet lively, and it‚Äôs the kind of place where you instantly feel comfortable. The prices are very reasonable, especially considering the quality, and the staff are always kind and welcoming. Whether you stop by for a coffee, a drink, or just to hang out with friends, Laluk never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAXohLu1hXmLEmzppaZQaU4&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Julia Matyszczak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlhiCdzbPqfvW8sV8VGPx5uNOLBv84s9MvgP9iM9wFR-yX2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely adore this place. A few sleeping cats surrounding us while we were eating - so cute. I had a vegetarian but GREEK! option - a chickpea salad. It was fresh and tasty. I can 100% recommend.
Also, we were mistaken as Greeks which is honestly so nice - we are from Poland.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB6mnt4DdzQEGMCgkQxTpJz&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Brandon J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw20x7XWdWUgID6LwBFdOSmohfTnQHFXGXbUu9ZzCZnFn9NHI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The reviews are true. Everything about this place is amazing. We are already excited to come back and try more. The portions are on the large side so you will leave very satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCJEdtu8E2HoaDABtlW7lFP&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2026-1-23"},{"Name":"Louise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVETvD2voGzKdi7mqNdZoDAPdhDfd_fpQUZtvLhC5JFE4P1-NyZ7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great relatively large bar easily seating 50+ people with ample room for kids to also play upstairs.
STAFF: Efficient and friendly to the locals many of which they seem to know. Food and drinks came out quickly.
MENU: A variety of burgers, meats, vegan meals, salads etc.
ACCESSIBILITY: Although you could easily sit outside with your dog, fit a pram or walker...The toilets are located up stairs.
OVERALL: I chose it for it's comfortable lounge chairs out the front, was humbled to have the cat share it's space with me and found the prices very reasonable.
Meals between ‚Ç¨5-15 on average.
Would recommend overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCBX68tS45kqyX4diH5JLwh&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2025-8-8"},{"Name":"Denis Anywhere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3n3hK-nNw5exyrmWuicJad5VpHfVtjDhaTaQYyuCCR8OGbV0olA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely lovely place. It‚Äôs small and cozy, tucked away on a quiet walking street with lots of greenery around. The staff are really nice and attentive. They have a decent selection of food, everything we tried was tasty and felt fresh and nutritious. Coffee was great too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCadIz7fomEifZVMtO6YM-M&fid=0x0:0x3dbe66dd6feca19b"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Noah Riley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPSifQzSfwnehAeAgaWSqRM_eA4TvP5Sp57J8ZZCr44RGLCL2amQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in Greece, and we stumbled upon this adorable restaurant where Artemis greeted us with such kindness. Her warm hospitality made us want to dine in right away. The food was incredible, the service was amazing, and the atmosphere was perfect. If you want a place to enjoy a glass of wine and soak in the Athens nightlife, this is it. Highly recommend ‚Äî I‚Äôll be coming back throughout my stay!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lyn Cowan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZKDbHBKh2VJOWA_Dmbfg3jBlpuI3liEcytsME_7Yl2iZxsW_0ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We feel very fortunate to have stumbled on Laluk‚Äôs! Alex , Alex & Billi made us feel right at home from the moment we arrived for an ouzo and a bite to eat. We ended up going there every day of our stay in Athens. Food delicious and customer service exceptional. We loved it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marko Seprak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuUjZuaVFm-wN67MEbbzkVe82W4RZBr_IvQ_LkAhco2SjUOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here was genuinely great. They had the feta one, the beef one, and the tomato‚Äìolive‚Äìfeta combo, and every single one of these hit hard. What really sold me was that they make everything with real olive oil instead of the usual cheap sunflower nonsense you get in the majority of the bakeries out there. Quality ingredients, clean taste and olive oil.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCPPcWaa8VfltxOr7hpd9Bd&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Alyssa McLaren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP4al61KZFzlVSp9zzba-cq94LYyn2hT_h_tlj_6VcrlIgW6nI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our very first stop after landing in Greece, and it did not disappoint. We were treated like royalty and served the most delicious spanakopita I have ever had, along with complimentary bougatsa.

The coffees were incredible, and the service was outstanding from start to finish. The experience truly set the bar high for the rest of our trip.

I would highly recommend visiting this caf√©.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDnPy7Nx-f9GjU44Fj5jtf1&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-8-28"},{"Name":"Travel MacDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJmM3FRYOBMucvuWQ_P8uqZc52EeTLcHWKq9KzS-BJb7ZIWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the spanikopita spinach pie Nov 6 when I arrived in Athens.  It was fantastic.  So flaky.  I tried spanikopita 5 more times in Naxos and Santorini and none were close.  I fly home tomorrow but had to make one last stop here.  If you have it here you will be disappointed with any others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChRj5_vIIskOIxeIXj4VK7&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Emily Yamamoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3WW4j5d84_zmMtP2vndO2YPr92KXVbsTAoqfVryJw9Gb3S6TQtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come here and eat the best Spanikopita, Bougatsa, Feta Pie and Coffee you'll eat in Athens. Came here as I was intrigued this was a stop on many food tours and ate here twice in 2.5 days. I see why it's part of a foodie tour!

The phyllo is hand-made, incredible and what makes this the best in town.  Crisp and shatter thin but not delicate where it flakes apart. Not greasy. Not soft and croissant like. The right ratio of spinach, feta and herbs. The Bougatsa is great as well. It comes out of a heated display case piping hot and he'll cut it for you if you eat it there. We bought one to go and carried it to the airport. Three hours later it was still warm with the crispy phyllo!

The coffees are excellent and his cappuccino is the best we've had as well. Super smooth, creamy and not bitter.

The owner is friendly and warm. The second time we came, he wished my husband a good day and patted him on the arm in such a nice way.

There are three bakeries just a couple of doors away from each other on this street. This is the smallest and so low key that you might walk past it but this is the best one.

Just walk on up from Monastiriki Square or down from the Central market and you'll find him. Gray walls and small display case. Three doors from Creme Royale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDI1_UpxlVON32mng8C-nVJ&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"Aurena Agathe Fohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFKvw3oweoQD4ETLSOHe_ROuqFImmgl2EjaGs1ns5ZoxjMAvow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried so many spinach pie and here its the most authentic and tasty FRESH !!! EVER !!!! must eat and enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCVhj-olCmnaUZT9YpFHbEB&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Joseph Stazzone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhyZBnqVpYKo2NtJZnZQa7DR995vun0IQG-N6jrsrEYbwImQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic street pies. Fast and a great price, but fantastic quality. The vegetable pie was my favorite.. tomatoes, olives, feta and soft ricotta like cheese, flaky crust.

Enjoy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aris de Juan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgI1UPwuPCJ_7GJT06v3yLKFubJEm1m0PE-p88MrFYtO7eVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place and incredible food. The traditional feta and feta with spinach were amazing. The owner is very nice. 100% recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDTO17AKNePjQGUAgCOAlZn&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-8-21"},{"Name":"Aveva Alemayo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwGGB-w9_WD1dsAsVm25nPEUUbST8Yxm0lOjoHJjOL2bkB6BhWVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not only the best greek pai in athens, but also the best Coffee!!
Such a gem üíé
Authentic food, great service. I‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBD_3wsXgq7hJp-R0r3Ay0N&fid=0x0:0xeb524b482c97da5d"],"When":"2025-8-24"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Christine Gilman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMf4S_aYVM1outbPtQjllM0XMox6NZZNfDAwm7dfZxMNx-GWMz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to this adorable restaurant as recommendation from our driver. What a pleasant suggestion. Our taste buds were awaken with wonderful dishes. The salad was so fresh. The Greek sausage for starters was amazing. The fried Halloumi cheese with an outstanding lemon marmalade. Fantastic place. Thank you for the amazing experience in Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAZsm_LB9FqpjfB02OnbKeL\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Eva Pag√©s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqyvUBt5xfI0HuQMq_6RmmKYWlJQayrCeP_mlnV74GuP0oDuU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped here for a coffee after visiting the Acropolis. It‚Äôs a peaceful caf√© on a quiet pedestrian street in Plaka, very close to Anafiotika. I only had a drink, but the desserts that passed by looked delicious. The atmosphere was nice and relaxing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDo0zP6VwfV0WUFUmyZwkVS\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Kim Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCfP3yqj_4h_CtDkjDAywWakM0Pwxsjuhi8B9FWw0mgktsG8Ft=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were served generous portions of everything we ordered, and the baklava was especially delicious paired with Greek coffee. We were the first to arrive and dine, which made the atmosphere calm and peaceful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhABGnup8HtMpvXpxz-nLacI\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Enrica Quartini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt255fTHOeZXflgpkxB-XbctkiIocAwlHQYQUKisq3LhPCn8ev=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere with both indoor and outdoor seating, and very tasty food. I had the lemon pie and the yogurt with honey, and would recommend both. The lemon pie has a crisp crust, tangy lemon custard, and a soft meringue on top. The yogurt was thick and creamy, paired perfectly with rich honey. A great place to enjoy a treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7C6Kxb2yq8SXf_RvYTQH_\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"A.L. Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkZYy3B8cI_LIjcprUqLfo2w7dl_zufsBQYugxI7ey-LXS3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place right on the street.  Food was good and drinks were good too. We came twice while we were in town.  If you‚Äôre using Bounce luggage storage this is where you go.  No signs but they do store the luggage and you can get a good meal, snack, drink or both.  Great service and great food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBAQ4iTrrkoZm7B1sRu3Pf9\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Burak Karaosmanoglu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbsIUoYXzj3D_Dwz66eScw8Pz01_s7nZ0FO7Bq_l6_HwHMyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance and drinks were absolutely wonderful, and we ended up coming here every single day of our holiday. It truly felt like a place to relax and unwind for us. The service was outstanding, the staff were always attentive. A special thank you goes to Christos for his excellent hospitality. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCl_8b_a3kEyiZPEvp4Jq3S\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"Arzu Aktayli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfck9Jc-x_5kLjiuz2tusCFGp4S530_E61yuBKebXa60viNnMqQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely caf√® in Plaka, very beautifully decorated, inside of the caf√®, you can see pictures of Melina Mercouri, located in a nice street, lovely ambiance ‚ô•Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1wp7FC8O-lT3Cs1-oFpXZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-11-11"},{"Name":"Maribel Aristy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxQAIQzZgtyNKD2CJWI-Wa5P2lSlkiRGBF-G64ZiSt_SOtlTAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely exceptional. From the moment we walked in, the service was warm and attentive. Every dish was perfectly executed. Fresh ingredients, bold flavors, and beautiful presentation. The ambiance was elegant yet relaxed, making it a perfect spot for a special evening. Highly recommend. We‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCI5Yy_mQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x14836a7f84584371"],"When":"2025-4-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rosella Rojas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhm1gyeniiEyZYuLlB2Oa5cZwR8kNG7m1PyeaMIc4lU86tgyTE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to come to Cat Cafe Athens since the first day I was in Athens and when I finally did I wasn't disappointed at all. We arrived right before 5pm and most of the cats were super active and playful. The place is big enough, clean and not noisy so the cats are comfortable enough all over the place. I loved them all! Food was warm and nice. The stuff very friendly and welcoming. I definitely recommend this place if you are in Athens and are crazy about cats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAWeHMZ71W5CE58OzXFbWug&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Drew Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBXP3uObGJIHZc9zNe4IWEQUsfihtDJ_xnR-Ere3w99gctMQ-l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely experience.
This is the best cat cafe we have ever visited. We arrived about 13.15 on a Friday afternoon, the place wasn't busy but wasn't quiet either. The staff were very friendly and welcoming. The food is pretty good also.
But, of course, the star attractions are the cats. There are plenty of them here and they are all rescued and up for adoption. They are energetic and gregarious, we had a great hour or so as guests in their world.
Can't recommend this place enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoIiM-QoQPvuThsRSnCqoZ&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-8-29"},{"Name":"Ana Rico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUljGijZHd8DahSn_jgJzGweQ0WzOrDC8Zx2LZl5MBOVU5eJu1ITg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an absolutely wonderful time here! It's clear that the owner has poured her heart and soul into creating a beautiful, welcoming space for both people and cats. She was incredibly kind, and her dedication to the cats' well-being shines through in every detail.
And speaking of the cats, they are all amazing! I was completely captivated by Luna, a sweet, orange blind cat. Despite her challenges, she is full of love and is such a gentle soul. She totally stole my heart!
If you're a cat lover, you simply must visit. You'll leave with a full heart and a smile on your face. I can't wait to go back!

Love from Portugal! üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoEcmLDHU8weuiU2-kSNEj&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-8-8"},{"Name":"Panagiotis Kpz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAd1nSX51_CrqKp22PGpA-VS-bcmtSzp3XPCGsc6JFMHeSCRYxqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple and lovely space with lots of cute cats (duh!). I had a snack and a drink, although I had to fight with a needy cat, but that's why we love them! The staff is friendly and I could tell they love their unemployed tenants. The place also offers adoption and they have given away lots of cats to their forever home so, go ahead and support them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAxU7sXt3kivxH4xwgCbv5x&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-9-4"},{"Name":"Carrie Kimberley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBikxWVuzKv7heQVVYg85rwxY5NV2nCMNx6K6rprsRDt_2SGxa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cat lover's ideal spot! Clean, welcoming, and full of a wide variety of kitties (various ages, sizes, colors, etc.). I was sitting at a table reading the menu, and not even ten minutes later, a white and black kitten jumped up onto my lap and curled up for a snooze. It's the best feeling when you're missing your own kitties and get chosen as a kitty nap spot on your holiday adventure. üòª I had a yummy iced latte, and there's a ton of other drink and snack options in their menu. Highly recommend if you're in Athens and want a kitty fix!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCNM1lw2ezZb9386ij6NPYr&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"Oiiister","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWULj_gZ4h6VjOMC25cw9vwGLqMthy2hTaPSLKCTRfQ7QdUXYi2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was amazing, such a positive experience, it means a lot to be in a cat cafe that treats their cats well and also prioritizes adoption over display. Its like a home for the cats, and not a cat zoo.
It's a beautiful place that has a lot of heart put into it, and the food is great too.
Truly made my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD0woqok4IboRyUUP9rALEk&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Sarah Baumann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5kIIQEgbrZ7PA02ZgpwyxqJqS7FB0UoEMGPGL1bLefaguMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely charming spot! The moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted by the smell of fresh coffee and the soft purring of friendly cats lounging everywhere. The staff clearly care about both the cats and the guests, making sure everyone feels relaxed and safe. Whether you‚Äôre there to unwind, read, or just enjoy some feline company, this cafe hits all the right notes. A must-visit for cat lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC69JMsVuI5LZJRtDg-arGj&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Bal√°zs Horv√°th","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLets6PvgiLhMQBC5_2ZCWffxN4jVqE15feaZYobaHakd6fVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cozy place with friendly cats and delicious desserts‚Äîthe lava cake was amazing! That said, Athens itself is full of sweet street cats, so you‚Äôll meet plenty just walking around the city. Still, worth a visit if you love cats and want a relaxing spot. Also, making a reservation guarantees that you can get in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClzUXIrT5UXbKzrp8_-dI6&fid=0x0:0x1ae0467c75941e19"],"When":"2025-8-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adrian Geva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWJpuSoPPdu7N3E9VakBHShRkNAggcmRZL6SeORPrJ0qT5CJOpeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to Taf by a friends recommendation, and now i'm happy to recommend it to others as well !
No big fuss - prefect coffee in a small funky place. You don't need more than that. Try watching them make the coffee - they treat it as art and it taste accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2vZSeehgd0r4OkDqAwjIM&fid=0x0:0xd9bd84c06beb0e11"],"When":"2025-12-8"},{"Name":"Viale M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1fZt7b-WG0GIpQeuoB2NMU8F7uYMrYq0RGj0FOC2trwmywQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"**Have a cup, but leave the beans on the shelf.**

Taf Coffee seems to be suffering from an identity crisis. As a coffee shop, it is undistinguished from hundreds of others in Athens: pleasant, cozy, and enveloped in cigarette smoke.

As a roastery, it offers a staggering selection of coffee, predominantly from the Americas with a minority from Ethiopia. However, there is virtually nothing from Asia‚Äîno Indonesia (not even Java), no Vietnam, and none of the glorious coffee of India. This geographical gap could be excused if the American selection were consistently exceptional. Unfortunately, the sheer breadth of the selection results in a mixed experience. The flavor profiles are hard to decipher, with adjectives that seem drawn from the wild imagination of the roaster on any given day.

The staff, hurried by customers waiting for their espresso, was unhelpful and could offer little in the way of guidance or advice regarding the beans. To make matters worse, prices are exceptionally high, ranging from ‚Ç¨50 to ‚Ç¨150 per kilogram. At this price level, experimentation becomes very expensive, very quickly. Our best advice: come here for a cup of coffee, but leave the beans on the shelves.

As ordinary consumers, we are not paid or compensated in any way for this review. We aim to provide fair and reliable feedback for fellow coffee enthusiasts.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine McCandless","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO554ooplZuD3Uu-7d70GAvVOOV7Q8hUVT9bkofFxH5yLMMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious coffee! We bought some beans as a souvenir from Athens and have been enjoying them back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC3hKurxUdg8ybl7WbKTm-i&fid=0x0:0xd9bd84c06beb0e11"],"When":"2025-9-29"},{"Name":"Ross Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRkoruApuBXYILq_m0-ajxjNDKONfNivyOx72DTOb94wKIMuo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, great options and one of the best iced coffees I had in Athens. Chocolate swirl muffin was one of the tastiest treats I had in Athens too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmHKaYyUeINcxkFxZyRZrC&fid=0x0:0xd9bd84c06beb0e11"],"When":"2025-8-11"},{"Name":"K. S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNhzH61WEAMyWDlNcx2ad1TOLh3fjCmaEyem9aMj5qcUkOBpft=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal. Kind and knowledgeable staff. Amazing freddo. One of the best coffees I've ever had. They also freeze servings of their single origins, which I haven't seen before in my travels, and greatly appreciated the dedication to the craft. Closest I'll more than likely ever come to having coffee that fresh. A must visit for enthusiasts.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saleh Trips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2w_3PkrSu4SE-XD-HDsZ6FAYR1lghSfc23aSlPMDsVJJIbKuzOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best specialty coffee shops I‚Äôve tried. The flavor is rich, the quality is top-notch, and the baristas are skilled and friendly. Every cup is brewed with attention to detail. The place is simple yet elegant, comfortable for sitting or just taking away. Prices are fair for the quality. Does it deserve another visit? ‚úÖ Yes, absolutely."","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Bagley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGyPuXFDCbLYJcoP_NF4SZnF53nOYzAsfRVJwLNcjP4a5oGTwY0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The nerdiest coffee shop I‚Äôve ever visited. The attention to detail. The beans. The test tubes. The awards. This shop wins. üèÜü•á

Don‚Äôt walk. Run here.

If you are a coffee geek, this coffee shop will out geek your geekiness. You think you know ratios? This place will ratio you back to when you still drank instant coffee from a tin. üòÜ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBo9DtdVettvCbl-GSE5eny&fid=0x0:0xd9bd84c06beb0e11"],"When":"2025-6-27"},{"Name":"Miguel Martins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE8oFmG2qzUctg74M43VXSUeHgYNkFdM_JIBoonyZsw6TRLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful place with some of the best coffee I've ever had. The cinnamon roll was also incredible! They have a great offer of coffee (beans and already grinded) and I even brought one bag of coffee beans - with a great assistance from the owner (I assume) - to try at home and I shouldn't have, because it was amazing and now I can't have any more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaqaSQigK1oluhuMq9K8YC&fid=0x0:0xd9bd84c06beb0e11"],"When":"2025-7-15"}]

[{"Name":"ERIK LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTS_UQOo7sqL3TdQ7mBqNcqxFGbBBPYFiHklNWO2ADQuDJKBOdow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is simply fantastic.
The service, how can one put it? It's like you are back home with your favourite uncles and aunty.
AND... They do proper Greek coffee. It was our last breakfast in Greece, and they did an excellent job of completing our fond memories of Greece.
Oh, and their mixed juice is worth trying. One can add water and still enjoy a good taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDMgnbuF3rS2RsJLzt_b-6B&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Kary Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqTAZvna55o_3MHDcOXtbVT5H8XU6818TJ3PePE5EVENnvSaj_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came because we saw the recommendations of friends, and we were not let down! The owners were super friendly and we were welcomed with water and bread. We ordered the tastiest Greek yoghurt with a variety of fruits and huge omelettes . The wall behind us told us people from all around the world are happy and so are we!üòò","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_xpPa22sJD4miOpwv0W_Z&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Julissa Lule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH904EBLRhMTGyGdUnp9mYuCGC50UZllIJCC1S9XF7veJw6C4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went in the summer and visited Greece for three days. I loved this place. Absolutely excellent customer service, super friendly. I had seven family members with me, and they made sure to take care of all of us and seat us all together. I tried Greek coffee, which is kinda like an espresso, and it definitely woke me up. I also had one of their club sandwiches, which was one of the best sandwiches I‚Äôve ever had, and their smoothies are amazing. I would definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCsGZG3wMns1Iubv-MOYEUl&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Adam Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNjnvRxAG2VFPygquVDeOBpNcWlUnDgTVTmWWg82hBcgKVRPc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing <3 Just down the road from our BnB. They were wonderful. They made our Breaky and sent us with a packed lunch and advice or tips for our day! All the pastries were made in house, croissants in every flavor ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC5DO5cr1jPD5MjKmkrehUp&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Laura Whetsel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR8NLrWVUBOpmQrxZm-Xb_FGJBQ5bXgU9RskRgql1HhjK1XFd_Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you are blessed to walk in the most amazing restaurant, the food was amazing and the best latte we ever had, seriously. What makes The Coffee Joint  Amazing are the hosts Wow! They the kindness people. We ate breakfast and lunch 5 star","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAoV5af73VzsFVMYgIBANoD&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-9-13"},{"Name":"David Seligson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZadY7v8KxRh1mZWgxn3uhd5AOmd4jt0MOUQ0zyYArfluPJXsUNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed a delicious fredo cappuccino at a table outside this nice cafe. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. They have a great display of thank you messages from customers who traveled from many different countries. Great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAboDs6I-B2fFjHRAgx7zEM&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-9-15"},{"Name":"SB P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4RZAnPP8ck2nybWWY7wA8Jw80z5aBn2M3thw1AeXQOgZVvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are so loving, kind and welcoming! This morning we got some coffee on the go and the lady gave us a sesame bread ring to try, which was delicious! The coffee was perfect, not bitter. On our way home, we got some smoothies, which were so tasty and refreshing and again, the lady came out to give us some bottled water. The staff and owners should be really proud of themselves because this Is exactly how cafes and restaurants should be, run by people who are genuinely happy to serve customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCJE1r5f4rR5EjzFA8MbDJy&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Vinny Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHouBSMt0dmzqfUxMzCpLwWiEXoMjAR3eszK8vBUjabpp30Zj7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coming from NY these are the nicest people I‚Äôve ever met. The service is outstanding, the food was delicious and very affordable. We got the waffle ice cream, smoothie with honey and a pastry. They gave us complementary bottled water and smiles all around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcaBD-bHLCkBVY3Slwxx7w&fid=0x0:0x26f84d5db75e5333"],"When":"2025-8-26"}]

I loved everything I tried, but the banana bread was a standout - a perfect texture and an amazing balance between banana and chocolate (it‚Äôs also vegan!). It has few seats inside but has three tables outside. The prices are not the most inviting, but the portions are quite large and, most importantly, very tasty. The cappuccino was also not too strong, which is my personal preference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBhE4F3cDqNapPIT5K1ro09\u0026fid=0x0:0x8dd43154848b8986"],"When":"2025-9-18"},{"Name":"Marisa Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJ2If6fcRATEEUciT_OMlndmJj403dY-_RzqYbJh6guLahPqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Primarily outdoor seating. The croissants ü•ê were perfection ‚Äî fresh, flaky, and the chocolate ones melted in our mouths. Staff were wonderfully kind and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBmJs2MqqJ7rEx5vYtiR6GB\u0026fid=0x0:0x8dd43154848b8986"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"≈ûahin Aydƒ±n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKC6YgkQu4Yxjnuqw-m_MPewG6Y6OPYR7wTpsmE2Qe3c1Wh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a croissant chef, I can say this: it was truly delicious, and the coffee was wonderful too. Congratulations to the chef and his team. They were very kind. Thank you so much, Fika team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD0KNq8YmUOutCwvD99SWn9\u0026fid=0x0:0x8dd43154848b8986"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Janice Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFxiIZTTjY01bqApU1v6RTyxECSv6e2jOIbNHC4_mnJzS-cHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pastry here is AMAZING! We tried the bacon \u0026 cream cheese and the mizithra, fig \u0026 honey ‚Äî both were equally delicious. The pastry was perfectly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The bacon had a great crunch that paired beautifully with the cream cheese, while the fig \u0026 honey was absolutely divine. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for seconds if I‚Äôm in the area again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB4DDTy2juwrJLzTCOfsQfo\u0026fid=0x0:0x8dd43154848b8986"],"When":"2025-9-11"},{"Name":"Donna Beckford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3UEsf8KZ1M8D7zkX44q4nJ-3MmN4YvBcMdSJytUGHk63ZG5iU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found it!! The ideal place to grab and go or people watch at the inside and on street tables. The food (delectable croissants, brownies, yummy Greek cakes and desserts) are to die for. We opted to do the only right thing stocking up on breakfast goodies as well as snacks for the day to keep us going. The food was insanely delicious and such good value. Oh and so is the coffee. Please don‚Äôt miss this off your places to eat in the city","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDIk6Of6wE\u0026fid=0x0:0x8dd43154848b8986"],"When":"2025-4-12"}]
