user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jane L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJstdsVnfDptflEAAdE-1HE1POEpn5VTKYW8nooDfebV4OrLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed our time at the caf√©, which offers good coffee and a comfortably air-conditioned indoor seating area with pleasant d√©cor. The outdoor seating is shaded by the balcony above, making it a comfortable spot even on a typical Greek summer day. The cake we ordered was a bit hard, but we haven‚Äôt tried any of the other food options. I‚Äôd recommend this caf√©, especially as a relaxing stop after visiting the National Archaeological Museum of Greece.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAxoLTlow9dUjvxKExb8Fbg&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-7-24"},{"Name":"Chris Gu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUefo3PJ3f4w4SNWSHYRPnFujGV22xETLc6ktj83RuF64AEqZWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"PLEASE AVOID THIS PLACE! My partner and I came here this morning. He had the chicken wrap, and within two hours he became sick with symptoms similar with food poisoning, including diarrhoea, fever, and stomach cramps. Since we ate exactly the same food last night, the chicken wrap from this place was the only thing he ate differently, so it seems very likely the chicken wasn‚Äôt cooked properly or was no longer fresh. We‚Äôve now had to cancel our day trip tomorrow because of this. Very disappointed with this place.

Updates: The owner‚Äôs reply pissed me off again. Anyone with basic common sense knows food poisoning can absolutely cause a fever. We are 100% sure it was caused by your food that‚Äôs why I left the review here, bexause we don‚Äôt want any one else experience things like this.  and it‚Äôs defo not some virus like Covid ‚Äî I am completely fine, and the only thing he ate differently was your chicken wrap. Since eating it, he has been sick, extremely weak, and still having diarrhoea and stomach cramps. I really can not feel you are sorry for this but refusing to think your food might have problems","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDbQHMuJCGs6DBYxfucUBkO&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"Anna Radman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzWFiCSJXXmSfZOSHw2zshAb8KzfQbRhO6o1Br3B-uhoh_vC8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"found the nicest little coffee place! the people that work there are very friendly, they offer banana bread and some pastries as well and you can sit either inside or outside.
they also serve matcha - handmade not pre made (idk if pre made is even a thing here).

will be back tomorrow morning :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCDcTHmmaPYlG-BwYT1B7IC&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"kerenml1606","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIndBCZoTj9Un-djPIuI0m2n9G1QMh4XhgM1SM-y59NL3qW0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"really enjoyed the atmosphere and overall experience. While I asked for a light roast, the coffee served wasn‚Äôt quite what I had in mind, which slightly affected the experience. Still a pleasant place with a nice vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-CMbH0hW1VuCNlK0BTHQH&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Medina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ23gfR9b1fU1Kcf8pLbR6miU2V3clRwkzXFk9SJX4qtpoj7wU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High quality coffee, and fresh baked goods. Hot chocolate is especially good. The staff are super friendly, drinks come with the water jug.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAFRqQeDviqRsZtfSGkmJv&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Dalia Vili≈´naitƒó","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwfwMJj_eFNIjAK-ttAhyFQ3diR1ow5pRmaY4Zypi5ypRrog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During my stay in Athens I used to come here every week for a V60. I tried different origins (this place is very alive, I could try different beans, it‚Äôs worth coming back here) and loved it all. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. The place is cozy, I could read and write without any distractions.

Thank you White Turtle Coffeehouse and hope to see you all again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAuvr4ebCtRPVFLLlqdoA7l&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-7-14"},{"Name":"Ekaterina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqkRomxuVrXRWQraWQCbH6YmJVQT-8wVggZySrHTFY4cFjAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place became my favorite specialty coffee spot during my trip to Athens. The best coffee that I‚Äôve tried in Greece so far. The taste and the texture are just perfect. The cafe itself is very cozy and cute. It has sits both outside and inside. Baristas are super friendly and helpful. Thank you! ü´∂üèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDoo5qnBQ&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2025-4-28"},{"Name":"Courtney Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWijUX0re6VBrfWrsTnGsnbjywuQJqted_GeSnb4V3g5BL-XDPmCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The perfect coffee shop! Friendly workers, comfortable atmosphere, delicious coffee and food! They have both plant-based milk and decaf options. They have indoor and outdoor seating but I recommend the outdoor seating if the weather is nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICTo6PU9gE&fid=0x0:0x7a1564cc76f4139c"],"When":"2024-5-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Caff√® Doppio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB5svFP9hWEtkrrhxtEEgx2f8jA243OlIwYuenMYwiLD7aM2Ft=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place lives up to the hype! It‚Äôs a modern breakfast & brunch cafe with a big selection of menu. I wish I had more days to explore different dishes but I did fall in love with my waffle!!! I probably can say that this is the best waffle I‚Äôve ever had! It‚Äôs very light- crispy on the outside and fluffy inside.
I literally wanted to ask them for a recipe ü§£

It was very busy when we got there, it was  that day when the weather was horrible and raining all day & night so all the indoor seats were reserved but we were lucky enough to get ourselves spots.

The service was very quick, we didn‚Äôt wait long at all for the food. The price is on the higher side but it‚Äôs definitely worth it!

Oh they also make service attires like aprons and restaurant staff uniforms which are very cool. I was so tempted to get myself a rain jacket.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAVMXeNoi923tu1GhWuojo0&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Angelina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaYUcUJir1p2Mumpt5FG3ystVXp_lUh2zgSWtqtoeyhwH7Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved this spot! The brunch and lunch options are amazing; everything is super fresh and full of flavor. The interior has a great urban vibe, modern and cozy at the same time. It does get quite crowded, but that just shows how popular it is. Definitely worth the wait!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC9GeoHZ6v3o4FkAM99GMcw&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Kat St","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqQ7aKtYED-RgQA3HdNp8mH9ZiUP1_343Vsvd1_pkXEr-jkvY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A decent brunch place with lots of vegetarian and vegan options on top of a cozy urban aesthetic that blends right in the city. Indeed the spot has some apparel and accessories of its own that make a fair alternative souvenirs from Athens. You should definitely book a table if you're trying to grab brunch in the weekend - it is a very busy place for a reason","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBkDebkVoLiPiy-VtedmFuN&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Kai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJh9bybC14RyjGLUGwXHFdNZ8PwMB-zuZl01cdYGyxIOPosLLI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Makers make great brunch and coffee :).
I had a flat white and a egg waffle, loved both.
You may have to wait a bit to get a seat if you arrive around lunch time but it was worth it.
Not sure if I like that half of the cafe is a T shirt store/ merch shop but if the food and drinks are that good it doesn't seem to have any negative impact :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChOhURf_NGVBll0LgdjnWk&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Katherina Fragkedaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsuO-WEceeY29V8do_jESDvXBI4Jh0UnshKS6N6yfonka7ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice brunch place with options for vegeterians and vegans as well. Juice and matcha should come in larger portions. It's a unique concept with people sitting together at the same table. Good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDidHllrDmgOcue-zQ6B7WV&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Celine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSWe5xift8kxNXDIZHbTulxafDCtENXF72yHHnY40X3XYijQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was super friendly!!

The poached eggs and waffle sandwich were delicious. Highly recommend to split the waffle sandwich.

Ambiance was good. Very modern place surrounding older establishments. They sell clothes inside as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBT9Gq_IKmGJvli4l5r9PjR&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-9-7"},{"Name":"Sarah Gradel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmz2bbqiZJtp5ph5hzlHN94k_bXwSoZ1sxuKTskyw_dOp6fLbC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This breakfast had me doing that stupid little dance in our chairs us ladies do. As an American, the quality and freshness of this food was out of this world. Huge Lucious blueberry‚Äôs and fresh Greek yogurt were a treat. This was better than any yogurt I‚Äôve ever had. My husband ordered the waffles with cream cheese and berries, that had me rethinking my choice. The cream cheese was the star of the show, and I continued to look at him the same way my dog looks at me every time I have a meal. Would highly recommend this place. There is nothing more important to me than starting the day off with a great source of protein and fiber.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAi7laqZWbMmluJ8bEGhtB3&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-10-2"},{"Name":"Soti Stratiki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4_ZpRgawm_iDv8suPVydFS5iTI3o8jOB7_Gm6VwRF3zpm2Hf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Coffees were great. We got the scrambled eggs plate that was heavily overpriced for the taste & ingredients and the chocolate fondant which was nearly inedible. Supposedly made with butter that made it taste more heavy but clearly the butter wasn‚Äôt handled correctly and gave the dessert a cheesy taste.
Service was fast and kind and the place (&toilets) were clean enough regarding the traffic of the place that was really busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCR8N0-KzFLFrSmXt1_1J-_&fid=0x0:0x4afd8b017502c65c"],"When":"2025-10-20"}]

title: MOKKA SPECIALTY COFFEE S.A.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sky - Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX0fTg4vBCYJZMocaD__eH8VgPnWd3c9pIMOE9pTI75ixTiCs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at MOKKA SPECIALTY COFFEE S.A. in central Athens. I ordered a traditional Greek coffee (metrios ‚Äî lightly sweet), which they brew the old-fashioned way in hot sand. It was fascinating to watch. The person preparing the coffee was incredibly attentive and meticulous, constantly moving the brass ibrik (briki) through the hot sand so it heated evenly without burning. It took a few minutes, but it was absolutely worth the wait.
The coffee itself was bold, rich, and very distinctive ‚Äî one of the best I‚Äôve had. It was served on a tray in the briki along with a cup and some loukoumi (Turkish delight), which made the whole experience feel very traditional and special. For around ‚Ç¨3‚Äì‚Ç¨4, I thought it was excellent value.
The caf√© has a traditional atmosphere and was quite busy, but it never felt hectic. Locals were sitting inside and outside, slowly enjoying their coffee and conversation. Even though it was busy, there were always a few seats free, the noise level was low, and the staff were very friendly, welcoming, and attentive wherever you sat. It‚Äôs also a nice place to grab takeaway, though if you‚Äôre in a rush you may want to order filtered coffee since Greek coffee takes a few minutes to prepare.
This place is located on Athinas Street near the Central Market in the heart of Athens, and it‚Äôs often chosen by local tour guides to introduce visitors to authentic Greek coffee ‚Äî and after tasting it, I can see why.
If you‚Äôve never tried traditional Greek coffee, this is an excellent place to experience it for the first time ‚Äî and even if you‚Äôre a regular coffee drinker, it‚Äôs something special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxVunFm_9HleTGNqSj2vXl&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Marie-Soleil Cordeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6pT3e4bC1h9JkG0_mnqATDAbsCZyq8-4YE97VwpDOW3XwIGZdlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For a real Greek coffee experience, this is the place.
It‚Äôs not cheap, but the coffee is prepared and served in a briki, which we appreciated.
You can tell it‚Äôs popular with both locals and tourists.
There was a small mistake with the sugar level in my son‚Äôs coffee, but it was remade right away without any issue.
Yes, I‚Äôd recommend this spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAefX9BZ7cLfw1YlF5gg8Bm&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"Meltem G. K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViCFL5AiWs7DcDtnoWb38cm40MRfRxWOZhvtHVcefp4PkHEu8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A lovely caf√© serving traditional coffee made on hot sand. The coffee was great ‚Äî smooth, well-balanced, not acidic. My highlight was the yogurt with pistachio (marmalade?) ‚Äî something I‚Äôd never tried before, but delicious.

It‚Äôs clearly a tourist spot (you‚Äôll see many guide-led groups), so the atmosphere doesn‚Äôt feel fully ‚Äúlocal,‚Äù although the flavors certainly are. While the coffee is good, you can find similar quality elsewhere if you look so it is a bit pricey. A bit disappointing that the cafe had almost no foam you‚Äòd expect in a good mocca. Ordering via QR code at the table is super easy, and the staff are happy to explain things if you ask.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMQiDhSVLHrg14WlzFSAKM&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"The Gollys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaF2Jltr2610_Nqx7wPqQkgU6v8_Xp2DIpmV1xFyfAWZ7S_38=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very famous for its coffee and has won many prizes and accolades. I had a vanilla roibus tea. They had some of the best yoghurt ever with rose petal jam. I would def recommend. Staff were excellent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzLb34QTsXg980hp-cZDxC&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Ralph Aldover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGPmaTrIaOKbfxx7UhcoBmtt75rRoNV_I3qvsHxnUIcNIZ5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just came here today, had a wonderful experience! Food was good, it was an experience with the coffee made in the sand. and most of all staff was so friendly the moment we came in! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCCbfHGUKz5SKjd3X3hZG8G&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"Jenny Tecklenburg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBMlfUZCJgxIGWg177jmID5bCHNvDjp4e2MOxjy8PebflfNow5lA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was very nice. I came very early in the morning to watch the market open and have a quiet experience. I had a cheese pie - Tiropita me fi and a traditional coffee. Pictured here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDvxBdE00Y4pajgWOhgwAfH&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2025-9-27"},{"Name":"Elena D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkjqaR3ZMRD3kOLwgRZTM6-lhncWs7l6DbGEz8b2UklghXV_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the Greek yogurt and coffee ‚Äì both were good. The caf√© also has a WC, which is convenient. Overall, a nice stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBi7yQEu7Es_X7iP-nfKYGT&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2025-9-27"},{"Name":"Lenke Pankotai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWTe9Vsi321W8lDUH6wgNMXG7kKJXTW6E4L4IUyCGRLUnLQZE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee was great we have tried the authentic greek coffee and i also liked that we could order calmly at the table. The price was a bit high but we could have a real greek coffee at least. The only thing that I didn't like is that before we entered we felt the raw fish from the market.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBIV-xSdcoq6GGzfjeEinyB&fid=0x0:0xd1ce391dd558aa5f"],"When":"2025-9-5"}]

[{"Name":"Cristian Gonz√°lez Garc√≠a","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-lFTs10Jbs2xSy6LT2ELLbZh23Fiij4UYuBPUm9bRFUQW8z6Svg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place. The service was perfect‚Äîfriendly, warm, and genuinely joyful, some of the best I‚Äôve experienced. The hot chocolate and cappuccino were excellent, and the hazelnut croissants were absolutely delicious. The caf√© is cozy, with a few seats inside and several tables outside, so you can enjoy your coffee there or take it to go. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAjFC6opQtnaiU6IXhdL4gB&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"kerenml1606","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIndBCZoTj9Un-djPIuI0m2n9G1QMh4XhgM1SM-y59NL3qW0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"unfortunately the coffee itself wasn‚Äôt for me. I asked for a wild, fruity light roast, and was served a medium-to-dark roast that didn‚Äôt match my preferences at all. In my opinion, it didn‚Äôt reflect a specialty coffee experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB2B1nQWEy6WlvxfR6KLknP&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Christine T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnp9ZIPDmBJT4CmGjCEmrZPOWUiAytWO632r93F5KmWsQVLNkE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was top-notch! üåü
From nicely packaged coffee as souvenirs to the best iced cappuccino I‚Äôve ever had to delicious and aesthetically pleasing pistachio croissant.
Staff were attentive, generous, helpful and tried to explain in detail when I asked about the different coffee.
Simply AMAZING, thank you for everything ü•∞ Was so glad I ended my month long trip at this shop, it was a pleasant experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjt5Tuc9UCQmQleC7hS9zk&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"Eva Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzSStJZVNY9hextQO_7NQkD9P0nJ1xoa0Otrc208rv4qNR5kToig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A marvellous place to enjoy a good breakfast! I am not a coffe person so I took a hot chocolate and it was delicious! Also the pastries (chocolate hazelnut croissants) were excellent, one of the best I have ever tasted. The man in the counter was very nice and kind and got assured we were taking exactly what we wanted as we do not speak greek and communicated in English. It deserves more than a 5!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Spr Tbr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLg4cVlHoHt1IRnXyGyg_rWhNe6hzHrY_KB8xQTUXRa7-cViw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and really nice staff.
Truly recommended üôè
(Also they had soy milk )","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDq8eaP2yYmBkuPFDVDuQmB&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Kevin Triplett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL4ET7eEHganv0LmWhPcXRINndcIPgH31tiAuLCMMYrn4u6iE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best espresso based coffees I‚Äôve had, and I‚Äôve been around. Small inside with comfy outdoor seating. The barista today was super friendly and gave off these great vibes. Definitely recommending this place. Good, simple selection of baked goods, including the classic Greek pies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAGRRdqfZkKGMroD_m5ExKM&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-7-11"},{"Name":"Catalin B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIccQ4cL_v6NPtniB_ZFmb5q3PFfHuJwf4tB0Gxx9LS0OIgkhU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had the filter coffee and it was really bland, no special aroma of any kind. The service was nice but I came for the coffee....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDr4JkRbJKEiVMQoT3coXOL&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Hayley Banks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH3qe5lVE77w0SN2SSbJ1cFMsg_LUjBIj05Tbvl4OI_STIHcgr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best iced latte I‚Äôve ever had and some delicious pastries on offer, all with extra charming service from the barista. I had the croissant and a cup of cookies. Perfection! Definitely a refreshing stop after visiting the fish and meat markets!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhABMa12Cju79DQ3jqluXRKG&fid=0x0:0x18e212f37e9a0108"],"When":"2025-7-16"}]

[{"Name":"Ilona Burian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5HPE9psZHpMSD-fCV5rdg14bWbLiog_L-OeTzM3N5OuLFubNd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice space. Art, books, colors, coffee, chocolate..... we ordered chocolate and it was delicious. Lots of flavors and variety to choose from.
Nice place with good seating (chairs, sofa...) and a piano.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC3tvi-nT3-rMvo3kAApJSR&fid=0x0:0x58012d092c742d32"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"Robert Go≈Çƒôbiewski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhj8PVlF8pJQ7rAE3OFQ5Y4adTlkiUwPvXr7XQYDdr_lGqug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice small cafe with some artistic touch üé®üñº‚òïÔ∏èüç∞ Mayan spicy hot chocolate was delicious & also enjoyed home made cake. I recommend that place :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCYdVFxCeCisc63bvaiHV7D&fid=0x0:0x58012d092c742d32"],"When":"2025-10-29"},{"Name":"Sumedha Amunugama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE7Bfku_C6H1p2HwGfy99vASw6l2cVcc9e3QOOWQCANlsOyeqR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled on this cafe during the day on our last day in Athens.

Off the beaten track in a quiet (for Athens) square.

Friendly staff, very nice space with good coffee and fruit juices.

Great cafe and gives every impression of being a fun cocktybar in the evening.

Worth a little detour to avoid the tourist crowds.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelbs Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyO3-zN5LMzfzeT8I4n1VpRNsstYjm29E3U7Btr6Zj1ITwPmXt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem around the Plaka area of Athens, Greece! I absolutely loved the artsy vibe in this old home from the 1920‚Äôs turned cafe. Def the spot to enjoy a traditional Freddo Cappuccino.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDorpiiSA&fid=0x0:0x58012d092c742d32"],"When":"2025-4-25"},{"Name":"Manal Ballout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa131ZQ1qfaJvo83TGtOTq_3vSwF00iRQQSIcsm7lypNDR2j1j0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best  tastiest coffee in Athens

Cozy place

[{"Name":"Lela Avraam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXT2moqii8LP4lkWFTjc_eur2pYLwjfCerGmGs0y5qHRcS5ts=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a beautiful place!!! The decoration is amazing, their pastries so cute and tasty and top coffee!!! If you want to enjoy all these wonderful things you should check them out!!! The staff is very polite and professional and the service quick!!! Unique pastries and a lovely & festive atmosphere!!! For Instagram posts & artistic photos is the right place to be!!! Highly recommended!!! Honorable mention for the amazing raspberry sweet that was 10/10!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAhFwntd58jDTptJix5fnzp&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-12-20"},{"Name":"Riddhi Jain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnSBAK0VGCHICVZY_-GxBxBl-8u0v7KMNw3C2cHUU-bJug-Tw9vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely beautiful decor - it is what made us step into this place!
They have outdoor seating as well between their coffee shop and the pastry shop. The pastries and other desserts seemed so delicious! The staff is very welcoming and friendly despite the extremely busy evening rush we went in. Good place to sit outside and enjoy the vibe of the city. Would recommend this for the desserts and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBhOzc7PmBcgqatdPMxD60d&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-10-16"},{"Name":"Alex Serebrov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4lnJw-pXXZSSpA-iiZnSzONhQ-C0X3cGWpvI-zcDPVkNHZk4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have stopped there just to get an ice coffee,  but was captivated there by very cozy and cool atmosphere and irresistible sweets selection. I had they special limited edition ellyz cake and it was very good, which was a very good complementary to espresso tonic.
Unfortunately I had no time to explore their other options including savory dishes, but I definitely would when I am next time in Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDHSufBYEBxxaAg2wHnKbCz&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-9-2"},{"Name":"Elsa boulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi-5A-qHNCcRHnq9FCbB_5mibFh96THpmuJVKmkoMixcKS8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ellyz Athens is one of the prettiest coffee shops in the city ‚Äî full of pink flowers and charm! The desserts are amazing and so Instagram-worthy, and while the salty food is more on the simple side, it‚Äôs nicely presented and tasty. A lovely place overall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDahGK5Skx1i3Zeq40430iC&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Vas Vas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3yMymYH_XRxYF31vUugb3bXglFUwNSPq11qiCgWx4n6Lp70Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We picked up this cafe as has an amazing view towards Erechthio temple and nice look and feel environment as a store.. however the service was not at the level should be .. even thought it was so crowded.. if you have alternative option you may select but if you like to give a try.. please do having patience‚Ä¶.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDPeEwNZb250U_1AeGW5RxF&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"◊ô◊î◊ï◊ì◊ô◊™ ◊î◊ï◊§◊û◊ü ◊¶◊ú◊û◊™ ◊ê◊ì◊®◊ô◊õ◊ú◊ï◊™","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5RE_1adb7ppNrTXsIbo6TxoP-TjuuvgwalNIfGWiIV3Fdg8wRrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An Excellent Experience
This place is both charming and delicious. The staff are truly outstanding attentive, warm, and clearly passionate about what they do. The service comes straight from the heart, which makes the entire visit feel very special. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a memorable experience. Breakfast is also available and absolutely worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCvhskl95luprhqfywSNhJt&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"Ola Ola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXo5o6jd7OR7h6nlPiajiCWxH73kFGd0VeCHdlr7ir1zpQYUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautifully decorated cafe with a pleasant atmosphere. The toasts and sandwiches are well prepared, and the raspberry dessert is simply a masterpiece and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBfs6njWdPK0rSUCA0VPRxt&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Lian Superstar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBtLJWZ6oNki9MTQhkfGU8izcriHCkjM0JdJ29dV1oL1ljdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We were very excited to visit this cafe, and sadly we were very dissapointed with the place. To start with the place is beautiful full of flowers and decoration, we have seen prettier cafes but this one had nice decoration. The real problem with this place is the food and the prices, I felt like we were scammed because of how bad the food is and how the prices are so high. We ordered at first one pink freddo cappuccino and a pink warm cappuccino, they tasted okay the pink was only food coloring nothing special.
For the dessert, it had a weird taste almost like frige taste from setting so long in the frige, it costed us almost 8‚Ç¨ which was definitely not worth it. It was very small with a chocolate bear on top which also tasted so bad. It was filled with only chocolate mouse.
In my opinion, I will not be returning to this cafe, the only thing worth seeing is the decoration.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAn5yhfsLcZrXmKBLHvVm0p&fid=0x0:0x52f1ae408d4ae376"],"When":"2025-8-16"}]

[{"Name":"Cait","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWG-Yarj4FWkobBHyJNCeggZ-IeCH0VI6J6IvLp_I12gt46TM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This isn‚Äôt just my favorite place in Athens - 17 countries later - but my favorite cafe of all time. Everything you want, great food, tea, coffee, wine, dessert‚Ä¶ the people here are incredibly kind. A true 5 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD4H9OBiFtuiOl-V9D-R-tX&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2025-6-22"},{"Name":"kobie long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIHxmQUYKLsVz7DgCEJEVhzZZQlYjcf09MVBGcep8xMDnT3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cute place with great food and coffee! We got the Ukrainian cake, Ukrainian light breakfast, and Ukrainian brunch. All were great! Also fantastic Jamaican espresso. Good prices too. Super nice service. Also loved that they had vegan options ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICPkfDtVQ&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Constance Leroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTgho8VjRDMlTrRStX0lKDxTxW1Z7MoY-XYB9f_YniOy5Jqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is amazing, people really welcoming!
You can eat many different specialities, but I recommend the Greek mountain tea and the Ukrainian breakfast, vegan version.

There is a cart for vegan dishes, which is really appreciated!

Thanks I loved this place !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhByrbcX45vcCzVn76FA700i&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2025-7-2"},{"Name":"Torsten Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXHzjdQeoiWB_IZ2KxTniJe-qy0DjdiPOzOm245jgEFQwKJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice atmosphere, very friendly staff, unique interior design. The Mushroom soup was not as expected (I thought about a creme soup), but was even more delicious. Great cake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDfqs2Efw&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2025-1-5"},{"Name":"Furry Flowers Rescue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_vLPEzjL5o4iVMH3XaDBsoa1LRszMH43vGpXxlOX0b244F3SywA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place and come often when I'm in Athens. Especially good for their attentive service, interesting and healthy dishes, such as borscht and most delicious spinach cream cake! The decor as charming as the sweet staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICj9rfMXw&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"ŒïŒ∫Œ±œÑŒøŒΩœÑŒ¨Œ¥ŒµœÇ ŒüŒΩœåŒºŒ±œÑŒ±","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOjVM65_9g0j7evLBoYsAUk33utm_yOk3Svg_tsaC6wI20ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They deserve more than 5 stars!
The menu has everything you need to get to know Ukrainian kitchen. I‚Äôve been coming back countless times during my vacation and they have always served me immaculate food and drinks.
I felt extremely welcomed and I appreciate the owners for their kindness and their endless hospitality.
My recommendation is Ukrainian Breakfast with tomato juice and definitely Ukrainian honey cake drizzled with honey! Also the smoothies there were very filling and super delicious. The prices are fantastic for the great amount of food and the quality. Everything is prepared with love and fresh ingredients.
During my stay in Athens I‚Äôve been going there almost daily for my breakfast and for my lunch. Thank you very much for always serving me amazing dishes with smile!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICx8L-3uAE&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"Christine Klassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5DpVxLVo0BFQ6Gqncom4i6ClVdcClNBU2ouOufM6yl79AIZYS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic little cafe for brunch. - specializing in Ukrainian food. The coffee and food was delicious.  On r server was very attentive. Great value. Would definitely come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMeF7ObA9dPAmQE&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2025-5-16"},{"Name":"Adriana Fischetti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW49zCOv5dOL5xqaqip9oZvN815zo_RAgu-TRBrEraSUXq3MjAvRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute cafe serving brunch in Exarchia neighborhood of Athens.
Warm, prompt, friendly service.  The Ukrainian crepes are filled with sweet cheese and covered with a blueberry jam, honey, and sour cream.  They have many egg dishes and sandwiches as well.  The prices are reasonable. The outdoor seating is surrounded by greenery and pillows adorn the seatings to give it a cozy feeling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC-gtvJeQ&fid=0x0:0x21ab230698f35024"],"When":"2022-10-30"}]

[{"Name":"Sofia Lamas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyeRJxt5Rh4B-c9YiLj6OPl21kxQmIcunEcvaGKdqPKfBqRbRP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly good coffee! ‚òïÔ∏èüî• Medium roast perfection ‚Äî they had Colombian üá®üá¥ and Ethiopian üá™üáπ beans, plus so many cold and hot versions to try.
The staff was super kind and friendly ü´∂, and there are tables outside to enjoy your coffee in the Athens vibe ‚òÄÔ∏èüá¨üá∑.
They even ask if you want sugar (my advice: always a No! üòâ).
A great spot if you‚Äôre really into coffee ‚Äî and even if you‚Äôre not, you‚Äôll totally enjoy it üòÇ.
Tons of food options too ü•ê, and the espresso was perfectly calibrated and absolutely delicious. üí´
A must for coffee lovers in Athens! ‚ú®
(We where there 3 times in a week )","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAcqMTnVf56q3iqOmNOWW0P&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Phoebe Dhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU_doQomVq60bIt4veYg24QU3_Gzq8q31Q1ItHAAIzMM29ZYMK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tailor Made Coffee is a little cute place with a cozy atmosphere and really nice coffee. It‚Äôs a great spot to stop by and relax for a bit. I tried the apple pie with crumble ‚Äî the flavor was good, but it was a little bit dry for my taste. Overall, a pleasant caf√© worth visiting, especially for the coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAWacqKOnNyRqHJB122owBk&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"Xinlang Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6dCIejoXP-rKp0QVfKo8MKoAWk-cWu6-tOU1oaIohKXWmHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee! We ordered double cappuccino and flat white, love the flat white a bit more than cappuccino:) only have 2 seats inside it‚Äôs a bit pity.
Minus 1 star on the vibe because people seating next to us are smoking. I know people are smoking everywhere is Athens. I just hate it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB0u08pWIwutc2QNTXnTY0H&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"M W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJngiH8DB1brlBgBc2XD-euuk-8_qtpt9_FZ0vU5zYfb71hXt-B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"They have matcha and variety of pastries you can nibble on,
The matcha latte had sugar in it,  it was very sweet that I obviously had to ask if they added sugar to my matcha without my consent, but it turns out their matcha powder is sweet‚Ä¶ be weary of that as it spoils the taste buds!
Very nice service, and the caffe has a beautiful setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpzWhfFqVB8oYD4E890LuA&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-8-25"},{"Name":"Trish Dunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK3c14Uz6G8Udz3IQHTBpz1iH3HYq5rm8ks3BGS2QMSi4JVsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved my cappuccino freddo. The service was great. We didn‚Äôt care for the pretzel. But I still highly recommend coffee and atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBlhdCIlJ47UNSDwIUtALYc&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-9-15"},{"Name":"C Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV1hYXiQq4Bh1VvwdKf0CW9ctrWNvD-u7_7H9o0AZYPgVMTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great variety of drinks and snacks. Baguette and spinach pie were nice! I had the strawberry latte, I liked it but think I prefer normal latte or matcha (just my preference). We sat outside it was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBL_dMttUaA9-OPdiZG8f6W&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"Sofi Tch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGyKib2I3G3LHCBPNx22OXkazD4lbI3ETG9bw9i8Ds0nPV6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tailor Made is a true specialty coffee spot. The quality of the beans and precision in brewing really stand out. The ambience is modern yet welcoming, and the staff are genuinely kind and attentive. A great place both for coffee lovers and anyone who just wants to enjoy a perfect cup in a nice atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAhLuI1zsaK0Vjd-T3mvGFs&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"Jono Kruger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsbo8Y0iFyYs4vC2kJx5RVg0VPmJd2sIjgvIHL7s6PVpHPcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee and friendly staff. Plenty of pastries to choose from and a wide range of great coffee options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBCiOLGWZpEnBJVNyiIAlpx&fid=0x0:0x1760d48a5b637f7a"],"When":"2025-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M S MS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhRd8cglzSPQQwKEyEKEf1-OyQgrnpatItIHpWam0GAWen5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""We stumbled upon Amber restaurant, conveniently located next to our Airbnb, and it was a fantastic find! The food was exceptional - we thoroughly enjoyed the grilled fish, chicken fillet, and grilled pork in mustard sauce, all of which were delicious. The service was attentive, and the ambiance was lovely. We'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCkJTjpL-txTzZCS5yHHxe3&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-10-5"},{"Name":"Mylene H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDImRzKj_9oJjBcfPqppOfNwL5DyPRJ4ORL0HsryZvO3w9BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went here because someone said the beef carpaccio was nice - it is 20 euros so quite expensive. When they brought it to me, the portion looked small to me, so I ordered a dip and bread & I even told the waiter that the portion was small, so therefore I wanted to order the dip & bread. Because the taste of the carpaccio was nice, I wanted to save the restaurant on google and on there I saw a review with a picture of a bigger size of carpaccio. I confronted the waiter and after that he brought me a new one, but I had a difficult time enjoying, because I felt scammed. I am still not sure why they first gave me a smaller portion, is it because I am a tourist? If I had gotten the normal portion, I would not have ordered the bread and dip. In the end, I told the waiter that I did not have a nice experience but they did not comped me anything, not even the wine that was 8 euros. I paid 40 euros for a terrible experience and it just did not feel right.

For such an expensive restaurant I expected more service. I wish I had read the negative reviews of this restaurant before going. I do not recommend this restaurant if you are a tourist.

P.s. The waiter was initially not very friendly and after my complaint he was def nicer. Such a weird experience in general.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBr04uWV3QOCh6xZqONOD7J&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Dany Le Goaix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOXo-V4FNysOw4GrjabXdJOwG1N0THP4Tc-85sLMilMsh5qOYHdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Focus is on deconstruction of traditional Greek dishes and it works.  Found the squid ‚Äòrubbery‚Äô but the croquette moussaka, sea bass and gyro plate were delicious.  Service was friendly and spot on.  Seating inside and outside and we got a seat that straddled both which was perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCTBIgbuA71MAkA5E887pfQ&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-9-13"},{"Name":"Kexia N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQIFO7Wa-_mL5cAImXEkYRv3awKAW-w0ywTZ4zEH_NiO_xTbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the food and the vibe.
The carpaccio was 10/10 and so was the flank steak and salad.
Around 22:30 they started playing rnb which really set the mood. I would definitely recommend and I will definitely be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA9quzO6EVBKMZ72wXIIsxQ&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"klepusska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBk4JoJ0CKSMK7OxrBely6Sj6hebgP7fMKKKqg1ROT8GeyfzH9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an absolutely wonderful experience at your restaurant! Every dish we tried was incredibly delicious ‚Äî full of flavor, beautifully presented, and clearly made with care.

The atmosphere was unforgettable ‚Äî from the stylish interior to the cozy ambiance, everything was thoughtfully designed to make the evening special. A huge thank you to the staff: the service was outstanding, attentive, and friendly from start to finish. Our waiter made us feel truly welcomed and taken care of.

This was more than just a dinner ‚Äî it was an experience we‚Äôll remember for a long time. Thank you for a perfect evening. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back and recommending your restaurant to friends and family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBpw7Zg5f7VnuA3kM3g_LLQ&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-7-26"},{"Name":"Cris Scotter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS6o_4GsV4ZbPoA4LnAb-tp-q8RUtEuki-D24Liuxujt8Auw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well what to say‚Ä¶. Very nice, a lovely place to park and eat. Well prepared and presented simple Greek food. I really enjoyed the food, the gyros and some broccoli. The portions were far too large for me and I had to leave a plateful. I chose a glass of local ‚Äúla vie en rose‚Äù ros√©, which was smooth and full of flavour‚Ä¶ strawberries and a hint of vanilla, I had to have second. The staff attentive but relaxed. I‚Äôm pleased I went.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCwmdGh6wE&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-3-19"},{"Name":"Yafit Koren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnqItlExi2sCrsaT4WcXN_BIYa_eNTNsgErk46Ug2x4-tTYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful evening at a charming restaurant. The dishes were creative and delicious, each one a delightful experience. The service was personal and excellent, adding to the warm hospitality. The atmosphere was fantastic, with a decor that radiated tranquility and comfort. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCo6YrY6gE&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-4-18"},{"Name":"Win Boo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK8ZxO9ZqpxHUyUzpOu-PuDuxSbHUT3I2-esgP7OhmMVLc8uI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible experience at Amber Athens! The service was absolutely amazing from start to finish. A special shoutout to the bartender llias who was not only skilled but also super friendly and welcoming. The manager and the entire staff went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. Their professionalism and warmth made the whole visit unforgettable. Everything from the ambience to the drinks and the hospitality was just spot on. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDaRIvgCeTUliuLtqFg9C4q&fid=0x0:0x14664216c27ee13"],"When":"2025-7-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"dean chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6byiTwMqCMNtL5aMwK-NhDkH8bPpYQXZ-QG2qD_GMuRq2cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When so many reviewers said that everything was excellent, I seconded to that, that is TRUE! I just had a dinner at Oroscopo. From the complimentary breads/dips/soup to the salad, to the main courses, and to the dessert, everything was excellent indeed. I haven‚Äôt had such rich flavor lamb for years. The fish was so fresh and well grilled. And, the service was beyond the excellence. The staff were very polite and respectful. Their smiles were genuine. I love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCgVGNUHLql72o8o2ECoWq1&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Rocky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOPIFX3XWdhCodb8HWKr7CKyqAuTV27J27xAPlfeirqYonOYnn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice and friendly people there. Dishes are delicious and in appropriate portion (tho I wish them to be larger haha). Music in the eatery is also soothing and great. Would give this a third try if I am in Athens again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC52MzarwmljLfdumuJpfHe&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Rachel Galea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqqHvrjvc1tFBfeD02m1z-IljofdIUbxLhyqQ4NJiSFRJKcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for our first night on our Greek holiday and was impressed with the food, but mostly the service! We were served complimentary soup to start, which was absolutely delicious. Our meals were great, the atmosphere was lovely and when we finished we were given complimentary dessert too. What a wonderful start to our holiday. Thank you to the team at Oroscopo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClFnhEzEhbwYW_HHTs9_ii&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Ellie Vogiatzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJkZpK7pQ_ZV1sMt_IPpdLfCUFP-epUdNBARQre6b_slPFqyjzwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing experience! The staff were very polite and proactive. After we ordered they gave us bread and vegetable soup, which was on the house. Then the carbonara and the liver came in, which were delicious. At the end they brought us the most amazing tiramisu, which was also on the house! We will definitely go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBciChorfzKQvdtVp0qQ8sP&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-8-4"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7COEABpOdWiM4Pse4fQ9uuMF9j3mRXkVbM8vPDacmToJTQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lasagna came without sauce, dry, not edible.

Waiter said calamaries are fried, they were on grill.
Website menu was not up to date, we went there because of it but they did not have many of the stuff.

Waiter was extremely rude, he would not speak, just nod head and be passively aggressive.

Food was a real disappointment, dry weird space choices for classical dishes.

Waiters obviously have huge english barrier and think of you less as a foreigner, at least that was my experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHXIqwTctu8HacO_iWppon&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Emily Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfvsBPjolxKH5izVUgp0J0awj8ftpheeG456ewwEuP7kdaQJS_lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They did not charge enough!!! Everything‚Ä¶ EVERYTHING was wonderful. The bread with tapenade and beet spread, the soup, the salad‚Ä¶ we had two of the specials: braised short ribs with pear risotto and braised chicken/tomato with a pasta. If we didn‚Äôt have enough they brought us ice creams and sorbet.  Every bite we swore was the best until we tried another. The service was incredible.  I felt so at home, and I told one of our many servers that the food tasted like I had a loving Greek Grandma who made high-end cuisine.  We hope to go back before our visit ends!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAwked6YODc7uyOa_hd1-xF&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"Mark Mc Govern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0GGHoSfUTfz7zGzr4QaTuEood6lMZkveW4NMvYw9vPfHrNcI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was top class! Waiters went above and beyond to cater for us, gave us free bread and dips and also free ice cream desserts after our main dinner! very reasonable priced for the amount food given. Would definitely go again, was a nice introduction to Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxk36eiCPRCiGJ5POa47_7&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-8-7"},{"Name":"Greg Connor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlkf00DzXwW5mH52i0sybYFhWUQJUVJetT9bKiYVWN_7ZoMtZXZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just amended after 3rd visit in3 days !!!

The Service here really sets Oroscopo apart from its competition.
Which, in a row of three restaurants and a bar and being next door to hotel that has a good restaurant also with rave reviews makes the difference.
The guys are all wearing HUGO BOSS polo shirts looking very smart everybody has a smile everybody has time. Nothing is too much the Pre starter bread and potato and leek soup on our first visit was a lovely touch as was the continuous supply of water which when it‚Äôs 35¬∞ you absolutely need the raspberry Coulis  and the free ice cream at the end of the meal all made the experience just a little bit more special
Greek salad was incredibly fresh and nicely seasoned, but the absolute humdinger is the beef short ribs.
Go to this restaurant just to have this dish and I promise you will not be  disappointed.
It was my son‚Äòs choice. I was gonna go for the lamb but when he said I think Greek salad and beef short ribs that I was sold and it was exceptional. I can only thank the team And the Chef for making it a really special night as always we all ended up talking football with Greek teams and Premier League banter made us feel  incredibly at home and relaxed. This really is a super place to spend the evening drinking cold beer and chatting honestly we are so lucky it‚Äôs a stones throw  from our hotel and we will be going back tonight. It was that good.

OK, today is Sunday and we have visited every evening for the last three evenings on Friday evening, My son had the fillet steak black Angus medium rare. I had the moussaka we had a selection of starters see photographs below. Food is exceptionally good hence why we‚Äôve been back now three times but again, I cannot emphasize how important the staff are in this absolutely Wonderful find of a restaurant..
And last night being Saturday, we had spent the day walking around the island of Poros  so we weren‚Äôt in the mood to walk very far from the hotel and yet again the guys at Oroscopo outdid themselves with some awesome truffle, ravioli, and chicken skewer

I simply cannot recommend this totally exceptional gem enough get the boys talking about football and you‚Äôll be amongst friends immediately especially if you like Liverpool Man city or Man utd üòÜ

We still have five days left of our trip and we will definitely be back again thank you guys for making it such an exceptional part of our evening .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD56_x2ZXGGN3RmkMAN167X&fid=0x0:0x68dbe9ba33174a8a"],"When":"2025-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ivan Kotov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPb-IGTC9AYNQcpcnM6qBis6L6gnYOod8BhevvduMByzAYg7GD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were here as a group of four.
We had breakfast ‚Äî a salad with sausage and eggs.
The meatballs were very tasty.
The chicken fillet was also good.
Nice atmosphere with Greek music and good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuID_eyNNLmXkKZJnhmceB&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"M G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx7z8buI0A-oxa-E0vO5htexCZy7PzAFwSeDVMEWLaYwGKt45C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolutely fantastic meal! The food quality here is exceptional, focusing on flavorful and high-quality ingredients.

We particularly loved the traditional plates: the stuffed vine leaves were tender and savory, and the Saganaki was perfectly pan-fried.

The Sudjuk karamanlidiko with fried eggs was a spicy, hearty delight. Finishing with the sweet, cheesy Kunefe was the perfect end. The service was excellent‚Äîattentive and welcoming.

A must-visit for authentic, delicious Greek-Anatolian cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNy5AlV0NYxTN8OoqEx_tQ&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-11-25"},{"Name":"T√¥ Quang Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxXyPl0Fy988Wf_lcFdbgE57LTDC26PTPfYWInpbkmS6YrOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for dinner on a rainy day without a reservation, the restaurant was quite crowded and we had to wait about 10 minutes. The food was delicious with specialties from sausages, cheese... The female staff were not very happy, they could not even smile. The atmosphere of the restaurant was very warm. Introduce everyone to the restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzh0ava6HK-P9JzKS34nix&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Abby Bonello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7wmXxVjFnZGXrL0vniJrwTNNz3_-VpKU4EqImJvJTImqqAvZx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such kind and friendly staff! Food is exceptionally great and quality is made with love. Definitely make a reservation beforehand, its worth it! The owner is a very sweet lady who walks around and makes everyone feel at home. Everything is fresh and home made. Doesn‚Äôt get much better than this üíõ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCMrV9TpZsI8GsAvrBZVyHy&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Katherine Gall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOPLYU5z8Q-_YZXtE68vJPoEl0FBnv37cBiqMMUFqqfHOYZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited twice - once for lunch, another time for dinner - and enjoyed both experiences. The food was well seasoned and had great flavours, and the staff were friendly. I appreciated that a server gave me a heads up that the eel dish was served cold - it was a wonderful dish, but I was glad to know what to expect.

I tried the meatballs, potato salad with mustard dressing, smoked eel from Anta, and aubergines & zucchini in Cappadocian sauce. All were very good.

I didn't need a reservation for a solo late lunch, but I recommend a reservation for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxa8ph-ukYDID4cSEWHnvg&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Karim Fakhry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIwGhBhIN9H0bFgIhtFm61wyKkchCl-R48y1YMehzI8v8s1ZTo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Right by the central market, just after you‚Äôve stocked up on Cretan herbs and fragrant organic oregano, you can grab lunch at this old-school deli that doubles as a neighborhood kitchen.

The vine leaves are impossibly tender, melting with each bite. The cheese rolls with sujuk are perfectly crisp, with just the right kick of spice.

And on your way out, you can finish your food-market run by stocking up on charcuterie too, if that‚Äôs your thing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDFRpmRbfSX6d4S3FiqExDC&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Li sheng Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKj_UfmQt3ckuEGToqN5l2M3eW6TTZNMEJtjkkbkEJLBaurA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On the way back to our hotel, we saw a long line of locals waiting outside this restaurant, so we decided to give it a try. It turned out to be an amazing choice!

The restaurant has an open kitchen and a bar that looks like a traditional butcher shop, creating a great atmosphere as soon as you walk in. Right after sitting down, we were offered complimentary ham and cheese ‚Äî even though it was free, the quality was impressive.

We ordered sausages, meatballs, and smoked fish appetizers. The portions were generous, and every dish was incredibly delicious. We ended up finishing everything and still felt like we wanted more. After the meal, the restaurant also served complimentary yogurt with shredded carrots for dessert, which was refreshing and surprisingly tasty.

When leaving, the friendly owner personally asked about our dining experience, which made us feel truly welcomed.

The only downside was that the waitress who took our order didn‚Äôt smile at all and looked rather unfriendly ‚Äî probably because it was too busy.

Overall, the food, atmosphere, and hospitality were excellent. Definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAReON6BM8VPlQTk9VGJHyp&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Erkan Pinar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXVaoKEIDsTEiQLBO3P1VGLQRglQp02qIDtdtqBDugQwFImZTe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If one ever needed a reminder that greek, turkish and perhaps other eastern mediterranean cuisines are related, a visit at Karamanlidika is that reminder. As a Turk myself, I found heaps of dishes that I know from home, and the next table was a central asian couple that was equally delighted. The place is in the cash&carry district of Athens, so it also caters for other food places, but also serves food. The queue outside tells you how famous it is. But beware: it is perhaps not the place for your average greeek food. The place is a shop for cold cuts, sausages, cheeses and condiments for all these, so the food is neatly centred around these. And delicious they are! Authentic mediterranenan Mezze served by friendly and competent staff. If you have been to Turkey to eat Mezze, you will not be disappointed here. I will certainly be back next time! Cok teshekk√ºr & Sas efcharist√≥!  5*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCX6PsnVTnoyLduz2MfXLjd&fid=0x0:0x53427c892f9c3c25"],"When":"2025-10-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Konstantinos Kalogerakis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-7nn9p43nrBOJcEoY6YwCosM5ADp_KqXMAFPQtVFsKqkzjX4XZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A festive dinner with the team that went well! With a huge schnitzel, a ribeye, a caccio e Pepe and more‚Ä¶ it was the perfect place for this season. Chef Panagiotis Flakas has extensive experience in Michelin restaurants like Fat Duck & Funky Gourmet and service is top-notch (thanks Marios!!!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8EMUYAf518yyJRs3ng8Ni&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Kathy Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZiQaHADn7OxVNaTglKc9jMv0HFBQv82ad3xR4Jf0fMFVB8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our last night in Athens was met with the most peaceful and elegant dinner.  Service and food were amazing and my cappuccino with Orgeat was impeccable.  Cacio e Pepe was great and the steak cooked to perfection. The most beautiful bathrooms as well and all decorated for Christmas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAvtqxruwg5c0ZIosFh6iU9&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-11-22"},{"Name":"Margo Sparks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpbMtnHB7FMCugEyD1nSsxScn_96ZFyTzduuV09tVbly2OugQ9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good!! We walked into a very pleasing atmosphere, flowers and clouds! The service was impeccable. We asked to move due to someone smoking a cigar and they moved us immediately. The Gyro Iberico, hummus, pasta, salad and chicken were the highlights. The staff was welcoming and we are excited to go again once we return to Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6VoKp6FL_VmBvnbW7Y_5b&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-8-17"},{"Name":"Ilyass B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLF2GwRtJt2XTlqpRcTHKB2dVTr5YbLmeubBMLL_14ebGR19U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to this restaurant because it was highly rated, and since I was only in Athens for 72 hours, I wanted to give it a try. I‚Äôm used to dining at some of the best restaurants in major cities around the world‚ÄîLondon, New York, Paris, Dubai, Saint-Tropez, and Mykonos‚Äîso I was curious to see if it lived up to the hype.

First, let‚Äôs talk about the food. It‚Äôs good, even very good‚ÄîI have nothing negative to say about the quality itself. However, when you compare the cuisine with the prices, that‚Äôs where the issue lies. For what you pay, you expect something truly outstanding. Taken on its own, the food is enjoyable, but the portions are extremely small‚Äîalmost like something you‚Äôd serve to a 14-year-old. For example, the Greek salad costs ‚Ç¨24, with a production cost of maybe ‚Ç¨2. Personally, I find that price excessive.

Then comes the service, which I found to be quite poor. I waited 33 minutes for a simple pasta dish with two small pieces of fish. When the waiter tried to tell me it had been ‚Äúless than 20 minutes,‚Äù I showed him the stopwatch I had running‚Äîit was clearly over 30.

Finally, the biggest downside for me was the music. It was unbearably loud, making it impossible to have a proper conversation. It felt more like being in a nightclub than in a fine dining restaurant.

So here‚Äôs my recommendation: if you‚Äôre going on a date and just want to impress someone, have a drink, or enjoy a small tasting plate, then it‚Äôs fine. But if you‚Äôre going alone like I did, with friends to talk, or to celebrate something, either be prepared to spend the evening without talking‚Äîor simply don‚Äôt go.

Overall, I‚Äôd give it a 12, maybe 13 out of 20 considering all of the above.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDMqTCZnXpggTgvVbZ9C5oF&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Eric Manriquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaiTghG7CTER0fr_NvW0TiMa31T7_Sj_Hx24TcygUBpwmJdMghZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very nice place. Overrated and prices are a bit high for the offerings. Not a great menu variety but very nice place for an intimate dinner. The live music and singer are definitely a big plus","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAV5524zoLEyx--cNgSFJl4&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-8-20"},{"Name":"Amanda Magistad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8NUiWxQoCCytUeAMZvvlYVx_igTAgTHnAWSgIQmzUo1GA_72a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated my birthday dinner at Geco and it was the perfect spot for a special occasion. The atmosphere is elegant but not pretentious, with live music adding a beautiful ambiance to the evening. Every dish we tried was exceptional‚Äîfrom the octopus and beef tartare to the seafood lollipops and lamb. The service was attentive and thoughtful. As a surprise, they brought out a birthday profiterole dessert that was dreamy and indulgent. Geco gave us one of our most memorable meals in Greece. A must if you're looking for a special night out in Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjMG6qwMwJc7vfnPpCPpDm&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-6-21"},{"Name":"Jacob Aller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzdkeuGfQl2QYtPvY8x9gOa-oWls0ZODhqirzX6SPeJGxrpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have eaten at similar style of restaurants all across North America, and Geco was as good or better than any other meal I‚Äôve ever had. If you are ever in Athens, you would be remiss to not eat here. By far the best meal I have had in a long time. We loved it so much we ate here twice in a week. I will certainly be back the next time I find myself in Athens. If I could give it 6 stars I would. Brilliant restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC4QeLYp0IrmuoMqSTc8c7i&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-10-23"},{"Name":"Luc√≠a Tacaliti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViXS8Eeh8DhnEXWqoNXfiuFeXPMItafUPxpfuBabM_9f8ploLZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place is lovely as well as the servers, the food just needs a little more effort. Good experience overall, but I don‚Äôt know if I would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDJUp8ZoKN4m5q0qABqrd7C&fid=0x0:0x159d90db539a2b0c"],"When":"2025-12-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steve Gianacopoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTfBGaq0GaM33-3m1k4myln0EKNWzRKBF0xsvc4r2LI_nnkzPq3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent stop to share small plates. A varied menu with traditional Greek dishes. This is a bit off the main path and easy to not notice as you walk by but, check out the menu and you'll be glad you stopped. Good food, good prices and excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2oBNmtNK6DAov0yyXRQ7y&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-9-18"},{"Name":"Y A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUelG6d1m4D9pig9owlyeWlGI4IxzRSTvLBYSnFhgmblQBWoR3Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was better than the food. I am sure the fries were from a frozen bag instead homemade due to lack of flavor. The staff were nice and friendly and the restaurant serves all day long. I recommend using sea salt and/or mineral salt to improve the quality and taste of the food. Roadside parking available nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKFGXcgZuKHlEbOfoZcXEI&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-8-21"},{"Name":"Nate's Trip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGXfYYEQsYraO3ITlAoyULc0mD_yZxtSkN6zxf655Ljy2_ilVvfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a real gem ! Prices are amazing, food is delicious And people are friendly.
We tried :
The mushroom risotto which it taste like Italy üëåüèª
The Greek pasta who had a touch of salty pork in it.
The open gyros which is full of flavors.
The desserts are decadent.
We went there for a couples of days in a row. I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA8AMvh0wNy_WWEJUaCaYOV&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-9-1"},{"Name":"Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrhnpFh5p0-E97xlso_OqudbEMNhKigOusA4pGRHmn2Tk68QU6ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trendy restaurant in Athens serving traditional dishes with a unique twist. I opted for the open gyros which was absolutely delicious. Very fresh and the pitta bread was the tastiest I had had in Athens. Big portions too! Nice staff, and vibe. Definitely recommend for lunch or dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDjrtadM1DY23-4YdRYacl_&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-10-5"},{"Name":"Liz E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsMfz2l3a5B5F1xiFUz8NYNUFJkeQjzQOYwH5C7fMqN5U10UQY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One word: delicious! A nice outdoor seating area with excellent music! The food was delicious and not expensive at all! Service could have been a little quicker but overall a very pleasant experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBiRsCPds088Rz1ENODuUNP&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"k y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_QIHByDIoNKk94YVp32MHU-bxjCPNMbxndjMmTkO6WQxOyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful softly lit caf√© with a welcoming atmosphere. The staff were warm and friendly, and the meatballs with yogurt and tomato sauce were amazing. Everything on the menu looked so good that I wish I had more than one stomach! Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAblfjz-QuwGLA60wbP5_Rw&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Sabrina Rempel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqyZ-Ac-57DEYrN9OJeEqJVw7_m0hkEZoXvKg4QNvGTqw9Y267=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visiting from the US, this was the first place we ate after landing and all the food was PHENOMENAL!! So fresh and filling. Our waitress was very kind and patient when we asked questions about the menu. You must order the feta cheese and pastry with honey and sesame for a starter, then get the open gyro as the main, you will not regret it! Very affordable as well, ‚Ç¨20 for these 2 items and a large water","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGvpvSbe3U3qg1Rnknd56I&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-8-14"},{"Name":"Kenjamonster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe47NiDPMPWZe7l3Ck8UzIvt6P6vw5n0F9aMmJq2-9ErZqIn4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most lovely places to go and eat. You'll love the decor, the seating and light music making it enjoyable. The food is well priced and delicious üòã remember to save space for their lovely pot desserts.
But best of all is the owner and staff welcoming you to the joint. I went many years ago and came back, purely because of their hospitality.
The moussaka is very tasty as is their souvlaki. After a long day, I always seem to pass here for a bite to end my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBVCT85XzhYoHB4UZU3SGA4&fid=0x0:0xce90e826092a64b0"],"When":"2025-6-13"}]
