user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Netanel Nesher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI8pE3gF_1ezfZclfO4lIPsBGr2M_NABCPPc1kaIyo3g0o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Absolutely amazing restaurant!
If you‚Äôre in Athens, you have to eat in this culinary marvel!
The food is perfect, every dish was out of this world!!
The staff is super nice and welcoming!
We had a blast! 15/10!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCbsII6bFByUwblE2l7-KiT&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-12-17"},{"Name":"Cathy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR6xZNHwl-GQV32ycfd3wuMq_N99vyVGCztJNN6BqX1EPDCFg7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend the food here. The seabass dish was beautiful, plating and flavor. The skin was nice and crispy but tender flesh and everything else on the plate went so well with it. The cr√®me br√ªl√©e was very good too, nice crispy sugar top.
There was no wait for a table and helpful staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEAHvzGNhPt6qeV_EJDSoZ&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Fabrice Lucien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrDwVmcsj5D6e-RmzH2cOo477ggcykDVhj3AQ5p_OuXk2ITCvR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone who travels by eating, Yphes completely won me over. This is not just a restaurant, it‚Äôs a full sensory experience. Every dish was a masterclass in modern Greek cuisine: delicate flavors, beautifully balanced, and presented with the kind of care that shows deep respect for both tradition and innovation.

The service was among the best I‚Äôve ever had, warm, attentive, and genuinely passionate. The team doesn‚Äôt just serve food; they curate moments. You leave feeling not only satisfied, but inspired.

If you‚Äôre a foodie visiting Athens, Yphes is an absolute must.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCotbMMajO9m1Mddz64Zfbh&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Rodney Lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtF1TcW-fCh2eVrxy02VEEDDhloTXxnpfYGQdyiqpfj8E7kZl3oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous presentation and so delicious. Had dinner here after walking Ermou. Thankful we were fit in without a reservation. On a quiet street beside a little park so it was not only amazing food and service but quiet enough to chat and relax. Highly recommend the ceviche and short ribs. Oh and their ‚ÄúAnother Aperol‚Äù was absolutely tasty and not just another.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUYDqqfpuDKjQtXyef1F0y&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"Madeline Tosca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf8-HVISena6q-VZn7cUblMhAFe5A-xbVczUFsJFflaX76ZBwa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don‚Äôt travel alone a lot but I felt so at home and comfortable here - Andres and Mercini (I‚Äôm sorry if I spelled them wrong) are a dream team and everything they recommended was incredible, they made me feel so welcome and their vibe is just amazing

The seabass ceviche was honestly the best thing I have ever eaten - and that is not an exaggeration. The food is exceptional, the service is amazing - I promised myself a delicious meal at a beautiful restaurant while in Athens and I found that in my first night. Thank you so much to the team - I will DEFINITELY be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-tqAW1n1_uF_A3vIcJjni&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-11-26"},{"Name":"samar mhanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOY61qWwcmNLngWws86OZWhjymtt2Scl_f_WMndNzdvDw_3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every dish was a marvel, very well balanced, the kind that gives you emotions at every bite. The bread & dips are made from scratch. The waiters were so kind & friendly & knew the details of every dish. Looking forward to coming again & taste the rest of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAxygQusyloBhL6V0bCfC69&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-11-28"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkPyCEcZUqrdx_8G0itwGf_CP7u46xIy8kvJm6gErPOK6NAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a hidden gem! This place is tucked away from the main streets ‚Äî quiet, calm, and genuinely non-touristic, which makes it feel special right away.

The menu is amazing, full of thoughtful flavors and beautifully presented dishes.
We absolutely fell in love with the sourdough bread with homemade butter ‚Äî soft, aromatic, with a hint of orange. OMG, 100/10! Easily one of the best breads we‚Äôve ever had.

The Yphes salad, beef tartar, and pork belly were all perfection ‚Äî balanced, flavorful, and cooked with real care. The potato croquettes were our least favorite (6/10), but still decent compared to everything else being outstanding.

Tiramis√π ‚Äî unbelievably light, creamy, and the perfect finish to an already perfect meal.

Thank you, Myrsini, for your kindness and hospitality.

Overall, this restaurant deserves way more attention. It‚Äôs calm, elegant, and feels like a secret spot locals would love to keep to themselves - highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD7V1Nl0yyyAmPn7jbVQv2b&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"yijing lin (Quinn)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8PVl749QFLsAPvFlwtJ-e4CQMbbH45mdtNFg9LMx6iAzZp4s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally the best restaurant I had in Athen! Every dish I ordered was super fantastic! Even the bread, the butter with lemon sauce and miso sauce was amazing! The only shortage is that the waiting time is long. But it‚Äôs totally worthwhile!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBe9iUifzZWPavyEgHG0D2T&fid=0x0:0xf3766447ac571f6e"],"When":"2025-10-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alfred Lewers Jr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWTwU6wGR3Qy44R9s9uC5SUl-7i5OQsH3FsnduiENVrq2UQltQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic Spot for Breakfast, Lunch, and People-Watching!

This place is truly a chameleon of a spot. I stumbled upon Eatery by chance, as it was just a stone‚Äôs throw from our hotel, and I‚Äôm so glad I did. It quickly became a favorite‚Äîgreat for breakfast, lunch, and even late-night people watching.

I ended up coming here for breakfast twice during my week in Athens. The meals were hearty, incredibly delicious, and priced perfectly. The service was excellent both times. The staff were warm, friendly, and even took time to chat with us about where we were visiting from.

I‚Äôd definitely recommend Eatery as a go-to breakfast and lunch spot. A great find in Athens!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMgPIu7no_D1-c0A0hGmH4&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"Rebekah Fitzgerald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMOexSePJKVNNCo5BC5SVFNkRiE50PM5x6oCknCLeZYhzLqCe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed our meal here! It was our first time in Greece and the food was outstanding. We ordered the chicken skewers and kebab with pita bread, and both meals were full of flavour, tender and juicy meat, and great portion sizes. The homemade lemonade is also delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHB_7dJAjV-CP-NCKzlqWc&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"A80s M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT7ZOBYQCWjQbbZtpEQAWFtZqYleGWH1AifUKCf4oGcYXkKCc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant exceeded our expectations. Refreshing menu with nice diversity. Finally something different around Athens. All dishes had a nice twist, all cooked to perfection and beautifully presented. High quality restaurant. We have enjoyed all dishes. All were perfect. On top of everything, great value for money. All dishes very well priced. One of the best restaurants we‚Äôve been during our 2 months holiday. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB6LabWSzLcKvTdFsIqYyjW&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"Jim Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIh3LYWebx823mX4zhH4nAhgePGWH2NSO49LGeQnB_IT2hgWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of all the eateries we recently visited in Athens, this one was our most enjoyably lunch. The love they have for producing a choice of top quality, fresh menu items was our luck.
We had the hummus and fresh salad with tomatoes.
Brilliant..nice change from the humdrum.
Totally recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD1AGB0dSXHxBtzJiiQgHTg&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Varan Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLlKdrC4ii26dE8vQ3iHat0aHqE9cgQ4yrql3zB4F3EraSoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were nicely welcomed as we entered the venu and was quiickly seated. The waitress was really polite and smiley. The food was fantastic and came out in good time. The prices are reasonable.I am really pleased. Will come here again and reccomend others to visit this place too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD6bEMm_PxlE-YLyGUlevCI&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-11-19"},{"Name":"Stav Ernikioili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuGG08CLq0cF0SEjKoBlichGw26usqRS2B3SzqDDBXJI-8BqK2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really friendly staff and caring! They were closing but still let me finish without interrupting or pushing to eat faster.

Got the best falafels I‚Äôve ever eaten and a homemade lemonade - I tried oftentimes in other places but this one was almost perfect!
I had the vegetarian falafel plate and it was huge, so I had to take the rest with meüò∏
I got a mastixa shot for free in the end.

Highly recommend, especially when you want something vegan or vegetarian.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBW67QqPRZoE4FooiQD0lQp&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Chef Kit Smyth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdO9FcaysZLkrMydwJMqfR43vV2Ui31gzNO_wRRUCdX7wxcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Go hungry, leave groaning. Has to be the best bbq in Athens. We tried the mixed grill, to sample a bit of everything, and would easily order the wings and ribs in a heartbeat. The pomegranate bbq basting sauce is to die for. We also had the slaw as a starter, and found it to be the perfect accompaniment to the bbq - tangy, crisp and packed with flavour!
Service was Spartan, but friendly enough, and prices were fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDgv1XdHgmTU3hxAsR0dLWT&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Ana Maria Prutean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIQN5XZwjvHCWSh7Cz8wZUOwjyz9CINpvu3vKTheDgQaPU-omCjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing food, had one of the best lunches here! Fresh ingredients, extremely flavourful, the falafel was out of this world, so were the hummus and babaganush. Amazing service, plenty of outside sitting and much quieter than the adjacent busy streets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCfAA2tUxuQltXpPdbar2v_&fid=0x0:0x7a91907922e59a58"],"When":"2025-11-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlSYdzVdotUjdMfiSPbSURkPer7oVTS7OaaDXCphMR_a_7EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing experience!
The food was incredibly good ‚Äì we tried the lamb and the deer, and both were unbelievably tender and full of flavor. Truly outstanding quality.

The service was just as fantastic. The waiter Andreas - was extremely friendly, took the time to explain everything, gave great recommendations, and really engaged with us. You could tell he genuinely cared and wasn‚Äôt in a rush at all.

A truly great dining experience ‚Äì highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOS1LT7cDOzEcDAlv-OwDl&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Tereza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBr9y24j2zy-j-GPcMxi52uPZurjAnJ5UqTx5c01smiwPl9HgiQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here with my boyfriend for our last late lunch in Athens. We were randomly recommended this restaurant by a stranger in a nearby caf√©, and we were both absolutely thrilled. Honestly, it is my favourite memory from our trip.

The food was amazing, and so were the people. The atmosphere truly felt like home. Thank you so much for the food and for the aperitif for our way home.

If we ever find ourselves back in Athens, we will most definitely come again.

11/10 for everything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBmOBy4rAs1e-BfBDvNXQIw&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Sriwanti Bhattacharya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQRcZ1gm-kw3GEYMactZ8xpAn2sK_GHByBpraiQaBGcq2ng6-b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was simply out of the world!

Authentic Greek food, and delicious favours. The meat was slow cooked to perfection, falling off the bones, with a side of fresh Greek salad and a lovely wine collection.

We also had Ouzo, an anise-flavoured aperitif, considered the national drink of Greece. Washed it all down with Mastic Tears, a sweet liqueur produced with the mastika resin from the Greek island of Chios.

The owners and staff at the restaurant were kind and friendly and we had a great time chatting with them too.

Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a  good meal after a long day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBmwtKscW8X_F4Y4IMsrqTH&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Bertrand Hieronymus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRUoitsLTRXI4XRG2O-ValB5sxr2nuGvu5_qrABLPaVWgslzo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic.
Not only from Greece, the restaurant takes inspiration from other countries.
We had the Euphoria salad, the hummus and the caramelized cheese dfor appetizers and all were awesome. But the mushroom pasta was yet even more üòç
Staff were friendly and smiling always here to help us.
Would definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAAaPZ2XlPobuhYrOVAET1K&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"Aliki Moysiadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJefwLAfjArW71ghzAWjS3JBU7fFxMIHzj7PLri4ecv6KdEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic evening at A Little Taste of Home. The atmosphere was on point and the food was exceptional. We tried the fatteh starter, the tagliatelle with tenderloin, ravioli with wild mushrooms and rice noodles with mushrooms mains. Everything was lovely. The one thing that stood out was the hospitality and how welcoming the staff were. Would not hesitate to return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCbwWkFzrPmD2iJJO3jvMK3&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"Apurva Chandola (Apu)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULz1sIc2EaTwZXCFs3AyLF7HPaXElyNBsRWfQhVjRjIHLx0GjsYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG! What a meal. Found this place was highly reviewed and so came and was blown away by the experience. The slow cooked lamb, which is cooked over 9 hours literally melts and falls off the bone and when eaten with the gravy and mashed potatoes, it's super yummy. And to balance that out, I ordered the greek salad which was made of the freshest tomatos, cucumbers, onions, capers, olives, feta cheese, etc and was the perfect accompaniment. Then our waiter was nice and gave us some complimentary sourdough bread and 2 dips, one a tangy tomato based dip like a salsa and the order made from beetroot. Oh, this was so good. To top it off they gave us some free liqueur to help with the digestion. I cannot recommend this place enough. And just outside is a great view of the acropolis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAheYdWRT4uRphF1aFoK0Sk&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"Minions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf1JLHY2qHuBFr866aJ43JWsdxOAFOWkO3IlTZAQYRh8DpaqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They‚Äôve both inside and outside dining area.  Easy to get table at 1pm even though it‚Äôs Sunday.

Atmosphere: cozy and clean with nice music

Location: close to Main Street.  Easy to access

Food:  salad is great.  Meat balls tastes good but a bit too dry.  Beef ribs are so tender but it would be nice if it‚Äôs more juicy.  Now it‚Äôs good to eat with the delicious mashed photos

Staff are so friendly, helpful and polite.  They introduced every dishes with passion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAfHRbmazMoWADXDs6ibin4&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"Joel Pagett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9GzDV6w6mX_yH4nPmKzCVvFboz1VL5gy9IQQuNAQVjjVz8G_ABQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited A Little Taste of Home on my first night in Athens, having been recommended a visit. The restaurant is on a bustling street, and offers both indoor and outdoor seating, depending on what you prefer.

After being warmly welcomed, we sat down and explored the menu. To start, my husband and I shared some fabulous meatballs. They were delicious and a very hearty portion, too.

For my main course, I opted for a ‚ÄòEuphoria‚Äô salad, a combination of smoked chicken, Gorgonzola, and strawberries‚Äîwhich sounded intriguing. It wasn‚Äôt something I‚Äôd had before, but the combination worked, and it was delicious.

The service was very friendly and attentive, and overall we had a great meal. I would definitely recommend a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAwY8iVuhb0riaMNVt0l7Ex&fid=0x0:0x76477085b720f36f"],"When":"2025-10-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Magda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURLxEB2VTEVbney-FBDPEKDgSptrQOK5keyR3_BlCyiXrG1nkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a lovely place. I'd recommend it.
Unfortunately the food in Athens is really disappointing and this is the only place we've found that had consistent good food.
The place is really cute and has a nice vibe. There's live music some evenings. Prices aren't crazy. Staff is nice. One real issue I have is that the tables are so close to one another that you basically sit with strangers if the place is full. It's not too comfortable. The place definitely lacks privacy.
A couple of times we got a free dessert and a glass of greek liquor.
I'd definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLOsI93-own6ap_yDly4en&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Tiago & Rumi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpg22l9_hXP_jSbTp1kmEHmupgxIIjZfmZEPzrKUZVaniJ9pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the best experience at Mironi! Food is incredibly tasty, staff is very friendly, they have live music in the evenings and they serve you the best dessert for free! They also gave us shots at the end with the bill, very nice gesture! We came back here twice just because everything was so perfect, highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBSUrXHvoouqSv19-UIXn1l&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Surayio Matsiakubava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKb6JIwYROYZVnQFo7ZrsFor1j3GHaGh-LJlwcZFU05wqCpM1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got in love with the place. Perfect service. Great , delicious and mouth watering food .
The staff is cool and so fast and welcoming.
Atmosphere is just perfect so authentic.
We came here twice in a week during the new year days and we also got some delicious gifts after the dinner for the new year  ‚ò∫Ô∏èso nice of them üòä
Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpjRP6uE9miKE__FwieNd8&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Tanya Martianov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk6dtczJjLQS4RtN4I-9MhQk_9arIk9uLvl19AdfG7iegrK_nO9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful restaurant with beautiful decor. The food and wine were delicious, and the staff was incredibly welcoming and friendly. We celebrated a birthday‚Äîjust the two of us‚Äîand it was such a lovely touch to receive congratulations and a complimentary cake with a candle. I also thoroughly enjoyed the live music and the plate-smashing dancing! We had a wonderful time and a truly memorable birthday. Thank you!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDtsoZgRfQYMKovIWOX0yhP&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Our adventures Around","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNcCTt0B8mPJW8qn7cwYfFhVpvYsd4rT8li3Z5xPYKyprLCBSa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an absolute gem of a restaurant! Amazing food, fantastic staff, great atmosphere and amazing entertainment that is even better the later you stay!!! üçΩÔ∏èüçΩÔ∏èüçΩÔ∏èüçΩÔ∏è

If you‚Äôre looking for traditional food, family values and super tentative staff then MIRONI is the best Athens has!

We visited twice, the food was fantastic both times and full of flavour! The Mixed Grill is phenomenal and so well presented that you don‚Äôt want to destroy it by eating!

The kebabs are also so flavoursome and sided with a Greek Salad you‚Äôre going to be full!

portion sizes are ample, we struggled to eat everything but focused on the amazing meats and salad, such great flavour.

If you don‚Äôt make a reservation you may have a short wait, if you do make a reservation then turn up on time unlike the very unhappy couple who subsequently had to wait! (Time is of the essence an hour late isn‚Äôt acceptable)

Food and flavour is always important but so is the location, the close proximity to the Wyndham And Stanley hotels makes it at times busy but well worth the wait!

This is Greek food at its finest!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCqr1a77zdTlizTLXUO9PpQ&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2025-9-9"},{"Name":"Teej Sosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPJFGUxq1uzGspeSAT-YWYYcfmWAmgBEDGceTDIZp2ioJqh8K7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EXCELLENT FOOD!!!!! Highly recommended by the locals. The grilled octopus and the lamb chops are PERFECT‚Äîso tender and flavorful. Staff Franco and Marius are very friendly and also gave us pannacotta on the house. We will be back to try their Moussaka. üôåüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD_ZICV8nHJYReyJLRaqg43&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2026-1-5"},{"Name":"Olga Boyko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfPrriHsFVVo0QV9gL4xz0zn4mKpAY5q9xkmulk4_rDRWpeXmt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very atmospheric and cozy place with pleasant background music and a relaxing vibe. The dishes were delicious, and the complimentary dessert was a lovely surprise ‚Äî a very nice touch from the restaurant. A great spot for a calm and enjoyable lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCsb4Y_YYrKWH--rKA9wspS&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Ashraf Abu Rmeleh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2D7-AazXdaqkRrGvq7PrHHjsg_BxMAd2iIdSiK6A2_Sit3vjE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Actually, I wanted to go to Alexander the Great Restaurant next to this one, but it was closed on Sunday, so I decided to try this place instead ‚Äî and I‚Äôm so glad I did! The food was delicious, the service was excellent, and the prices were reasonable. The portions were very generous, and at the end, they even offered us dessert and a shot on the house! Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD71_nAv6__4ld3J30mAywy&fid=0x0:0xd2e12b82e54f59e6"],"When":"2025-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Milena Di Pardo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPCHeXuiSvfI1yRZhgFeAI1WUe93mGqq1mm23_VOa-z0D3etg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant, lovely atmosphere, friendly and kind staff. Food is delicious and authentic.
Only down side , you can‚Äôt book but waiting time is not much so if you end up there with a long queue is worth waiting, trust me.

My favourite dishes have been the Feta Antitamos , Moussaka, grilled Lamb chops. Absolutely delicious, accompanied by red house wine jar. Fairly priced compare to other places and just next to the restaurant lots of bars to continue your night out.

At the end of the meal they take a little sweet at the table , baklava .

Been there 4-5 times in row for dinner during my holidays in Athens and I can confirm was best restaurant we been to .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD0_fWqLDYJ28p4qcePU_nH&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Micah Ang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9_KPUluuWrz3gSWpu97Z9avvwk8UsBqPQvmVdn6hPjYkoWak=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was excellent. Unfortunately, we had to wait about an hour for the main dish due to confusion in the kitchen. The staff sincerely apologized, and although we had ordered baklava, they did not charge us for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCP4F9tJ2Dxue5lHRQPd-QU&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"M Faleni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfSKmZHRgtofa0alJ8U15_bX1Ruv6o1iqxNADkRq2eBKi17g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the freshest ingredients. The lamb was absolutely divine. The portion sizes are massive! There was no way a single person could finish the lamb but we are not complaining. It was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtCmYSUjuUn4sEFJqdBELs&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-10-23"},{"Name":"Hatice MERƒ∞√á","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvDOP8hp2fUtCf98_t2av-PC7dyc1nLpz4RcdmzWPwhlV0UBi2Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered tzatziki, dolma, grilled sardines, and fried zucchini. Everything tasted amazing. For dessert, we had lemon pie. The atmosphere was very nice, and the staff were attentive and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDmo1ka4WrMjbMTDeKc8HG-&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Cameron C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4OhMFFSxTEYhKL0KoAUk2dpLp6oQucBy4xTuwXx8BvQL9Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was fast, portions were pretty good. We loved the potatoes with feta and dolmades! We didn‚Äôt have a reservation but managed to get a table (had to wait maybe 10-15 minutes).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAqNey6Ydeewwv3ermwmG2_&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-9-23"},{"Name":"Marieta M√∂rz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKpKQXxtJKTx8KuLx_Qz1A35X1R7-VPATsWoNyf48SvGJx8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very very good greek food
The Souvlaki with chicken was so good and the Mousaka, the Feta,Fried zucchini and tzatziki were perfect. The hot green peppers were really spicy,i recommend the pita bread and tzaziki in combination very good.
We were a second time here because of the food,nice atmosphere inside and outside and the restroom is a must see (very clean) and the hand washing mechanism is a must see","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOYCxrV16-zywNDwy2tbmZ&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-11-28"},{"Name":"Francesca Manea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA1ujnnPJ0XFX6F6ul15Bs7UkiWignCTIdGlcsgiUEDjpLd8dH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent price-quality ratio.
All the staff are quality, they speak a little romanian which helped us choose what to order, but also an excellent english.
We waited to enter the street because there were no places where we were served with a drink for each!
Highly recommend!
We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBA1DGVKofqQWV2WpN20axp&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Camy Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBJeJUCPgFA7u5EiMOKONP5vLkF3JzKRQFGvs7CJb7mly5WplLTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were able to walk in without reservation for an earlier dinner. Solid Greek food. Not the best I‚Äôve ever had but nothing disappointed. A bit of a walk from our hotel through some run down buildings. The staff were mostly friendly and I would recommend this restaurant if you‚Äôre in the area. However I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs necessary to go out of your way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATHKwLHk9MJyCUlIrBx7-r&fid=0x0:0x8c00306a91fb5c65"],"When":"2025-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francois Boisvert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2je0jaMSghcjqhJu8JOB4ojmcZDQvt8ks1eUu5i_FRr8zePTC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were convinced to go in by the gentleman in front of the restaurant and are we ever glad we did.  Let's start with the basics, food was incredibly delicious, service was really good and prices were very reasonable.  Happy hour with 7 euros per cocktail was also a good deal.

Now, the extraordinary... The location and the atmosphere.  Of all the spots we've visited so far during our vacation, this one felt the most out of this world.  The patio by the street is very nice and would have been a gem by itself if it wasn't for the interior garden they have at the back.  Truly unique experience that transports the patrons to another world.  As if this wasn't enough, the interior decor is also so well appointed that even on a cold evening, if you were to eat inside, you'd still feel like you are in another world.

Definitely worth a stop, for drinks or food, you won't be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBG0H0bQUJqw1ig-0rXdqUL&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-9-20"},{"Name":"Linda Lichter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWrHefrjMbVuT0bw46AE3xjCOyLxtOWQcY0Il7KdhtqOK8gDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We choose this restaurant because of the amazing reviews. The food was ok but kind of bland, it needed more seasoning. The appetizers where the best part.

Our server was friendly but felt a bit unenthusiastic.

In the end I don‚Äôt think the price was worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAm75vJOzeZ8r2pvOiR8Y-E&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-10-11"},{"Name":"ShuShu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7MA-Vowlijgmlx08Gp8KOLNlAjqTN0DO6aooI9-LqI6dTYDE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked into an amazing restaurant with a warm and welcoming host. We got great recommendations for a few dishes the portions were generous and everything was delicious. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBjQ8bEE2VoUba1a4O1Mgab&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Gundel Grother","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6TcGkHsdpvKNv9z-EAOxVxvJs5P_HCL2CT6iA89dMjlgaFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience! The food was scrumptious. Not that typical tourist food where you eat once and know better next time.
Service was impeccable.
Loved the suggested gin with basil. Perfect for those hot summer days. Not sweet at all.
The octopus.. well, I‚Äôm picky with octopus.. and this one was tender, charcoaled, and flavorful. No regrets. The fries - best I had in Athens. The hummus - out of this world. Just perfectly balanced.
Definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhADdh-o_7biJI-mtTycwvPV&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-8-25"},{"Name":"Anat Orgad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs6roKXhxrV1T_pSJO66-xFSqoqaPXAQ6cRbfAGUMI3Pg6e9VZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited the restaurant as a family and had a lovely experience overall. The main dishes were good and well-prepared, and we really enjoyed the flavors. The hamburger was delicious and the shrimp pasta. However, we found the seafood dishes to be a bit less appealing  especially the mini shrimps, it was funny to see it and understand how to eat it. The service was great and friendly, and the atmosphere was very pleasant. Thank you for the warm hospitality","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMrtubKB68b6aw&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-6-1"},{"Name":"Bessie Carro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBwczYmbHwmyRo2Mmv2hA2SWxkTOAV6FTCvT53cYwa7824Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great evening here. The happy hour cocktails for ‚Ç¨7 are delicious and well worth doing. The food was also fantastic and really good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdEPz3aTNRjh2UGT7yuisI&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Reema Ishak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAV9gP9Vpd4e0UAOUQlvCuOgWlcWz5kRjkOLJYS8xjitB78Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was amazing! The food, the service, the whole vibe and ambience. Very recommended.
Make sure to order their Feta with dried fruits speciality and their Moussaka üëåüèªüëåüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAqyqcX229KQwR09j-FjNHI&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-9-19"},{"Name":"Juan De Luca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYZSgFQNJ3hbNMFfQjm3CiIvrddoJUJ-3Mu2Oj1MriHsJF72Yxlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The waiters were good but I put 3 because of the attetude of the man taking the payment cause you pay inside, asked if I could pay im cash and asked to leave tip  there.
Food was not good, it looked nice but wouldn't recommend it at all, really mediocre, it didn't feel fresh, you can get far better food in other places near by","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBcwI1WnquYB_Q9vz2ar98Q&fid=0x0:0x28e1e2dc3340d092"],"When":"2025-11-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kennedy Johnstone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4h5lE9j4J7q8TMA8bE7TtNV3yBz_5O5cjlbodjt2N5S5F4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ended up dining at Brigante three times during our five nights in Athens, and it quickly became a favorite. From the start, the staff made us feel welcome with their friendly and attentive service. The food was consistently great‚Äîeach dish was flavorful, fresh, and well-prepared. The menu offered a nice variety, to suite everyone‚Äôs taste.

What really stood out was the service. The staff were polite and efficient, striking a perfect balance between being attentive and allowing us to enjoy our meal at a comfortable pace. It was clear that they took pride in offering a positive dining experience.

If you‚Äôre looking for a reliable spot in Athens with good food and friendly service, we definitely recommend Brigante. It‚Äôs a solid choice for a pleasant meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC18WGH6CS3Hrv6RCWYpmbr&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-12-3"},{"Name":"Ryan Varner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5TRxplRlf_n85J4Ey313boM2HxjSRnb8zhGyotH6WI0k65s0R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This little gem is proof a big location is not a necessity. Tucked away, it was a short walk from our hotel and worth every step.

We were seated right away by our graceous hostess and enjoyed our meal choices. The Pollo & Tartufo was very good and we agree with so many others on the pasta being the best we have ever had. We will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNCSW17Os8gV4wmx7bjRVS&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-11-28"},{"Name":"David Seligson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZadY7v8KxRh1mZWgxn3uhd5AOmd4jt0MOUQ0zyYArfluPJXsUNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic Italian meals! Being half Italian, I really needed a pasta meal. We shared the carpaccio as a starter. My wife got the chicken/mushroom/truffle paste tagliatelle pasta. I got the lemon/capers pasta. All was really delicious. Service was great. Very friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDO9ECg2TjyB7aYGDr6mWa&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"Philippos Koutsakas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7AqMaZNI-iLYGCqVB9O6AfKGtKYv3xsVXZ9tviE2DPyHWAv9SNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice choice if you are near Syntagma square and you want to  eat/drink away from the crows of Ermou and Syntagma.
Cosy place, inside a small alley, with choices of pasta, pizza and salads, smiling staff and good music.
I got the Cesar's sald and a beer :-)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8YXCqmlLCbgh6tt9aOkha&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Anna Pavli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7gxZQmIbcyAn-RCIHbmy2p_roPmKMiUIP9MJmxJioOGTY8w0zSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was really good and it has the restaurant has the atmosphere of Italy. Although it‚Äôs not 5 stars for me but a solid 4 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCKDpLAHnGmN0hYZw7VvuhP&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-11-24"},{"Name":"Reynaldo King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTcVVbfw40yjycoJNSFtZWiJBoAIhXheSr32D71byd_WsdTkU6XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and great. A definite must in Greece","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDaz2Hgx8zx9FXdI18uE59P&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Majed K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF0ELOny9Ovpvitp4AcH_AKiNR8pKWIgDG2x0_yiWoVEmlYAVt4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little small but surprisingly good food. The shrimp pasta was on point, well cooked and tender shrimps. The pizza dough was perfect opposite of soggy and crispy all around. Good ingredients and superb olive oil.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDb0qCYaA&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"sally zohney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhDtH8JaUO6QfPQJzbyeHkGk0v8d0F4_4YMEuYcHScfKbnjKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Italian cozy restaurant. The scampi tagilatelle is a speciality, the ingredients are fresh and portions are perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDCrMdfNPoXtgAWtVuVdhGE&fid=0x0:0x6a0dab6f09e21c2f"],"When":"2025-11-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Per Frimann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoIo-xhkx7da-xHbp3JS4YrI17aR727g97hO4ucEe7ZnYZeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This must have been the best food experience of my life, so far.

We went with 6 courses, got two starters and from the very first starter we could tell that we were in good hands. Everything was tasty, well composed and the sommellier had done a great job in her selection of wines which all complemented the food to perfection.

Thanks to everybody at Aleria!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDIbcKkV3rNkWJhhn4ErX4U&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Tessa C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmm0J5l3OerU3BLs2KtiWBpJ3jSv2SvirCbPLVZFdzMXxk3Ok1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing meal our last night in Athens. We were seated in the back garden that was serene and very atmospheric. Service was attentive and warm without being pretentious. You could choose 5, 6 or 7 courses. We chose 6 and wine pairing. The food was perfection, every course was unique. It was absolutely delicious and beautifully presented. The wines were extremely well chosen, the sommelier‚Äôs well curated taste were evident in every wine pairing. They had a vegetarian option as well. We especially appreciated that they were able to accommodate our son who has celiac disease and their gluten-free house made bread was delicious. This is a wonderful special occasion dinner, highly recommend. It was expensive but they delivered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBvtH7ne5C2fPl0ANUX-1QK&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-8-2"},{"Name":"William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIn5Akgs6Tk-OOp-axQiMBVx_adDLhRj-Bmj6ygN26Z4UN57CM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I celebrated our honeymoon in Greece and Aleria provided our best food experience from our trip.  They are a Michelin star restaurant and lived up to that!

Service - A+++
They are on top of everything when it comes to service.  Very attentive with refilling drinks, replacing your plates and silverware, seeing if you have questions/need anything, and checking to see you‚Äôre happy with the food.  They even offered to call us a taxi for pickup and walked us out to the taxi when it arrived.

Menu - large variety of drinks to choose from.  The food menu is limited to specific courses for vegetarian and non-vegetarian.  While that may make someone very picky hesitant, read this next section before you let that impact any decisions on making a reservation.  You can pick from a variety number of courses.

Food - A+++
They live up to the Michelin star rating with the flavors of the food.   My wife and I are big time foodies and we were very impressed with the amazing flavors of the food.  I personally am not a seafood fan outside of sushi and I really enjoyed the seafood courses.  We did the non-vegetarian 7 course meal and loved it.  Probably our favorite meal while in Greece.

Cost - This is a high end restaurant that offers top tier service.  You should expect to spend no less than $100 per person.  $150 per person if you‚Äôre getting drinks with the food.  But it‚Äôs absolutely worth it in our opinion.

We highly recommend reserving and enjoying a date night, special celebration, or just a nice and classy dinner at Aleria.  Top tier food and service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBCAKtq1vMRk2P-JFbU-4ce&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-8-28"},{"Name":"Brendan Newham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrGMX6D1wNAc9Hgy21bDF1wDADCGlTHJEwyNZqbkvBQnELkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Symphony of Greek Elegance and Warmth!

Nestled in the heart of Athens, Aleria is more than a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a sanctuary of taste, ambiance, and heartfelt hospitality. From the moment you step through its gates, you‚Äôre greeted by a peaceful hum of laughter and conversation, the kind that only comes from people truly enjoying themselves. It‚Äôs the kind of place where time slows down, and every detail invites you to savor the moment.

The culinary journey at Aleria is nothing short of enchanting. Each course is a masterclass in Greek gastronomy‚Äîcurated not just to feed, but to awaken. The flavors are bold yet refined, rooted in tradition but elevated with modern finesse. And if you‚Äôre wondering whether to choose your own wine, don‚Äôt. Trust the sommelier. Their pairings are pure alchemy, creating a seamless dance between plate and glass that heightens every bite and sip.

As the sun dips below the horizon, the courtyard transforms. Delicate lights twinkle in the trees, fairy-lit ornaments cast a gentle glow, and the entire space feels like a dream woven from warmth and wonder. It‚Äôs romantic, serene, and utterly magical.

A special acknowledgment must go to Panos and the entire Aleria team. Their grace, attentiveness, and genuine care elevate the experience from excellent to unforgettable. They don‚Äôt just serve‚Äîthey host, guide, and delight. Let them take the reins. You‚Äôll be glad you did.

Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned foodie or simply seeking a place to feel joyfully present, Aleria is a destination worth every moment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAOXqQLtDvpjoSdpz1sIOQF&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-8-23"},{"Name":"dawgg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtL7mAVl5whBmPL4oFECDX73zQR1_pVk0ZKlW_dXXnO2tZLzo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok, let me start with this:  Aleria is NOT a restaurant where you go for a ‚Äúquick‚Äù meal.  Plan to sit and enjoy.  It is truly fine dining, a wine pairing meal that is meant to be savored and allow the wine to seep in so you start talking more ;o) and enjoy the companionship of your party, whether its one other person for five others. On our recent trip to Athens we went because our friend, Effie, said it was a must do.  We were definitely NOT disappointed.  Thank You Effie!!

The meal unfolded with an amuse bouche and ended several hours later with an equally amazing digestif.  In between we were treated to a dance of amazing flavor combinations and the most sumptuous lamb I have ever had.  Each course and wine were paired perfectly, and we were very pleased that the red was an ‚ÄúEarth and Sky‚Äù from northern Greece, a wine we had discovered days earlier in Thessaloniki.  5 courses were perfect for us but you should try 6 or 7 if you skip luncheon.  The Amberjack course was a delightful surprise.

The staff was knowledgable, unobtrusive and professional, with a sense of humor thrown in.  They made for an amazing evening.  Thank you.  Excellent service is a treasure.

GO NOW BEFORE THEY GET A MICHELIN STAR BECAUSE YOU WON‚ÄôT BE ABLE TO GET IN ONCE THEY DO.  We‚Äôve eaten at street food vendors to Starred restaurants around the world, this was one of the best.  RUN, don‚Äôt walk, and enjoy Aleria‚Äôs offering to the Culinary World today so you can say ‚ÄúI was there when . . . ‚Äú

I took no photos of the meal except for the palate cleanser, the butterfly accent was just too amazing not to document!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCK-lWN9sHk8PT5JwLiaft_&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Leanet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLUZFipCBPmDhbRZYOFk0TVhF0wz5pGU0_14qchCdXWUb5G1qV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment I stepped into this elegant Athenian gem, I knew I was in for something special. The ambiance effortlessly balanced sophistication with warmth‚Äîdimmed lighting, tasteful d√©cor, and a gentle hum of conversation that set the stage for what turned out to be one of the finest dining experiences I‚Äôve ever had.

I had the pleasure of enjoying a 7-course tasting menu and the evening was truly unforgettable. Each course was beautifully crafted, balancing creativity, flavor, and presentation in a way that felt both refined and deeply satisfying.

What truly elevated the experience, though, was our server, Panos. His service was exceptional‚Äîwarm, attentive, and effortlessly professional.

The pacing was perfect, the ambiance elegant yet relaxed, and the entire evening felt like a seamless journey through modern Greek gastronomy. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a standout fine dining experience in Athens‚Äî Go to Aleria and ask for Panos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAyhxvELEiXDhN5iuVW6QgX&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-7-26"},{"Name":"nati buskila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK32Pa-DrL9jpEws5mPgZnc143uN6vOxYrVeDj7MwRSVsRDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cant express how great was the experience in this place!
Wow wont be enough , thank you so much i had a wonderful time and enjoyed every bite!
11/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDnCjtry3rdEm7TEAM0a8N_&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Melissa Deschenes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9al63Qbv1uuoyAhREqtGF6GlV6yqgem5NFKhCBcAk9mCdUUMMjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved every single dish in both the vegetarian and meat tasting menus. They also easily accommodated my allergy. The meal ended with a pleasant surprise that we were not expecting and they also added a few dishes over and beyond our tasting menu. It was fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDI46ad4gE&fid=0x0:0x1bc52b3e863c34e3"],"When":"2025-4-12"}]

[{"Name":"Anelia Haradinova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURH9IR1H4Bwr15adxknkQUA39fsarUKze9Q-Qrsj2j3PKDLD8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great, great place. Highly recommended!!! Very good and delicious food! Very friendly and professional staff! The owner is very nice and came to greet us personally. All that we tried was very, very delicious. We also got a complimentary üç®.  Really great place to dine in Athens","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxxkfGx2dwbwlY7XfEaPU-&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Phil McMinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-C4yq2ID5sNgfA3EVweUKisuy02Nok44n7KD1Ntjab4bdUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly the best food we‚Äôve had in Europe so far and we‚Äôve been here for over a month!
Maritina was an amazing hostess and we could not fault the food, the wine or the service.
Food had amazing taste, the lamb melts in your mouth and the Orange cake as a gift at the end was pure ‚Äòcherry on top‚Äô!
If we were here longer we would come here every night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBTFp6hnKzZ0KVr3Febx5vE&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"aynat z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiYn-dMam2_HQ3w1-KtbBzXOrCWVXeIQEQ0b9ZNn-MVl1orYNwKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant! Everything we ordered was vert tasty. The octopus dish was amazing! The staff is lovely and efficient. Good value for money. Highly recommended!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBrh-0WTucx_LjFqQvSle7n&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXOnR7UoOF1eB6-kC_cJbJVrHF2JjO6pHpGUONQHcbSvegGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food served with charming hospitality. We had Greek salad which was full of fresh ingredients. Lamb roast was amazing - melted like butter in your mouth and was full of warm succulent flavours. Moussaka was the best we have ever had. Andreas was the perfect host and the restaurant has great ambience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9xmDL-uepS8fbG4ujC_tY&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-9-19"},{"Name":"Rogue Uchiha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSY8_faCy7tUAIzHHtFLzMwq_tlLQ_DjJl6mu0ujdTbZ7j9k80=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fresh tasting food, I also love how they mark what‚Äôs frozen. The owner was very accommodating and I highly recommend stopping by here! Greek salad was the best I ever had in Athens","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDvWxV3lAW7WUjYgEFynYHr&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-12-25"},{"Name":"Sonia Mercado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEUDrmibGX8K0yHRbxmlktGTaEIldxci8een3xTvAaUERSof2koQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best food I‚Äôve had in Greece! One of the owners Andres was in the restaurant, we spoke to him for a bit. He was very kind, you can tell he puts a lot of love into the service and quality of the food. I highly recommend to visit this restaurant when in Athens. Plus, they end your experience with a special dessert! A spongy moist cake soaked in orange and a local spirit, with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBk4Vwupz-FYim9IX8b-I9z&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"Harish Gohil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXew0wzwb8UNN3TvrdqBqKlf-ZninjQFBej2QBzlpENtlv8P9E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily a five star review. Great service from the proprietor himself and his staff. Great food. Great ambience. And very reasonably priced. Nice area too (Psyrri). We had the chicken souvlaki and moussaka - standard Greek dishes, but done really well here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBH80nV3CmlewU2EZa91uko&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Jannik Haueisen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBHGVEqxvycztGVWtg8fOZxjfG-DJUoO7lklG_2NkK9hfd7737=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So amazing that i came back a second time.
The Stifado on saturday? delicious.
The Chicken Breast with plum sauce was also very delicious.
Super friendly staff aswell

If i come back to Athens some day, i'll visit Bandiera a third time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCEmD_3sZp7cw0Q1uF-M6ju&fid=0x0:0xa01856a3d722def0"],"When":"2025-10-21"}]

Real italian! Wonderful drinks. We had Pornstar Martinis! My Tagliata beef with truffle was cook to perfection. My wifes salmon was also perfect - served on a bed of orzo with okra and mushrooms. Friendly staff. Just a high quality experience all round!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBOon_j_SKoFh09mr0ZhgGG&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-10-8"},{"Name":"Judith Wills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1AI37ebwuba5Zsa9K0gMnvnHhpIDGmEhkj20U-o2yoQct4ZEv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful restaurant in Athens, fantastic and delicious pizza, tiramisu and cocktails, great attention to detail in service, food and ambiance, lovely and warm on a January evening. Loved it all! Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏èx","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9iR-5nwfdSSUrPjjgzX_2&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2026-1-15"},{"Name":"Fatima Ocampo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6zNT2fONv5NRxlfYry3icLeZIMGafyBfXHit5cOh6yNCzNU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every bite was bursting with flavour and perfectly balanced! You can truly taste the care and quality in every dish ‚ô•Ô∏è
The food was rich, authentic, and deeply satisfying ( specially the beef carpaccio which was my favourite ! ) it felt like a genuine taste of Italy. I enjoyed every moment of the meal and can‚Äôt wait to come back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrVYSFztnwxEQ003lf-q4b&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-10-11"},{"Name":"Brandon Stoltz Music","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5h8JQZOP-lC2l_iKbatwidi6XEP39DnUYN7jemOTl_o57VBHs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During our trip to Athens we ate here for lunch and the food did not disappoint! The garlic bread was absolutely delicious! The pizza was also very good. I‚Äôll add that the crust is very thin, but we happen to like pizza like that. This was our first time trying spritzers and we enjoyed those too (we got the lemon and orange). We always research places before committing to eating there and we‚Äôre happy that we stumbled upon this little place. Prices were reasonable too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBXsMPcQlae6TaxKGljqp0X&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-8-31"},{"Name":"Kimmy Kirck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeR194gVB9HB9uTmifd-qzGM1HxybfWAgBpgT09ByIe0eCodI47w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pasta - eggplant and tomato was excellent. Al dente pasta, wonderful tomato sauce.
The pizza was very thin, good quality topping ingredients. The edge was very thin and crispy - not chewy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDObY5SgkNw9-sTOca-oEr&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Gretchen Schuetter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLht17LHUbHUFC-ieCr1VrEEuvGWrzfvaEBkPYmQcL3FBlxFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The meat and cheese were amazing. We loved that the pizza is on very thin crust. We had mixed drinks and wine that didn‚Äôt disappoint","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA8lZqtdvO_6B8jQdnoJ0Wh&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-10-8"},{"Name":"Joanna Ghaleb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjSgVaMzS59h6bDpYiqRbdKmBbxt6Bh-5E6qtbamAIApq-_4uwTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at Anima Restaurant ‚Äì the food was absolutely delicious! Every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. The fresh pasta stood out in particular ‚Äì perfectly cooked and rich in taste, easily some of the best I‚Äôve had in the area.

The atmosphere is warm and cozy, making it a great spot for both casual lunches and relaxed evening meals. The staff were friendly and attentive, making us feel welcome from the moment we walked in.

I also loved the variety on the menu ‚Äì from hearty meals to lighter caf√©-style options, there‚Äôs something for everyone. Whether you‚Äôre stopping by for brunch, lunch, or dinner, Anima never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9MpXvbvVA51EguJSaKD7Q&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-6-22"},{"Name":"iMereljoA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGFRujZX-w6ItRsP9Q9gF8YgibX4DtJ1bHL2CYD1NJmAZUzNU7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely incredible experience! The moment we walked into this Italian restaurant, we were greeted with warmth and charm. The pizza was fresh, the flavors were rich and authentic, and the pasta was the best I‚Äôve ever had. The service was flawless‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and genuinely caring. It felt like a little slice of Italy. Worth the penny üëåüèº Can‚Äôt wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEN7B_YGPrK6KiAE&fid=0x0:0x773b664f7ff97c22"],"When":"2025-5-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"LitoAlexiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj4c99eznejTqIPDNmhS-ktAWIYIRBOvV2kqEdriP0MhNsfEXi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the best fresh seafood in Athens, this is the place! This was my second time eating here, and it was just as incredible as the first. What sets this restaurant apart is its impressive seafood tank. You can see all the fresh catches before they're cooked and served, which guarantees quality. Everything we ordered was absolutely delicious, especially the seafood lasagna and the risotto.
The restaurant itself is very well-kept and clean, and the staff is incredibly kind and respectful. It's truly a 10/10 experience! I can't recommend it enough and will definitely be back for a third time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAogYwrzKZcjUaCQSc-Sv1m&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-9-10"},{"Name":"Elie Aramouny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId0kv-uajJRKx9x-kZxkZHNbV9vyPRd5KWUaGZwChClr1phg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for the best seafood experience in Athens, Thinalos easily tops the list. Every dish bursts with freshness‚Ä¶  from the tender grilled octopus to the perfectly seasoned shrimp and fish, each plate celebrates the flavors of the Aegean.

The menu offers an impressive variety, the portions are generous, and the service is warm and attentive,  the kind that makes you feel instantly welcome.

It‚Äôs a must-visit for me every time I‚Äôm in Athens, a place where great food, good energy, and the spirit of Greece come together beautifully.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCLOGdkor0NNGhuVgFgHCMa&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Linafandi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMwAgg78Qn_WmeqQnoK3Z5CioE3ZGGQTrQy86WU6SownzwBk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing seafood experience.
The food is really tasty and everything is super fresh üêü‚ú®
You can choose your own fish, and they cook it exactly the way you like.

The grilled fish is delicious, perfectly cooked, juicy, and full of flavor üî•üê†
The seafood pasta was rich, well-seasoned, and served in generous portions.

If you‚Äôre looking for fresh fish, great grilling, and authentic Greek seafood, this place is definitely worth a visit.

‚≠ê Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxzDGHoDwLOcMi9-XYilYA&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Kiko de Illana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPcifeA3_LTPIdleIdAiqqMAJoGVqi9Gy7-Tq2qcUobB17e8IOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant was a pleasant surprise. From the moment we walked in, the pleasant atmosphere and excellent decor created a perfect setting to enjoy our meal. The place is well-cared for down to the last detail, which encourages you to relax and enjoy yourself.
As for the food, the quality is truly high. Every dish we tried showed great care in the selection of ingredients and preparation. The service was also very good, with an attentive and professional staff that made our visit even more special.
Definitely a highly recommended place for any occasion where you are looking for a great dining experience and an unbeatable atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBQ7g-dZaWJfwS_4xJZzAIY&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-8-21"},{"Name":"Karensa Antif","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWQyijku6AJyMIo0K2FbEzKTATbD66zDO4vmlgxKsxglRA-93r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little find - I was looking for a restaurant close to the hotel via Google Maps and this one came up. I visited with my daughters on the last night of our holiday in Athens and was not disappointed. The food was delicious, the seafood fresh and the service perfunctory but friendly. We arrived quite early around 5:30pm and had a choice of tables but it started to get really busy when we left so would recommend making a reservation.  We ordered the shrimps twice as they were so good! The calamari was a little limp but the sardines yummy. Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB43CgYipnwxHvIvoS63cB1&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Li sheng Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKj_UfmQt3ckuEGToqN5l2M3eW6TTZNMEJtjkkbkEJLBaurA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a bit away from the center of Athens, but trust me ‚Äî it‚Äôs so worth the trip!
The food is delicious, the prices are super reasonable, and the overall value is incredible.
I went during an off-peak hour, yet the place was still almost full ‚Äî and mostly with locals, which is always a great sign.

The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, with friendly staff and genuine hospitality.
After the meal, they even surprised me with a free ice cream and a small glass of Ouzo, Greece‚Äôs signature spirit ‚Äî the perfect sweet ending to a wonderful meal.
If you‚Äôre looking for a local spot that truly captures the taste of Greece, this is a place you shouldn‚Äôt miss!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBLeduH9rypa7GVN7MeVHMP&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"COG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY-BuOVGlxfV1baPRoovOwT21h16sBvBKyj7_zam27YUlncw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had dinner here and ordered mostly the seafood options. The cod fish comes with some mashed potatoes with garlic, however can't really taste any garlic in there. The dishes are pretty to behold. Overall all taste I would give it a 4 rating. Not that it's not good, but maybe it wasn't up to my expectation in flavour. The service staff are very nice and courteous. The ambience is good and the place feels warm and cosy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDzwNy4kZ0_dBaGjIWX9IxZ&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-9-19"},{"Name":"Diane Tillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Eub3XqhgH6IODrTOpqr3vfMK3IBBsH4ziCa0aR6b_cp7GxUD7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! We showed up without a reservation and they sat us right away. They had fresh fish in a display for you to choose. I chose the Dover Sole and he presented it to me before it being prepared. The wine, the bread, starters, everything was delicious. Elias was our waiter and he was attentive and patient. I will be back on my next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDksjqrhjvcMmQS7XiZBHIe&fid=0x0:0x36c909fe7f125084"],"When":"2025-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marcel van Poeijer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKDBzqqq4LM-aqDk_rS7IUPRrWUAoJh-7V_R1hxmfPy2NIkJnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Lovely restaurant, but I can‚Äôt agree with the many 5 star reviews. We had a great evening, but compared to the many other restaurants we‚Äôve been, Maiandros didn‚Äôt stand out. The Moussaka was alright, good but nothing out of the ordinary.

The chefs special with chicken was a big disappointment: just some pieces of chicken in a creamy sauce with some potato chips. It really felt like a low effort dish, so I was surprised it‚Äôs called a chef special. Also very pricy for what you get.

The stifado was lovely! Al be it with a bit too many onions and almost no meat. But definitely tasty! We had a lovely evening and the food was good - But I wouldn‚Äôt be able to rate it 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDBoo_eNTS5EJrCa180McAw&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-16"},{"Name":"Martijn Vlug","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbq5EaVONFrJr5U947u7uLylvPqZbFjhKDQCZY8147qDMAlWQKlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time: My wife, son (12y) and I had a great dinner, with a friendly and very witty head waiter or owner (?). The food was prepared nicely, quick and really tasteful. The big surprise was a sausage dish prepared in wine and pepper, it was so good! Can't wait to come again and be surprised by the head waiter.

Second time eating there, four days later: Mikael, I hope I got the spelling right, choose the dishes for me. Of course the sausage in wine had to be included. He surprised me with gorgeous fetta baked in the oven. It was soooo lovely. And the second surprise dish was a great chicken in a creamy sauce dish. All of it was verry, verry tasty. My son took the grilled sausage again and declared it his favorite dish of the whole holiday. My sausage dish topped my own top 5. My wife had a very tender, tasty and moist lamb in paper. Can't remember the name, but it was very good as well. A splendid way to end our Athens adventure. Thank you very much Mikael for two unforgettable diner experiences. We will remember this with a warm hart (and salivating mouths). Fortunately I did not forget to take pictures this time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDkLOAQNfFUoAh482xBBV8P&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-24"},{"Name":"Skip Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR3QbLjMkImYzcsK6MEdHcs6v_Wj3_8TO3H1CjKOvVrynvlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a very good dining experience at this restaurant.

We came in at 10 PM and sat on the first floor, so there were no view or performances, which was not a problem because the quality of food is a priority.

The waiters were very nice and provided great recommendations. To start the meal, they gave us some free breadsticks with this amazing olive spread, and free chocolate mousse for desert at the end. We really enjoyed the beef stifado as the meat was tender and the baby onions were cooked to perfection!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhACenzia1-M6yFPfPqAp787&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Fatih A≈üƒ±k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrjuxTdcto6wMPcCE7AGs9kNNfBSCUbK8oDi6spQbeWvFQTPiU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maiandros is a great place to try authentic Greek dishes. Our orders arrived very quickly, and the staff were friendly and attentive. The zucchini dish was honestly the best I‚Äôve ever had absolutely delicious!

Prices are quite reasonable too. Highly recommended for both the quality of food and the warm service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_vUVlvlEczh2kPe6CTizp&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Loki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWl2DEE4670VIkGB0Fz67hY38DTjgEMfFoOtGKt3rXODZbul4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely meal at Maiandros. The atmosphere is warm and inviting ‚Äî rustic stone walls, cozy lighting, and lively outdoor seating. The food was fresh and flavorful, especially the gyros with tender meat, crispy potatoes, and various pastas.

Service was prompt and friendly, making the experience smooth and enjoyable. A perfect spot to enjoy authentic Greek flavors in a charming setting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAwiOWnyzZQEiqtE8af0ufU&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"AK Advisor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh4HgxfVgnHqzGXbPGHeIMwVZ9lbjEZVeEHHNWMaHDLGnDNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It‚Äôs an okay place, however, it‚Äôs definitely not above 4* rating restaurant. Seems overall Greek restaurants have a higher rating similar to Turkey :)

Service was good. Everything was quite fast at lunch but the place was more than half empty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCx76WoXm7O--AA9Oq8XxW-&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Gordon Pike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB7sRwOjiNUBQwVtnijcJBpYcLvd3AYWXb0QI6fPQjw5Af4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is near the famous Monasteraki area of Athens so there is no shortage of people, tourists, pigeons, and cats. Considering so many options for good Greek food in Athens, The Birthplace of Bureaucracy, this restaurant was packed with people when many others were not. I noticed this and said as we passed by, ‚Äú this place must be good.‚Äù
They catered to my 92 year old father as well with no issues to the slow movement of such an aged body, so I was thankful for that. Our lunch/dinner consisted of saganaki, fried halloumi, zucchini fritters, village salad, bread with olive paste, tender beef (kokkinisto)w potatoes, sardines, grape leaves. Everything was fresh and tasty and served w lemon. Vasili, the host, was so gracious, even asked my name (prob bc I spoke Greek w an accent) and accommodated my request to be away from the commotion, if possible. All in all, a pleasant way to satisfy huge appetites from walking all over the Acropolis, Plaka, and Monasteraki area. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBzJc5_ue0cs8Ad5Esv9v3Q&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-13"},{"Name":"Mona C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqeUxMlyf5dPLxyWfHvtCZyC3loWCsX8bo9EVeS7zpOsHl-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this restaurant!

The staff were so nice and the food was amazing! I couldn‚Äôt recommend this place more!

Amazing authentic Greek food I loved it! I will come back to Athens just to come here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGObTvMqTBl8jqpS2EseOs&fid=0x0:0xee3220d37974d3ca"],"When":"2025-10-6"}]
