user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cliff BT Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrWmuQ-_k7i3PJ5nOeuhAN8QAILcKrp4Z9k_QUQ1Kv_Ikup5u2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can not speak highly enough of this place. The staff are incredible and the food is fantastic. We were so well taken care of here. To top it all off, you have magnificent views of the Acropolis and city. I'll be recommending and evening here to all that visit Athens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDksoWltiO3pWcISCGu3t5y&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-12-17"},{"Name":"Heather R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN_2YnqdYfbJH13GbTbBLt7O544_NLr-rTwkl-E-TXfDM0IjLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dining at Electra‚Äôs Rooftop Restaurant was an elegant and unforgettable experience. From the moment we were seated, our lovely server , who we later learned is the head waitress ,made the evening exceptional with her thoughtful recommendations and genuine warmth. Every dish was divine, from the silky burrata to the perfectly cooked chicken and the heavenly dessert that followed. The ambiance, paired with the stunning view, made the night feel truly special. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Athens!!  especially to us food snobs from New York who know and appreciate fine dining done right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAFiIr9mVHTQ_7Wr2_VVsfh&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Maor Gil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwgw9UxYAlM9YKpp1bjof1FADssXZOvyV14Wn0HjpzEjaJOY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We didn‚Äôt eat,
Came for drinks alone.

Consider pricy cocktails, if you can‚Äôt so don‚Äôt.

We expected it in advance.

Recommend going, weather was beautiful Athens looks gorgeous.

Nice spot for a cocktail.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDw9-63ushIpxqpXmP2JulK&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Antonella la","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcsbNph26gW5PbdIAm9jaVAO-dVt2YfvNE6WFjTaTDvWu33GSD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect place for dinner in Athens. I had a reservation, and I asked them on spot to change my table because I wanted a better view and they immediately did. The waitress was very friendly but unfortunately the manager was rude (noticed it 2-3 times). The food was amazing and the service too! Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAomBXnEKFUbMKTdFQLCSXe&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-9-10"},{"Name":"Christine Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlyq926MD17rzHUxfbY605I-30syFwty811Uf0KAFZCgJEMaCd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly we were only there for drinks and snacked on some delicious nuts. The view of the Acropolis is one of the best in the city. Deck is small. And there are birds. But added to the atmosphere. Drinks are pricey, so be prepared to pay up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuZ_5FY_vJQk1PJjG6Ppxq&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Nicolas Infante B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT_ONp-fsEEjO83v3QhxhQ3Ve4qG_K0xaMyfA3wSaTzknC8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my first dinner in Athens here. The views of the acropolis are beautiful and the food is extraordinary
It is pricey but from all the places I tried while in Greece I'd say this one is worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaYJFLR4UtdsMGOXfNTAVG&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Eunsung Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7Tqm9NXF36pBHM5L_7EG1Tt0GxdLuRS62_bcozYgFTKItbxI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the place where we enjoyed a delicious dinner with a stunning view of the Parthenon and the city of Athens. Although the terrace was closed during our visit in December, it didn't affect the view at all. Thanks to what seemed like special glass, the Parthenon appeared magnified, as if it were right in front of us.

The Greek salad we ordered was absolutely delicious - the cheese and dressing were exceptional. The steak was incredibly tender, melting in our mouths, and the sauce was excellent. The squid pasta was unbelievably tasty as well. We thoroughly enjoyed the dessert too.

The service from the staff was flawless. I highly recommend making a reservation in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEKPQ2ISYruvKPw&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-5-30"},{"Name":"Nutharin Phusitphoykai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJKslmcUwnwVOki46qolyl0DcTHi0oisdSh00QT8Vi2XBhVjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a wonderful restaurant in Athens, offering breathtaking views of the Acropolis. Located on the 10th floor of the Electra Hotel, it provides a fantastic dining atmosphere.

We booked our dinner online in advance, although we couldn‚Äôt select an outdoor table through the website. Luckily, arriving early allowed us to secure an outdoor table with an incredible view.

We three enjoyed our meal a lot. Both the appetizers and main courses were delicious and expertly prepared. The food truly met our expectations.

While the service was generally okay, though some staff seemed less friendly and not helpful. Nevertheless, the exceptional food and stunning scenery more than made up for it.

Overall, we agreed this is a restaurant we would love to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELSSsqjhv7PV2wE&fid=0x0:0x2e51380bec8fc158"],"When":"2025-5-10"}]

[{"Name":"Í∂åÏÑ∏ÏßÑ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvMamVj3Zg9BQ5MDwWB9lqR8pA-qw_YVuVDVb4VXmlC03YzdyV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are so kind and gentle, i had really the best restaurant experience in Rome in this restaurant.
The portion is quite big, the flavor is also nice( not too much salt or mild, very good), and the atmosphere is also very comfortable. I might come back this place more than once just beofore leaving Rome. I strongly recommend this restaurant !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCyOcdganjGrCUtR0XlwZfW&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Nicole Sales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpqbco73yj3wYiMtkWfuV-lNXJcfP0-S4NwPgOH0L2xAL9p14D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was really nice and the food was delicious (not the best in town but really good). One of the few restaurants in that area that do not feel like a tourist trap.
I had a cacio and pepe, it was really good - cacio E pepe is naturally quite bland but the cheese sauce was nice, and the Margherita pizza was also good. We've had salad and pesto pasta, no complaints from our other guests.
Prices are nicer than most restaurants around Pantheon/Fontana di Trevi.
The waiters really tried to meet our needs and it was an overall nice experience.
I'd recommend for dinner","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBEAg7r-U7UJSaXRrNNUOoh&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"irakli dolidze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUawMVE3rgjK0Wca4dko9bqqs3dACKdgd_gwEm1rWdg38U6e3R5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this Italian restaurant. The food was absolutely incredible ‚Äî fresh, full of flavor, and perfectly prepared. The atmosphere was warm and authentic, and the staff were super friendly and attentive. Every dish felt like real Italian home cooking.

One of the best services I've ever had.
Boss man is funniest man in the world!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDX2kTpH5OE39JSkwNaEl56&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"ÍπÄÎØºÍ∑úKim Min-gyu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILPqJVNfYGijncxZ1uNhdFcBbCc-NyGSe2dk9W_zSy6APMjq8i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is fantastic future of Italian food restaurant in here.
We met good people, good smile, good service.
Especially Massimo was so perfect, his service was so great and so kind! Hahaha. Go here and find him! You will never regret seeing his smile.‚ò∫Ô∏è
We didn't ordered, but they gave us limoncello! And it made us happy.
If I come back to rome again, I definitely come back here, and also recommend this place for my friend who go to Italy.
Thanks for making our day bright and happy‚ò∫Ô∏èüòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDb8x5FS9WEgpk5EKNAlpTn&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-9-29"},{"Name":"Kellie Buck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuA-PodozXzgpnlP0cVFz0TYw-tG6Dpya4JgtYXyQAEb19MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the beautiful heart of Roma, Italy üáÆüáπ is the best restaurant, in my opinion however, I do believe many would agree with me as this was one of the busiest restaurants I could find in all of Rome. We discovered this restaurant walking to another restaurant. Walking through what can only be described with what looks like an alleyway that was brightly lit up with a lot of restaurants and stores, and a very busy walk way that connects a lot of the locals and Taurus to shops and touristy spots such as the Trevi fountain. Outside had a lot of seating. It was beautiful weather. They had a long walkway filled with tables that were full and in front of the entrance, they were tables outside along the walkway, and there was inside seating. The outside was well lit with table lamps, and outside lighting. The front entrance was beautifully decorated with flowers. They had what I would call a restaurant MC someone who is interactive and brings in the crowd and is quick to get guests a seat at this very popular restaurant. The toilets are small, but this seems to be very common in Italy and most don‚Äôt have a toilet seat.

The service was amazing. We knew instantly we wanted to eat at this restaurant as I stated above there‚Äôs a gentleman who was there both nights that we went to this restaurant who was quick to greet and get you prepared for a table.  The service was quick. The food arrived quick to the table, and it was hot. The drinks were prompt to come to the table. Most of the employees spoke Italian and English. Everyone was nice but very business oriented and fast. It was a high volume restaurant so everybody was moving quick.

Both nights we attended the restaurant, we got Aperol spritz and it was the best drinks we had in Rome. My mom got the gnocchi which was perfectly cooked in a meat sauce, and dollop of mozzarella. The roasted potatoes were cooked to perfection. They were soft and seasoned to taste. I ordered Caico e Pepe. It was the best fresh pasta and the right amount of sauce.

When you plan your trip to Roma, Italy , you should definitely put this restaurant on your list. I can guarantee that you will not have any regrets. They do accept most credit cards, typically Visa and MasterCard are the most widely accepted in Rome.
The menu was in English and Italian. Saluti ü•Ç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDXjmZz8DlszpXy4bxufTtr&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Kathy B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1yO21p8D70zoonhmSj5nId0zJXlDy3FUUy3NpLJ9_K1FyrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a lovely meal outdoors which was nice. The carbonara was tasty. The service was alittle abrupt and not as friendly as other places. I felt they wanted you in and out as fast as possible. Aside from that I still enjoyed myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBfth4EEZWpUgImwPGDV8ed&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Sofia cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ6TtJQPkZ0YVYs4WGvkXZRhXprC7ggt1WmbNiaTpY7y7fTnKwpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a gem hidden behind the pantheon, was a rainy day and I get here by coincidence and I was very happy with the food and  service,. Carbonara was great, prices as well, and service as well. Specially Kamal and the Charmin young host at the entrance of the place.... Thank you for bringing us in. Amazing food. Grazzie mille CIAO ROMA","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCqhq8ZTs45qXJgexyYnVGk&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"S Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3geQsfNOMzGa6c0AU1SRWDbwwpWCbmcYYpc411VkQBG-ThC0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service is amazing. We went here for my MIL birthday and was not disappointed. There weren‚Äôt any tables outside when we came and they opened up more tables outside for us which was pleasant so there was no wait.
We told them it was my MIL birthday and they brought a a sparkler/candle for the dessert. Very nice of them and would recommend people to come try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAtrf5aIaidWHqSljn6PQoL&fid=0x0:0x72f75637822fd020"],"When":"2025-10-16"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Victoria Saab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK6kTCKWgtPpl_MCAjC-iiy99cUT9kmyN-uGbV1EP4WQTPTvTHMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was, without a doubt, the best restaurant we visited in Rome. The service is impeccable. They asked where we were from and we were assisted by someone who spoke our language ‚Äî Vit√≥ria, who is also extremely kind. By the way, if possible, ask to be served by her. We ordered the lasagna, which was the best we‚Äôve had in Europe; the spaghetti amatriciana was delicious, and the funghi pizza was light, soft, and very flavorful. For dessert, we tried the traditional coffee tiramisu for the first time and loved it. In short: excellent food, perfect service, and a very pleasant and comfortable atmosphere. 10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNk4w6vr51vbbxS7SzJrLh\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Lusy Ke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbz4BN9Us32owkG5ERShEtv8lOnhb08eJhOZCwENTapAsYG5lJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best restaurant of our 5 days Rome trip. 20 days in Italy and this is one of our top few restaurants across the North of Italy.  Alfonso is extremely helpful and he try to introduce us best drink to pair with my food. The apprentv is so good. Appetiser was to die for.. all the pasta were finely and tastefully executed. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDX3gwvtocSbSOr3qKFHPk3\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2025-12-8"},{"Name":"teo G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4behX61l2iLfWa32jxjOEeWHDLgBBfQpVJu30bz5rJ60xMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really enjoyable experience here. The food was genuinely delicious ‚Äî fresh, nicely prepared, and full of flavor. The place itself feels cozy, clean, and welcoming, which made the whole meal even better. What stood out the most, though, was the staff: everyone was incredibly friendly, attentive, and polite without being over the top. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you instantly feel comfortable and well taken care of. I would definitely come back again, and I totally recommend it to anyone who wants good food and a relaxed, pleasant atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATAI3TALJfQIv3Liz__83W\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2025-12-1"},{"Name":"Konstantina Tziotziou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVleXYDWvcPT857BWCJIExSfxvtWikxmt6Wv5KuBiYlFSEbyTfb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Rome twice this year and returned to this restaurant because we loved it so much the first time! The food is delicious! We tried both pasta and pizza. I‚Äôm especially obsessed with the lasagna, and I also really enjoyed the stuffed ravioli. The space is quite tight and it is usually really crowded, but we didn't wait for too long in the queue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA5mTZnHzEVZqvy547B6CWp\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Amin Salehpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0ypRAdMHb1cYHIFmuK0snzmw-vc2fl1MuPbDeqQiDjlZZjzLF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely delicious. every dish was full of flavor, beautifully presented, and clearly made with fresh ingredients. A special shoutout to our waitress, Soheyla she was incredibly kind, helpful, and attentive. Her warmth and professionalism added such value to the evening. She guided us through the menu, made great recommendations, and made sure we felt welcome. The interior is cozy and characterful, warm lighting, and a rustic yet elegant feel. It feels like dining in a place with soul, not just another tourist restaurant. Many guests praise the atmosphere and continuity of good service throughout the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhARG_sldA9T9qWleBHw-33a\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"roomina farzane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBbnGi3Rt8LC9NfxyRBR9eZ-zIYRCnFptvNTaSVbh9xG6I6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was great. We were in Rome only for three nights and we went here two times. Great food, nice staff specially Hamid. Very pleasant experience. RECOMMENDED","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDcZFpKidXE7VbAfIJBc_PO\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Alfred Tao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd_vvnDORbKKpC0Keujd5bu5YZDtaJRV3l6u5kM8hr3gMmYzMaZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is absolutely amazing. One of the more popular restaurants and hence there is a wait but luckily when we went it wasn‚Äôt too bad. Still had to wait about 15 minutes, and the place was still busy. There is good reason though, the food is delicious. The pasta was so good- the lasagna was divine, and everything else is really well cooked. The service is really solid, don‚Äôt expect to be rushed. The tiramisu was the star, so light and delicious at the same time. Definitely worth a visit when in Rome. The decor was so nice too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBQelPdOKEdlgg4l25dLwOs\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2025-9-7"},{"Name":"Laura Florence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7hFUPfG4L6AA7PhitM9gOWUeVmiABFfcUdIxD2ksI_xEU5y4nWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We spent our last night in Roma at this wonderful restaurant, with the perfect table that overlooked the busy (but absolutely iconic) alleyway on a Friday night. There was a small wait, but we got in as a two top within 5-10 mins. The food, simply amazing - we started with Tomatoes and Buffalo Mozzarella and some mouthwatering Focaccia bread (which was the best we had in Rome), the Meatballs and the Calamari (also the best Calamari I have had (ever)). Then we had a Margarita Pizza and then for desert a Tiramisu and the Strawberries \u0026 Cream. (The desert was also my favorite version of Tiramisu we had in Rome, more like a custard than a cake). Alfonso was our favorite server!! Personable, attentive, so helpful (and the restaurant was packed), the fact that we had such wonderful service was not lost on us. Thank you so much for creating such a memorable experience for our first time to Italy, 10 out of 10 will come again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDa4GJirNWGKTrIajTCwYn_\u0026fid=0x0:0x536cf83571d46791"],"When":"2025-10-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaiden Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYA5zH4E4XWvPtwaG0ZoKGThjzBO4tmyS8KYIKne9z6EgcRMs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped here for lunch twice. The first time we managed to get seats and we ate inside and the second time we got the sandwiches for take away and went around the corner and ate by a nice fountain. It‚Äôs very small inside and it can get busy so it‚Äôs not the best for eating there unless you get lucky. We had the SANTOLO and INTRUPPOLO sandwiches and both were delicious. Good price and delicious sandwiches. We also saw that it is received a Traveler‚Äôs Choice on Trip Advisor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGSdES7SNTU4qOmslr6LxI&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"yuval mashiach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mzk_QtDC-7n0mML1lE2EaNCaqMxoT45y-DeEEQ7onSQNUM0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Forget all the sandwiches people show you in Instagram or TikTok recommendations! This deli is the real deal, a sandwich bursting with all the goodness of cheeses, sausages and vegetables. There is a ready-made menu and the option to put it together yourself. The owner is so inviting, asks in which language you want the menu, answers every question, a small and intimate place that is worth sitting and enjoying the sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBtkoUUTpWp305bqQKdyoUa&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2026-1-9"},{"Name":"Rashvin R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBSVOzzhaMnuKbD0P2ZdLp6hXKHnQu27Xqo3W28IvXCh4ZBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My partner found this place while we were visiting the colosseum. The reviews drew us in and we ordered 13 and 16. The place wasn‚Äôt too busy and we managed to get a seat in less than 5 minutes. Lots of people were getting take away orders too. The service was excellent and staff were super helpful.

In terms of the sandwiches itself, the bread was so good. It was toasted just right and had a fluffy interior. My sandwich was good but I wasn‚Äôt blown away by it. The tuna cream with the ham was a good combo. I liked my partner‚Äôs sandwich better in terms of the overall flavour though. TLDR ~ it‚Äôs really good but not wow","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_oAvF5g7RFCLcSBqiiy_n&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2026-1-15"},{"Name":"VB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXajTje1rWQkNBnEcjJte7gp5xTcuxTfnnZTqgBo-MN7gqgncU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfectly delicious sandwiches! We only tried the vegetarian ones - number 9 (nove) and melanzane alla parmigiana. The sandwiches were freshly prepared and tasted simply amazing.
You can customize any sandwich and get your own thing made.
The place is tiny with limited seating, we grabbed the last table but turn around is fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD71ICxe6sd8Eyf-1LO-BfX&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Suzie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx7ZHPZRN0bsJIxDUWdxmQTwEO3DMTPOQcwGCaNN65SHXUGgz2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Panini!
This cosy restaurant near the Colosseum offers a great selection of paninis with high quality fillings. My husband and I shared a porchetta, tomato and rocket panino and a prosciutto, mozzarella, tomato and rocket panino, and they were delicious. The staff are friendly and the prices are reasonable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBRkmqxJ3m5a8Z0Pk1R2B24&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"V.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXppsZBA_0Xmd9NV0BFMqDcTdVgELTtkGL7ssw7tDxEfqjos=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the most amazing lunch here. We wanted something authentic. Great friendly service and only fresh ingredients. Would come back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBxH6BNSwrcM0CEdOJmwD_P&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2026-1-22"},{"Name":"Sam Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI1o0pbEqWvFHRdjByMDQX5LZUvvPAKl-kBtkYhUNnuQR-vBkU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here twice for a quick bite in between church visits. Really good paninis ! I loved their bestseller which was some roasted pork (tender, flavourful) and the roasted beef was given a thumbs up by my husband. Service was exceptionally good too. Highly recommended !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDi9u63HBu1NsCWShPOw1pE&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"Dawn D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8XDMcFtI4Ak-TdJARio6gt66KcNFqGgrh8mtje2t0V6qIIKAm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic place for proper Italian deli sandwiches! The owner is great. The sandwiches were excellent. I got number 12 as a cold sandwich to eat later and the mushroom sandwich as a hot Panini sandwich - they were both stellar, highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCn0dpElWUPWzJwcvP20OaP&fid=0x0:0x1d2682b05155ee1d"],"When":"2025-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rakel Sara Bj√∂rnsd√≥ttir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1RGpwEoKNS0Jo21j2XOquxzkVwlpEx2Ke62fw-9_VsRhX7Mp0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience dining at CiPASSO. Will highly recomend to anyone visiting Rome. We booked a table with them for 6 people for a celebration while we were in Rome. They offered us a table in a private setting, which was very nice and suited us really well. The staff were very nice and attentive, checking regularly if everything was okay and to our liking.

The food was amazing. We had the scallops and crispy eggs as starters, along with a basket of bread. The scallops was a standout for me personally. Then everyone had a pasta for the main course, the parpadelle and duck, lobster linguine and the black truffle tagliolini. Since white truffles were in season we were offered to swap out the black truffles for the white truffles. We opted for that in one of the courses and it certainly did not dissapoint. We also had some wonderful sides and desserts. We all found it hard to pick one favorite since everything was to our liking.

This is without a doubt my favorite restaurant from our visit to Rome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDtoZugu4PueCD_Q5QAlJpO&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Kyung ah Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAFQQaWjcUPXznrHcIY6N7AsNrOA-DJZXPZL0j36_3aKXc3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful our anniversary dinner there last summer. The hall manager Loris helped us to get the table without reservation in advance and that‚Äôs the last night in Rome. We stopped by the restaurant a day early to make a reservation for next day but it is all booked but Loris kindly suggested that we could come back next day on a specific time in case. We didn‚Äôt tell him it‚Äôs our Anniversary day since  we didn‚Äôt want him to feel too much pressure on it, but we made it! When we got there next day he recognized us right away and welcomed us with a table pleasantly!
Food was excellent with both flavor and presentation and service is great with a timely manner.
Space isn‚Äôt big enough to get reservations easily but that cozy size makes it more warm and authentic vibe to us.
Obviously next time when we visit Rome, we will definitely make a reservation in advance and visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC-1N93vCqP8Ux9EbImwr1H&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-12-8"},{"Name":"Darya Yugay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBHszjJawB6lEACAfav5TtFIvaQzyn7LpJCqya5WtWdVXoRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every meal at CiPASSO was absolutely perfect ‚Äî 5 out of 5 for both taste and presentation. Each dish looked beautiful and tasted even better. The pasta was fresh and full of rich Italian flavor, and the meat was tender and cooked just right. I actually found this restaurant through the Michelin Guide app, and after dining here, I can totally see why it‚Äôs featured. The quality and attention to detail make it feel like a place that truly deserves a Michelin star in the future.

The service was so lovely and warm. The staff were friendly, helpful, and took the time to explain the dishes. The atmosphere was cozy yet elegant ‚Äî perfect for a relaxing dinner in the heart of Rome.

Every plate was like a little piece of art, and everything we tried was delicious from start to finish. It‚Äôs rare to find a restaurant where food, service, and atmosphere all come together so perfectly.

When I visit Rome again, I‚Äôll definitely come back to CiPASSO. It‚Äôs an unforgettable experience and one of the best meals I‚Äôve had in Italy. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhApZ2J4bneou90u_OZGVN86&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-11-11"},{"Name":"Valentin Schmid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZ20sSceIUKsATNxz0JlzALG_AHc1s-d5vQJt0ZBLij0_amQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing Lunch! The food is really refined and very nicely presented. Our waiter Robinson was an amazing host and his local wine recommendation was spot on to our choice of dishes. We can highly recommend and would go back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdsZC4QwojnSySZ30waKoD&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"Aleksander P≈Çawski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo4-K9GFsPMAIm0fmyMhDWzHmw3yjHyDnIb-_Lo727nSEhsEG0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The second best restaurant in Rome during our stay. Wonderful dishes, wonderful fresh white truffle, and excellent wine. The service was also excellent. A place worth recommending and visiting again. We will definitely return on our next visit to Rome. As with any good place, booking in advance is recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhANW2_vKergESf6NbJTQzY_&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Isabel Van Veen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuYWih04tDdxx0ZFVGsT3JoKQpXQ91wCPvQOSXr4xYN7eP2UZC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was incredible! The antipasti was so good, and the pasta was just wow. Its hard to portray how good it was! The tiramisu was the first in our trip, and it set the bar with how light and fluffy it tasted. Our server was also really fun and added to our experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB2kkCvrKJ-40b9bteTgHi3&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"L Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVe51eeum9y-OPUDjnHJNZE2fATgEODlIbDvJOT-GnaRJ3uqZn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good 3 years ago. And yet tonight was even better.

Make a reservation since there is a reason this restaurant is popular.

Reasonable prices for excellent quality and depth of flavor along with great presentation.

Thank you to our outstanding server, Adrianne along with the entire CiPasso team. We are grateful to all of you in making our evening at CiPasso one of the most memorable nights on our visit.

Arrivederci!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCLlslz_vyJvZwI4ciiQ-QW&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-11-29"},{"Name":"M. K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAymhmQXrG9FhwTcvC4HeZW9uI9Vh6n7PAWLggrlpmFEFmShjl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A perfect Roman lunch
We visited CiPASSO with our two kids and had a wonderful lunch. Every dish was cooked with love, you can taste the quality and care. The artichokes were incredible, and the truffle dishes absolutely delicious. Sitting outside made it even more enjoyable. Thank you to the team for a lovely experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAx41o5t7bokIKhZvqGkY03&fid=0x0:0x31aeccf34c0e27fa"],"When":"2025-10-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mila V√§th","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_g5XqLiCUfHTnTF_8Opf0aoDDjodsV1CK6wkvxvNkuElTfoVk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
La Locanda del Tempio offers an exceptional dining experience and, without doubt, some of the finest pasta in Rome. The seafood pasta was exquisite‚Äîperfectly balanced, incredibly fresh, and full of authentic flavor. Each dish was prepared with great care and served promptly.

Our sincere thanks to Simone, whose professionalism, warmth, and impeccable wine recommendation elevated the evening to something truly special. A memorable culinary experience in a beautiful Roman setting. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCI2TeHHdMzEJ6dPKENTF0P&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"kostas kioussis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMSWDEI5-djv5RFGO_-rUYGgNRSVdAW0n4nGVNFuM4-L6UxXiiqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went with my family 4.1.2026 at night. We ate spaghetti  aloghlio, pizza margarita and fettuccine bolognese. All the plates were fantastic and the came very quickly. We also ordered a salad Ceasars which was very tasty. Our waiter was fantastic, Mr Simone. We strongly recommend to visit this restaurant which is purely Italian. The owner an old woman was also around the table taking care of the clients. Very warm restaurant üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDizGYhewGZLroCbBUbeoBh&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"yin travis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM5pZRMy7wJz_QVMRGopMnGdUvNzihSCVPHkEuozXI5P1ysQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a Margherita pizza and a tomato seafood pasta at this restaurant. The Margherita pizza was served very quickly and was extremely delicious. The portion was quite generous, and I think it‚Äôs suitable for one person to eat or for two people to share. The tomato seafood pasta took a bit longer to prepare, and the portion was approximately for one person. It contained shrimp, clams, mussels, and squid, and the pasta was very flavorful. To my personal taste, it was a bit salty, but it was still very delicious. The service was also excellent, with a particularly fast response speed. I highly recommend everyone to come and eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBJTm7jWJgkYry6DtNqpBkE&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2025-10-5"},{"Name":"Devika Agarwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImyCMlWA33hOwi2bnbhSDQlXiBTboW46ZZEGPxzcuztYPFFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful dining experience here. The food and drinks were excellent, with the funghi pasta being a clear standout ‚Äî rich, flavourful, and perfectly cooked. The service truly enhanced the experience as well. Sultan, who attended to us, was extremely courteous, attentive, and warm throughout our dinner. Would definitely recommend this place and look forward to coming back again when I visit Rome next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_Swz2YQS49kh0Ouvsi_gC&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2025-12-27"},{"Name":"Sarah Garfinkel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7Rn-dPY6QkL9iwE8vl36qsdYB4wrnfMgnjeQ29R0p9NXSvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were living in Rome for 3 months over the summer and returned for a trip to visit our friends- they took us here and it‚Äôs honestly the best food we had in Rome. Run by an Italian family, the food is all home cooked, fresh with the finest ingredients. We cannot recommend enough! I will be dreaming of that carbonara with fresh truffle for the rest of my life, but it was all incredible. The cacio Pepe con pistachio was also so delicious, and the starters too! Wow, what a meal..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-f_PY44XMhDimdPcugbVq&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2025-11-23"},{"Name":"Hu Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ96mfi3oYIRpN7C2zy-3OwlN0ut44rAOQvdi-UG6g5OqECQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall, the food was just average, nothing special‚Äîvery normal flavors. The two of us only ordered two pasta dishes, but the portions were quite small and the prices were high, making the overall value very poor. The lobster pasta cost ‚Ç¨28, yet there was only a very small amount of lobster meat.

In addition, a service charge was added, but the service itself was mediocre. The staff kept walking around constantly, and there was an unpleasant body odor, which suggests that more attention should be paid to personal hygiene. The service attitude was also just average.

No free tap water was provided, and despite that, a service fee was still charged. Overall, I would not recommend this restaurant‚Äîit is not worth the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBLlSqcJ7h67zTzGXpgkDK2&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Kat C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsJIAALZeOWeqZHVc13ARTsZc_4AAy2lUm_-1KmAAweVkgvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not far from the Temple this place was warm and inviting. In addition to all delicious food the Tiramisu was so yummy! Great service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDHmnRL3hjj7YQwOeoVKMm9&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Jordyn Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOW63bJ9o5alga_5QMhZCepc1ALFf8tmuoaA2UzNfG7s7byDY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible dining experience at La Locanda del Tempio! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and the food was absolutely delicious ‚Äî authentic flavors, beautifully presented, and cooked to perfection.

A special thank you to Sultan, my server, who truly elevated the evening. He was attentive without being intrusive, knowledgeable about the menu, and made excellent recommendations that I absolutely loved. His professionalism, kindness, and genuine care for the guest experience made all the difference.

If you‚Äôre looking for amazing food paired with outstanding service, this is the place to go. I will definitely be coming back and requesting Sultan again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDgMTyek5WyYREuBBvOuqal&fid=0x0:0x7cf48b5e29780329"],"When":"2025-9-24"}]

[{"Name":"Rahel Herschel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9-610GgxP-5-29PmX0nmBKFzzMOLmG_RMv63okOZThgYmZlsh3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at this restaurant. The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äì I ordered a Margherita pizza, which was perfectly prepared with fresh ingredients and amazing flavor. My friends chose pasta dishes, and they were just as impressed as I was. Everything tasted fantastic.

What truly made the evening unforgettable, however, was the service. Raffaele was by far the best waiter I have ever had. He was incredibly friendly, attentive, and professional, always making sure we felt comfortable and well taken care of. His positive attitude, sense of humor, and genuine passion for his job made the whole experience even better.

Raffaele is a real asset to this restaurant, and his excellent service turned a great dinner into a perfect one. I would definitely come back ‚Äì not only for the amazing food, but also because of the outstanding service. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBs1oyRJdquba18bw_-PSb4&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"David Maddison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTlhKyre-8l71u11tcztloevgTSKjw8E600srDp2cbG1JObJQDEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I should have known something was up when their website doesn‚Äôt have prices as well as being in a tourist area - you absolutely pay through the nose here! Service is fantastic and the restaurant is beautiful but it‚Äôs extremely expensive. An octopus starter is ‚Ç¨40! I tried the lobster pasta with a price tag of ‚Ç¨65 and it was nice but not worth it for the mess. This is better suited for a special occasion rather than a casual eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-2X3D6HWzZPdr_Um7C_5V&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Gabby Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjQSx1Zc3JwyHFLozRpy3GS1i1HXNSFtLkYwd3UoKey_FV82s_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Angie‚Äôs was an unforgettable experience. The food was absolutely delicious, full of authentic flavors, and every dish felt thoughtfully prepared. The wine was exceptional and perfectly paired with the meal. On top of that, the service was warm, attentive, and made us feel genuinely welcome. A perfect spot for great food, great wine, and an all-around wonderful dining experience in Rome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBq4MJkZkvjuClxzMJTGBtl&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Esposito","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIvOpuBZFmeBK4zUC8otJRTKIMBJhwJSKdVyX6Jg00fAqIJHU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely dinner on our first night in Rome. We ate outside while it was still comfortable. The music was at a perfect volume and the atmosphere was excellent as well. I ordered the amatriciana pasta dish (the exact name of the meal escapes me) which was absolutely delicious. Service was amazing‚Äî Arkadiy was our waiter and he recommended the semifreddo which was definitely the right choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDGLnUpJY_bEtKz0_9I3CL7&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2025-11-3"},{"Name":"Mayila Waqar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISTW9H0EuEFSUjleMI0scdNZ97RM4UC2ffsFyxyiEvb__gP0Wq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb restaurant with Halal options! Absolute divine lobster pasta and the best service by Alex, Vitalin and Raphael. I can't recommend it enough! Absolute divine location and a 16th century fresco on thr ceiling!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCTVNT7BeZfss5YtmGsfwj3&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Nicole M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSgky2mtVdXKBdFcE8FIvwEzFoHSYQLbijSM9A6a15GGI1yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is very very cool looking, comfortable and located very close to the Spanish steps. The service was exceptional. Everyone was friendly, helpful and multilingual even entertaining our trying to speak in Italian a bit. I had the spaghetti carbonara and a tiramisu and they were both fab. The spaghetti needed salt and pepper imo and I was a liiittle bit judged for asking but they still brought it so ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è all good hahah.
It‚Äôs expensive but everywhere touristy is.

Anyhoo, if you‚Äôre near the steps and you‚Äôre hungry I def recommend this place :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpI7KJ46OusWGx9NpF4q7t&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Amber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8idqDlH-A-ktvLpmgb3H82A9lTbVsL6iiOt5F_ANS_WY7Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely outdoor space for yourself, friends, or family to get together and have a meal. This place is super cute with tons of happy vibes. You get to do some people watching and are a little off the Main Street which is nice. We had pasta and wine which was super delicious. They also have other courses of meats, fish, etc. Be aware serving sizes are on the smaller side, so if you‚Äôre very hungry or want more food, order an appetizer! The prices were definitely on the higher end, but when on vacation‚Ä¶
Overall, good food and the service is friendly enough. Sit outside if the weather is nice! It was fun to watch life go by and enjoy the moment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMTCoNjLhN-wcw&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2025-6-8"},{"Name":"Natalie Myers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdQbkXBTiTBJ0cMAGkF85KJnWibsTH4ZU2gAGoGsPIRfPJGHaI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I were in Rome for a few days, and this was our favorite dinner spot! Perfect place to go to after seeing the Spanish Steps! Highly recommend the limoncello spritz and the caprese antipasti! Pasta was very good and tiramisu was delicious! We also were given limoncello shots at the end. The staff were very friendly and the inside of the restaurant is beautiful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBgzpC-2NfIgxksjn5xKMx0&fid=0x0:0x570c6e7fe116c41a"],"When":"2025-10-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fiona Erika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJ_aZ_4LY4VVHr4i7HlPQvKgUP9WehFLr4Weu8CThtzLwPGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best quick bite place in the city of Rome. It was so good we went back here 3x! Service was quick and staff were friendly. Food taste amazing, bread was perfectly crisp on the outside and soft inside, toppings were generous. They also have an english menu so it was convenient. They have paper plates, forks, napkins, balsamic, olive oil on each table, making it convenient for us to grab what we need. 10/10 recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDek-6KB6jAQPrqEBcMiB_Z&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2026-1-21"},{"Name":"Tatiana Coulter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnDA-UvUbZ9Hovh4KpMIjBkxzm2lUK6VF8tVah6pxZSrzYqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So delicious! I googled lunch spots close to Trevi fountain and this place came up. I was worried it may be a tourist trap but it could not be further from that. Feels very much like a local hot spot. Delicious sandwiches and platters. Good wine list and very reasonably priced. We over ordered because husband wanted to try more - hot salami sandwich; a few glasses of wine each and a shared meat/ cheese platter. All together came to ‚Ç¨40 which we thought was very good value. Def add this to the list. We will most likely visit again before we leave","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCd-nm8GrKXbeUFA_0XcyeB&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2026-1-7"},{"Name":"Shubhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ09gtpuPUr361QrWIbL-JZ_O63QCrqvK3VOcFIzO0i3e-4sf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The other reviews weren‚Äôt exaggerating with words like ‚Äúexceptional.‚Äù These were genuinely some of the best sandwiches I‚Äôve had in my life. The quality hits immediately - they make their own fresh ciabatta, and the fresh ingredients truly elevate the whole experience.

‚úÖ Service & Experience
‚Ä¢ Staff were warm, friendly, and patient, and actually helpful. We didn‚Äôt feel rushed during our meal.
‚Ä¢ They guided us through the menu properly, including drink pairings.
‚Ä¢ They were very allergy-aware, double-checking ingredients for me, which I really appreciated.
‚Ä¢ Overall very welcoming, attentive, and relaxed.

ü•™ Food
‚Ä¢ We ordered two vegetarian sandwiches, and both were fantastic. I had Colosseo + partner had Navona
‚Ä¢ They have a strong vegetarian selection, including egg-free options for anyone who needs that.
‚Ä¢ Sandwiches were generous, balanced, and the homemade ciabatta was the star.

üçπ Drinks
‚Ä¢ Aperol Spritz for me - well-made and balanced.
‚Ä¢ White wine for my husband - staff helped us pick.

üìç Location
‚Ä¢ Literally one lane away from the Trevi Fountain - incredibly central and easy to access. Considering the location (usually touristy and overpriced), the pricing feels very fair.

üí∂ Pricing
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç¨1 per person table charge (normal for Rome).
‚Ä¢ Our total was ‚Ç¨30 for: 2 sandwiches, 1 Aperol Spritz, 1 white wine
‚Ä¢ For the quality, freshness, and the location, this felt like a good value.

ü™ë Seating & Atmosphere
‚Ä¢ Both indoor and outdoor seating available.
‚Ä¢ We chose outdoor; the space heaters made it warm enough to be comfortable.
‚Ä¢ Indoors looked equally cozy.
‚Ä¢ They have washrooms for customers inside - not the cleanest, but works.

All in all, a place that nails flavour, service, and value ‚Äî absolutely worth a visit. Fantastic sandwiches, kind staff, great hospitality, and fair pricing.

Highly recommend.

Description of our sandwiches from the menu (they had menus in a couple of languages, very helpful!):

From their menu
‚Äî COLOSSEO: STRACCIATELLA, EGGPLANTS, DRY TOMATOES, ARUGULA, OLIVE CREAM .......
‚Ç¨ 7,50
‚Äî NAVONA: PORCINI MUSHROOMS, PARMESAN, TRUFFLE CREAM ......
‚Ç¨ 8,00","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDod56jYP99Ryyy8okxM3V4&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2025-11-27"},{"Name":"Shabnam Jafari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_ZZtgvKeDTC6LUWY9GtQzOmpatRQBrKa7vtiz9PXIfEZr-tF7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was friendly and helpful, and the food was genuinely tasty. Even though take-out boxes aren‚Äôt their usual practice, the staff kindly accommodated me and packed the leftovers, which I really appreciated.

The atmosphere was pleasant overall, I sat outside, which made it a nice, relaxed stop. I had the eggplant bruschetta with pesto and the U panini, both of which were flavorful and well made.

A solid spot for good food, friendly service, and a comfortable, no-stress experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCPfkcrQ_2rFFNOV1-QvTAG&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Dianela Gahn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdE40eRTd-JcafdvRnO_Ya_WJzd1Cy0Pn1LcAJeqiVlVS-i-nIzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional Sandwiches!!!
As someone who spends a lot of time researching food experiences and how service is designed around them, Pan y Salame completely exceeded my expectations.

Let‚Äôs start with the sandwiches: they are, without exaggeration, some of the best I‚Äôve had in my life. The quality of the ingredients is outstanding ‚Äî every component is carefully selected, from the artisanal bread to the spreads and cured meats. I especially loved the truffle-based options ‚Äî rich, flavorful, and beautifully balanced. You can tell that attention to taste and texture is a priority here.

But what really completes the experience is how well thought-out everything else is:
‚Äì The service is fast, kind, and multilingual (they offer menus in several languages), which makes the space welcoming to everyone, without losing local charm.
‚Äì The atmosphere is casual yet curated: good music, a lively vibe, and a layout that makes you feel comfortable whether you‚Äôre dining solo or with others.
‚Äì The wine list is small but well-chosen, with great pairings for the food. And the prices? Incredibly fair ‚Äî especially considering it‚Äôs just steps from the Trevi Fountain, one of the most tourist-heavy areas of Rome.

This isn‚Äôt just a sandwich shop ‚Äî it‚Äôs a reminder that when quality, hospitality, and design come together, even a quick lunch can become a memorable experience.
Highly recommended ‚Äî a small gem that gets everything right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAddwBaZNwUddXRJsl9kqxX&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Ryan Naman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-W3AQT23vRLZuhdYwUdodQJ7-uy7jTcbjDDVgcsP_LLBuTVLN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unfortunately and it‚Äôs not like me I only have one magical photo from this beautiful meal!

Traveling Italy is an amazing experience, but finding the gems for a stellar meal can make it other worldly!

The many reviews do this place justice!

Go here! Have a fantastic meal and thank the lord you‚Äôre able to enjoy such wonderful parts of life!

Grazie di cuore per lo splendido pasto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCFdKJlVyOtpbe3XboEk_b8&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Alexandru Cirlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFxQMIH6Wpz4rCxGBX8OE6BQ82tf-Jcw5k28fYqhg0mtAjFchL6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stumbled upon this location by accident, but boy, the surprise we had. We had the best panini in town here! My wife got the panini with roast beef (Y on the menu) and I got the double meat sandwich with mortadella and salame picante. OMG the flavours it had, the bread was crunchy and soft at the same time. The only downside I see here is that they do not serve any kind of coffee, however, still worth to come and add it on your list of ‚Äúwhere to eat‚Äù.

Later edit: came back 3 times üò≠","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDYuYijZlZDQYqzt8B4P4vI&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Gina Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3UFVUNMa-IUfmsGPQbelSHOwXzKWk3mYsQNal-eiz3oqPyB5a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place to eat lunch!  The sandwiches were amazing. Beautiful and delicious charcuterie board. Aperitif and Negroni's were very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCP6R88Jz26jjUNL90atjdh&fid=0x0:0xde60725cbaa29641"],"When":"2026-1-3"}]

[{"Name":"Jennifer Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7z4Pj7a-KntQ_hvzwSSnx4-CEga9ibgJ1gHl0SQIUUqgAcyngjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved this place! We stopped here just for a few drinks and appetizer and ended up back here for dinner.  Everything was so good.  David was our server both times and he is the best server we have had in our first 2 days in Rome.  Thanks for making our time in Italy memorable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD6E1JRdNjIpjWAn_Fl3MLp&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Amit Krivoshey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8PLiV3KTB6DlIGNkmhTmk75pH5_gJGmEJxTgL_Up-5oeAhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice and relaxed place.
I sat outside, which was very pleasant.
The lasagna stood out as particularly good, and the rest of the dishes were also enjoyable.
A good spot for a casual meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDtwJAVZUxZ4_denetPLQZV&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Megan Stokes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoGtapU3NA4QcjEZbD5UUY4_sSkwyPZKa3nG5zCR62TQGEUSjy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service from David was amazing. He was always in top of what he was doing. The food was mediocre but one thing that stood out was the artichokes they were very good. The atmosphere is very homey and warm, love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAuGIRu8dS9JwOqCG1eLy_N&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Greg Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLau1ZRpruKwxSFSnETRoTZYWJmZHepOCCOWCEynjbqaxRdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The only reason I would not give this 0 stars if that were a possibility, is because the steak was great and my 6 year old ate the pizza margherita. My cacio e pepe was bland at best. I think they forgot the pepper and only loaded it up with cheese. As for the pasta dish my eldest received (bolognese) this one reminded me of chef I was acquainted with as a child, Chef Boyardee. 4 out of 6 family members tried it and NONE of us could stomach it. It remained uneaten on the table. At a price conversion of nearly $20 USD for that alone, I‚Äôd say steer clear.

Also, if you have been to Europe before you probably know it is not customary to tip, they pay them a real wage and there is a cover charge per person on top of that. Our waiter to our faces literally said ‚Äútip is not included, do you want to tip?‚Äù When we were paying to leave. Even in the US that would not have been acceptable. It turned what was an already not so great experience into a poor one.

Out of all the places we went to eat while in Italy, this one was our only regret. Had some cool stuff on the walls but in an empty room where you could have sat us anywhere next to the bathrooms where one of the toilets was clogged and stinky, that was just the icing on the cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDGf-OqLIFPg5yyzd448EFh&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2025-12-13"},{"Name":"Phil McMinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-C4yq2ID5sNgfA3EVweUKisuy02Nok44n7KD1Ntjab4bdUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza I‚Äôve had in Italy! Crispy base, good flavour and exactly what I wanted to order without feeling like a tourist trap!
We had David as a server and he was absolutely amazing. Very attentive and easy; his English was great which made us feel bad because our Italian is terrible üòÇ
Thanks for the experience! I recommend the Pina Colada and Carbonara Pizza!
We also had a free Limoncello at the end for everyone‚Äôs efforts <3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD7Wng3_i96igb_WJq6xgib&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdEEhLdIaqoOonW0cPD5ndrq_ovF_SUMlWICg1YUkuw7kZlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Romantic and authentic Italian restaurant. Great service from David and portions were huge! Definitely didn't need a primi and secondi here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBAQnXeQ9SlnbEzrENa-U0s&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Klaudi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTDbmys7oSoxBPPGkhSyBMwsk21ilMcQMlfqFfSKq4q9eUuHDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and coffee! I liked spaghetti with meatballs, pistacchio ravioli, fettucine ragout and grilled veggies. One of the best tiramisu we had ever eaten üòç!

The spaghetti with meatballs were great, but I experted sauce to be made only of tomatoes, but it was a variation of rag√∫, so it had too much meat for meat.

But I am 1000000% sure that if I had ordered tomato ravioli (I love tomatoes+burrata+pasta), it would have been the best dish I had ever eaten üòä.

So I have to come back and order tomato ravioli ‚ù§Ô∏è.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB5MBr3qy2RdpFdU4Rv77TV&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"giovanni escalera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6PA9-pKrl9Rj6C-jWw9qumFDJ1c4rxp2r5q842SvBPnh6QZHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Madiya was amazing! The place is a small place with a great vibe and delicious food. Probably one of my most amazing meals I had in Rome and I am talking after being 2 weeks around here in different cities. Everything was absolutely delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCoD2gOA1sCU3Anj8Dx9_kU&fid=0x0:0xa5e2b3ce4d5e550c"],"When":"2026-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elbert ostolaza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoCVV7c-BdE-rS8NpspkwBbhnn-0kfKXqyQT5bmW7qp-c1ZTlD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Absolutely outstanding experience at Mimi e Coc√≤!

Hands down some of the best pasta and food we‚Äôve had in Rome. Every dish was full of flavor, perfectly cooked, and clearly made with care using high-quality ingredients.

A huge shoutout to Paloma, our server ‚Äî she was warm, attentive, and made the experience even better. Her recommendations were spot on, and she made us feel truly welcome.

The atmosphere was lively and cozy, exactly what you hope for when dining in Rome. From start to finish, everything was excellent.

If you‚Äôre visiting Rome and want authentic, top-tier Italian food, Mimi e Coc√≤ is a must. Highly recommended üáÆüáπüçù","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCSKhacTRyXfdL3G9Ae6zsS&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-12-17"},{"Name":"John Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4MU0SGORHkj5SguInJdgTN54brAjRnn3_w2syZI2UVorG8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant was amazing. I happened to stumble upon it while I was walking and checking out the nearby tourist sites. I was Walking by and saw the most amazing plate Of lasagna on display by the door. It made me want to try it, and thankfully it was as good as it looked. It was the perfect amount and probably the best lasagna I‚Äôve ever had. The staff was extremely attentive and friendly, and one of the servers Alessio was so Accommodating. Next time I‚Äôm in Rome, I will definitely be coming back to try all the other dishes that I saw on other tables because they looked incredible!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBd8Coxs6BON2G1hL23DCSj&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5eH5Fyg8_k6JP4-w0gbjP256e1NkHd7fihamMQUfFCLpAfkI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a lovely dinner here, and would especially recommend the carbonara!! The dessert was also nice - particularly the pana cotta. Another highlight was our waitress: she was very sweet and patient, and was really nice in explaining food to kids. Moreover our food was served very quickly, and was (again) delicious!!

I think the prices could be slightly more reasonable, payed about 80‚Ç¨ for 3 people (1 child).  But overall i think it‚Äôs definitely worth it if you want to enjoy a delicious meal with a cozy atmosphere in the heart of rome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqp7EfBUofNoJP4JTy_JCG&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Megan Fricke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiUB98hR2V1Udx37JzGGLqVFQlSe0u-7tYoNXuIuIFp2bkhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing and staff was very friendly!

We enjoyed 2 appetizers, 2 pasta entrees, and a bottle of red wine for ‚Ç¨93 euros. Each appetizer and main dish was between ‚Ç¨10-20 euros, big portions! We definitely over-ordered for just 2 people however everything we ordered was amazing!

We arrived around 7:40pm and they had already filled up pretty quickly, so I suggest getting there a bit earlier if you are one who likes to walk up and get seated right away. We only waited about 20 minutes for an outside table, inside was a shorter wait- I suggest waiting for outside if you like the fresh air and scenery!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjHyr-ZL31nqWCt5DWzXUl&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-8-28"},{"Name":"L Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXe4G-lpy52YsSJe12SixpmA5r1Cag-eOPp05tsTxABuSSxn9X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited in 2019 and have been so excited to go back and finally got the chance last month! The spiedoni di pollo con patate arrosto was amazing, just like I remember it! The tagliere di salumi formaggi con focaccia was also just as good as I recalled! I had waited 6 years to have their focaccia again üòÇ and I was not disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAbOpvGfyzV-Uy4f0PA35HS&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"Liam Galin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5aoreqk_AdMmpIaa_id_o2Mt_WDDD06bciIn4YcUV_era99Mj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just Wow
Small place. We expected nothing but were blown away. Good is so fresh. You must have the Pinsas. And the heart warm service couples with the atmosphere, is just great.
The Mimi&coco coffee is a must have
You MUST visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuQha900UuyD2qfMWOX0hE&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Ashkan Kasbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGXQbmkKqlYovLheo4J6jEh3JxEHKCeduuMlLC9NGln3Tm0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mimi e Coco is an absolute gem in the heart of Rome! The food was simply outstanding ‚Äì every dish was bursting with authentic flavors and beautifully presented. From the first bite to the last, it was a true taste of Italy.

What really made the evening unforgettable was the staff. They were incredibly friendly, attentive, and genuinely passionate about making every guest feel welcome. Their service went far beyond expectations ‚Äì warm smiles, perfect recommendations, and a personal touch that made us feel like family.

If you‚Äôre in Rome and looking for a place where excellent food meets exceptional hospitality, Mimi e Coco is a must-visit. I can‚Äôt recommend it highly enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDWaLRrH0SzKgvmLb2jby92&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-8-3"},{"Name":"M.J.S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaXGQoDMBxCHcbdYkjkQn3WAXKKGjSCWAMC0aE7z7SV72_7oy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered 3 spaghetti alle vongole and one melanzane alla parmigiana (?) and the taste was above average (but not special), a bit pricey and the portions rather small. What was exceptionally good was the tiramisu !!! One of the best Tiramisu I‚Äôve ever had in the whole of Italy. The service was great thanks to Paloma and the vibe was also great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1k-FeuoeocdeeibbTTv-c&fid=0x0:0x53798c89c670528e"],"When":"2025-11-10"}]

[{"Name":"Rhonda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8K8CrV4s7IHl6Ul9sS8RQE0HRj4NCaYO3dfqmhPBxeI0Eww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cannot recommend enough, was craving a burger and fries after 3 weeks of pasta and pizza in Italy. Best I‚Äôve had! And the pasta and steak plates around us looked amazing. Great atmosphere and busy spot. Add this to your list, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Service was top notch thanks to Simone - grazie!! I made a res and the accommodated us early.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCV1juRWJ0ovFO0BkbMTELG&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Joe G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqulOvxmTHjGwnEW0iA35z8sNFbNnQrZjKpuCjSSxEYSTm1yMFbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found out about this ristorante three days before we left Roma. What a find! One of the best dinners in Roma. Do ask to sit upstairs in the Garden area. Beautifully Victorian inspired interiors you won't regret. Host and waitstaff are incredible and funny. Dont miss out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcWq_BEXl3bx-17SR9KFJy&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Pavle Dakic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHgXHL5XR6mbMhjHcdfGppEndd6q_ZcGG9Q80XxCMKY1c3qMH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bistrot ‚ÄúA casa tua‚Äù at Roma Luxus was awesome. The downstairs patio is nice and you can enjoy cocktails and great foccacia style pizza. Upstairs in the garden for dinner is beautiful atmosphere with reasonable prices for great food.

For how good the food and service was, I was surprised it was not busier. Service was great and we felt very taken care of. Dined here twice on our trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAyP_rGsQpkz-2IJB9XOgvT&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-9-21"},{"Name":"Bum Queen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCldB6QEihPwbYYhNENI96LDK1ZeRvTfbgJ73jxw1-Du_f1n0fBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an American, I never truly understood what ‚Äúal dente‚Äù meant until I ate here. Food was fantastic and the service was great. I was a little shy and intimidated approaching the restaurant because of how nice it is and how we were dressed that evening, but the staff didn‚Äôt discriminate. Thank you guys! I miss Rome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3fAokSgL42f3KgEme33qq&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Carmen Alfayate Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuZYT_M-rcINf5ssE9hegp2Clbi4HleZbl2W1sbWC6PQlCNO0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don‚Äôt leave ratings often but this was so great I had to. Leaving the forum Romanum hungry and tired, we happened upon this gem and weren‚Äôt disappointed. Such great food and service, everything tasted so fresh and amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6YhUg2UfjQ41HWH2xy21v&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2026-1-12"},{"Name":"Nidia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGF6R5DIg3UUSjiK0_dh_EwbVY9gLLTwLos9YXFaMvBVJezg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simone, the food and the prices made us come have dinner twice!!!

We had the meatballs, the carbonara, tiramisu, fettuccine Datterino and it all impressed us in presentation and flavor!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB27Z5eUgAAvMQjWMGlQpl7&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-8-27"},{"Name":"Susie Watts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzVm3YxNz03w7pqa-40UdTjBQ_ZUSLq3r75e3iiYdokb2u7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful restaurant, friendly staff. The best meal we had in Rome. The cheesy pepper pasta was perfect. The focaccia was soft and fluffy. Perfect. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBz1yilM-QD99MDbezia5u1&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Elijah Adkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsLrALqVJK0QLARsmdcmi8OZALtLUW1kl3-6AOXuEdecl1KBFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great authentic Italian food! Service was however pretty slow but worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBK_nzqQmb_-TG4Zr98cbec&fid=0x0:0x3357be91f0cf8bf4"],"When":"2025-9-6"}]
