user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Mathews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-sFercdMKnVmESYUT3iIlMcND873kCoqb5fIpaweyBWEDYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an excellent experience at Ristorante Pancrazio dal 1922 ‚Äî this is definitely a place where you should make a reservation in advance.

The food was outstanding and the atmosphere was fantastic. We enjoyed a variety of dishes including carbonara, steak, and chicken, and honestly every dish was delicious. The chicken dish stood out as our favorite of the night, and every bite was full of flavor. The fresh bread they brought to the table was also a great start to the meal.

The setting itself is charming and truly adds to the experience ‚Äî it felt like a perfect blend of good food and memorable ambiance.

Highly recommend this restaurant if you‚Äôre looking for a great meal and a lovely place to dine in Rome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB01PUtlNE_RWPT-4Dw9-mB&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Rin in the area","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjGX15pDY72u9ZX34Q3Y5_yXSTysE69EPeyIAomTl5TUuFEm8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a pleasant lunch at this restaurant. Tom was really nice and welcoming to me even tho I was dining alone. The food was great! If you love eggplant and cheese, please get the starter melanzana alla parmigiana! It‚Äôs delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBgzv7MLqvP1COkQhGPtvkU&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Margaret Murphy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ539VOzg94Qk12cAVNWNfyVHtdyj_aX3wU7SOWfkPe51P3kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you Tom for an amazing night out! Come here if you are looking for real authentic charm of Italy. From the decor to the food, my husband and I fell in love with this place. Don‚Äôt even get me started on the playlist they have going, you feel like you‚Äôre walking straight into a Nancy Myers movie (in the best way possible).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCZg0UwAymWukzTH88SrpoR&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Mei Mei Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgP_bjbIYN0veO07b2FYwc8MsWaWtjjJRd5YXkYObqZPbyig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you so much, Tom! His warm hospitality and professional explanations of the various traditional Italian dishes on the menu were wonderful. We enjoyed a delicious Italian meal and had a very pleasant dinner. The food was excellent. Tom also arranged a great table for us. The restaurant's decor was also very charming and rustic. Because of Tom's excellent service, we will definitely come again. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6gHaIFBIJaizTGk14wJnE&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2025-11-7"},{"Name":"KEVIN FOK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8JxSRaP55C9gpuSiSqSoj9Pk21IaIEPQelDLBsoUk9XlGHpp4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food‚Äîespecially the mussels‚Äîand even better service! Tom was attentive, friendly, and made the whole experience smooth and enjoyable. He‚Äôs not just a great server but also a skilled communicator. His thoughtful approach truly elevated our visit. Highly recommend this place, especially if Tom‚Äôs looking after you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhARbjd7cZ6di8-eElKuP-nM&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Brittany Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5nFN76e5N_bMG2GwVdwdmBTuiZerJTtdtLXsz1SmizhOSdxbf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my husband here for his birthday. We arrived a little early for our reservation, upon arrival they offered us complimentary champagne while we waited for our table to be ready. The restaurant is so beautiful and unique! Our server Vittorio was so kind and funny, excellent service! For dinner I ordered the Ricotta and truffle tortello, it was so flavorful and the best meal I had while in Rome! We ordered the tiramisu for dessert, the best tiramisu we ever had! Before we concluded, they offered us complimentary Limoncello!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC_0ZfFP2SN3WP0O23MOydV&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Katrina Caruso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqDLCQuXxaksiOIlQMMfOrCn5-fiMOY2E60hNmFKtwKUC7Gm0spA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really big restaurant in a nice part of Rome. The service was slow and our food came out lukewarm. I rarely complain at restaurants but I asked for them to re-fire our food. It came out a bit better the second time, but we had much better food elsewhere.

My partner and I ordered a marguerita pizza, the fried artichoke, the pistachio ravioli, and the tiramisu. Everything except for the dessert came all at once, which was weird - we thought we would receive the artichoke first but it came with the mains. By the time we had finished eating the artichoke, the pizza and the pasta were ice cold (they were barely warm when they arrived). The artichoke was fine, it was my first time trying it and I found it really greasy and bland. When we finally received the second round of pizza and pasta (we waited quite a while), they were okay, not mind blowing - the pizza is better than the pasta. However, the tiramisu is an abomination- it was custardy, thick, too sweet, and for some reason yellow in colour. I've never seen anything like it. My family is Italian and so I've had many good tiramisus, and this was so far from what I am used to, I was very disappointed.

This was one of the few more negative experiences on our two week trip to Italy. We expected a lot better because of all the good reviews but we're also used to a very high level of food service and quality and this restaueant seems to cater to tourists who don't really know what excellent Italian food is like... compared to  Olive Garden, this place is great, but compared to so many other restaurants in Italy, the food is okay at best, expensive for what it is, and the service was not good.

The only redeeming quality was that there was some live music in the piazza and we were seated outside on a lovely day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAvPLlLx4Vj7drKkkjogrjD&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Lynn T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUICE4zCAo2vMyK6qrmAIiydLpnOJ8y1RnD7wY2wSUgjQ25H51w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful staircase going underground to more seating. Waiter is kind and patient. We came in for brunch and had 3 pastas ‚Äî carbonara, truffles pastas, and spaghetti with clams. The pastas were delicious and the kids give it a 5 star for food. Everything was devoured because it‚Äôs that good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGphUCg5cQiXPwAjcyBoOq&fid=0x0:0xccaaaf44d8012132"],"When":"2026-1-6"}]

[{"Name":"Pam Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv6OxG81mc5TqThy7DS2K4LDVcB19RZTVkQfZqrg2N1t29skqAUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled across this restaurant for dinner this evening & was delighted that we did. Lovely restaurant & definitely one I'd recommend üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAPF401GUoihYjB7WJPH59u&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"James King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxfPrmWiYCEst4tIMhnm_TTTZpPp5Wtu4O5YuebKPZPKulNX2R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing service. Food was really nice. Carbonara very good sauce. Not using guanciale though, which for the pice was a bit of a shame.

Souffle was amazing. Very tourist friendly if you want quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAORfCeuICcj-YStT5LYQ6E&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"Charles Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkG356MLZnryuA0sWljmiDuRgG2pgMY9F9GGTquLJWrvvOhoBo5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a bad joint for food. It was good honest italian fare. We had the Vongole, pizza and the bolognese pasta. They were all very decent and I wouldn't mind returning if I was in the area.

Having said that, its not like a place id walk a distance just to have","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB7Hb8I8RFJnE1LCncjUpJb&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Lauren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp0RIVZWp0vFjQAUcAbquhpgHKPj9oQcQoZrnnkguwtu8gA2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for lunch after reading all the great reviews. I had the diavolo pizza which came out fairly quickly and was decently priced. It was very good and close to a lot of attractions so a quick stop in between seeing the sights.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrUCS6yeSiG9svTRxcpctw&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-12-3"},{"Name":"Micha≈Ç Cichecki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeIsXVkomojwBIrbc1gS8VMT7OhPl5KLf9cG6WKIZSLfqYbCJT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On our trip we chose this restaurant 3 times. Really enjoyed the food there. Portions are good, the quality is top notch. Place looks nice, you can eat in the garden if you are looking for a quiet place. Definitely would recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBvhOhSHaJQVTK0WSfTXj5D&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-7-29"},{"Name":"Sandra Stevanovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW5PCIa7iqwhXZbxUSOzL2kUEntI-je4h-PGsHJMD7UcyjZ6fj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant serves high-quality food near the Trevi fountain and the Pantheon church. The vibes are top-notch, the staff is kind and nice, and don't even get me started on the food. Pizza had the most delicious, fluffy and crunchy crust with gorgeous ham, cheese and tomato sauce. Lasagne is very creamy and not at all strong - everything is perfectly in balance and it simply melts away in your mouth. For those who do not want to spend too much on drinks, they have the offer of a glass of wine (specialty of the house), either red or white, for ‚Ç¨5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDcdnxY6WgC0-ThXJ9inIAN&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"ari santo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ7BdVir5kpPovG2wTbeExg1WL5hqXppIm5d67_SrrwDLNGGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very good food and me and my mom felt super welcomed and I also gossiped with Ottaviano. Truly a great time we'll come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDEK5BPxBywybBl5dbfHOlg&fid=0x0:0x4266dc4e597a6508"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"Leo Browne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb2Y9vQfcLtMdWySB005rC_JGrOWp4R1fW_rzA16JTKckxPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"our first time in rome and decided to visit this restaurant. otto served us with help from the rest of the team and was genuinely some of the best food i‚Äôve ever had. my girlfriend had the lasagne which looked and taste absolutely INCREDIBLE. i myself had the diavlo pizza which was the best pizza i‚Äôve ever consumed. for dessert we both had chocolate souffl√© which didn‚Äôt disappoint, with a side of a beautifully tasting margarita, pinot grigio and some sex on the beach cocktails. cannot recommend a restaurant more than this!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Osteria da Fortunata

descriptions: Organic recipes & handmade pasta are offered in this down-to-earth, country-style venue.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Bates","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2BSNCKtUGmVah68KFtRRpBWPUt6ywUMABjHFmQZL1FRfpEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW WOW WOW WOW. Scaloppine al limone was beautiful, the gnocchi was great. I had 8 tiramisus in 4 days (do not judge me üëÄ), and this topped it at number 1 for me. Absolutely delicious. The ragu was okay, but I would have chosen the amatriciana if I went again. The staff were lovely and accommodating and you are elbow to elbow with other tables - that could be a deal breaker for some, but id do it every day of my life to eat there. Make sure to book ahead","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCI_leyuBt5yA2NMgp2VM_b&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"K Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyxtulkNVvEhSW0PGl_N80EyohuBtiu9nTTo-7eoMINSrlSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"November 20, 2025

I recently had an excellent dining experience that deserves praise. The pasta was outstanding, especially the carbonara‚Äîperfectly al dente with a rich, velvety sauce that struck the ideal balance between creamy and savory. Every bite felt authentic and thoughtfully prepared.

The appetizers were just as impressive: fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Each dish complemented the next and set the stage for the meal perfectly.

A special shout-out goes to our server, Peppe. His warm personality, attentiveness, and genuine passion for good food made the evening even better. Peppe offered great recommendations and made us feel truly welcome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCTOnyGQdanM_iwCNL6CMUl&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Diane InParis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZBIlX2xn0znluIzuocdMNGD_KqxEB72aePEXacU0oPoIrgvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my second visit to Osteria da Fortunata, and it came about after my reservation at Ristorante Colosseo Luzzi was unexpectedly canceled. Despite the change of plans, I‚Äôm glad I ended up here again.

I was seated on the terrace this time, so I didn‚Äôt get the chance to see the interior or fully experience the ambiance inside. That said, the food more than made up for it. I absolutely loved my pasta ‚Äî I believe it was a gricia ‚Äî rich, perfectly cooked, and full of flavor. The fiore di zucca was also excellent and a real highlight.

The waiters were very ‚ÄúItalian‚Äù üòÑ ‚Äî lively and straightforward ‚Äî but honestly, two thumbs up for the service. Efficient, authentic, and part of the charm. Overall, another great experience at Osteria da Fortunata.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCuABP5wQnHdpsphdKnCPb_&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Sun Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaKiCDFntJFfmszrXeMlSKliQVs9a5He_vUxNi6qmnZM7He9iPMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The homemade pasta is outstanding ‚Äî fresh, flavorful, and full of authentic Italian taste. You might have to wait a little during peak hours, but trust me, it‚Äôs worth every single penny and every minute. Relatively cheap our lunch was only 65 euros

The cozy atmosphere and friendly service make the whole experience even better. A must-visit spot if you want to taste real Roman cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBXVOcVk_4fBLU0c3k2bYE4&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Jason Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3KUcs7i-Fixr6ndw35rF9cbBNneu_m9BecAQwsBbQhVrLCjG2WA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh al dente pasta made to order. The Amatriciana was the best in Rome, lovely deep pork fat flavour and a slight heat kick from the chili.

This place also serves the best aubergine parmigiana. Freshly baked with fresh eggplant and generous amount of parmesan and mozzarella.

We arrived at 17:30 and got a table straight away with no queueing. Service was friendly and staff speak good English. Decor is rustic and homely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAcfxNrsAVQsHJW2UrG5sP5&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Benjamin Deljkovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqIjveIVd2GoIGgGWDCynfk0J1qhSXgi76cCEbH6oE2eO_zqQX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for dinner here. The food was very nice but the service was exceptional. The waiter explained everything and was very friendly and patient. The pasta was very nice and so vas the tiramisu ( only a photo of the last bite, forgot the take a picture ). The caprese was phenomenal. The tastiest mozzarella i have eaten.
The only thing I didn't like was how jacked the tables were. It is very crowded. Also a bit pricy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDh0pj_8FEfxubCSka8lO9g&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-12-20"},{"Name":"Rachele Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWjIklA1lu9GyNyAr9-T243MLztCyqDbJ4CDzcHxH6H35CiIM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came on 1/17/26 and got Luca as our server and he was phenomenal with serving us and super nice. The food was amazing and we had a table with a view of watching the ladies hand make the pasta. 10/10 would recommend coming here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDblu70xkRwmuye9S2UF_60&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Monika Drazic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURUGmYtHoc6G56mgT4a87BCwBSTi1jWuhzb228UjOVyHTmphGW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Osteria da Fortunata in Rome today (20th November) and absolutely loved it.

The food was outstanding ‚Äì you can really taste that the pasta and sauces are homemade. I had the cacio e pepe, my husband had the pesto pasta, and both dishes were full of flavour and perfectly cooked. We finished with what was honestly the best tiramisu ever ‚Äì light, creamy and delicious.

Service was just as impressive as the food. Our waiter Peppe was excellent ‚Äì quick, friendly, attentive and always with a smile.

Overall, a fantastic experience and we‚Äôd definitely come back. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhApBY_1TKdNyeNR7Y2X8aS1&fid=0x0:0xe393531b25d31389"],"When":"2025-11-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenny D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJucl8pzRDjulWBCZIdDSqA4ru-Zi1HStdJXGkEPXmMlLdvj_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A 5-star experience. Fantastic menu and every dish we chose hit the mark in terms of presentation and taste. Absolutely delicious! Also recommended a lovely local wine by our charming waiter. A special first night in Rome. Would not hesitate to recommend or come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAZ2A-jwDphrXK9aajgYLAu&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Farzona Azƒ±zova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDM7NYTx976VelmxVYvrdIG77kha4fh6LekPF4UfO3slUDIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated the birthday of our friend at this restaurant and everything was perfect. The appetizers we had at first were so good. The tagliata steak was amazing, not chewy or dry as it is in many restaurants, so we loved it. Many thanks for everybody who served us and especially for the waiter June who made our stay more comfortable. Definitely recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXqf-Wt4jkb2tCtuh9kJ4I&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Eduardo Ferrari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0-oBXPQ78tSeefIoQW3ROeB8jl0yYbn1klALVxokji1JGbweQcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a long flight from the US and arriving in Rome early in the morning, we were exhausted. With heavy rain pouring outside, we didn‚Äôt want to venture far from our hotel so we decided to try the rooftop restaurant, La Fata Ignorante, at the iQ Hotel. It turned out to be the perfect choice.

The rooftop setting is cozy, warm, and inviting, exactly what we needed after a long travel day. The staff was exceptionally kind and welcoming, attentive without being intrusive, and really added to the experience.

The food was a standout. The pasta carbonara was absolutely amazing rich, creamy, perfectly cooked, and easily one of the best versions we‚Äôve had. And the tiramisu deserves a special mention: it was hands down the best we had in all of Italy during our trip.

Prices were very reasonable, especially considering it‚Äôs a hotel restaurant with such a nice atmosphere and high-quality dishes.

Overall, La Fata Ignorante exceeded our expectations and offered the perfect first meal in Rome. We highly recommend it, whether you're staying at iQ Hotel or simply looking for a great, relaxed dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBZTGWObjnygjqocprVfr7u&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-12-1"},{"Name":"Luisa Ricardo Merlo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxFOGZH5GwTIV2-YpG6GPJfkb6Rzd4E9vWrmh78Myhx77IJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw great reviews of the restaurant and since we were spending New Years eve in Rome, we decided to book dinner at La Fata Ignorante. The food was fantastic and the staff was extremely professional and friendly. I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjJGV-9osl3vp97gsJbc-e&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Alex Manero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeNHic_hQiCChHMFw33Pe3jMoEG6m6UxIM_Ha4WEgO98aMQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the ultimate dinners in Roma. The staff is exceptional. The decor ans ambience are perfect. The food is exquisite. We finished this meal wishing for nothing else. 10/10 in every way. Never change, La Fata Ignorante.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDVYb2ZLoHBrPhxOLelybqU&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"Gokcen Gokceoglu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUQ_bGxbAZZOmtOYZIo-Ix80Pu408TvFPedk7wyXNnh3Wtcp8P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazingly delicious food, excellent service, and an atmosphere you won‚Äôt find easily in Rome. You can enjoy a beautiful view of the city from the terrace while savoring their incredible dishes. The wine selection is also very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAlCVcO7POSzxN--wBPBdPG&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Anita Greben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxUV88H7SAvT5LNxN6btFJJCzaw2UullA_1jy4r5fPMNQrvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was truly amazed by this restaurant,I had an amazing dinner here with my husband. It is a peaceful and clean rooftop. The Atmosphere was the best part about it, the staff is extremely patient and friendly, especially our waiter named June. Food was good, carbonara is great and my husband really liked his pasta with clams. Both flavorful, portions are on the smaller side tho. The staff, service, and atmosphere is what really topped things off. We have been through most of Italy on this trip from the north end and south end, and the staff here as been one of the most friendly and kind staff we‚Äôve had this whole trip throughout Italy .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBiS3MFZ9H7Sf0ArYMPL_C9&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-9-1"},{"Name":"Denise Hudson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAlu7oBXWxpeZWrASBAYw7au1Kji6EvgT-WlGU8CkgUP9r0s7m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh. i am not sure if I want to share this wonderful secret rooftop gemüòÅThat overlooks le teatre de Opera. It is very quiet with a nice vibe.   The dining side of the restaurant does not have a view but nice but has good ambiance but only if it isn't too hot outside!   There is inside dining as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEBhCq6c4alOzc0EO4-ZtC&fid=0x0:0x26d8d302f8ab3c2a"],"When":"2025-9-2"}]

Beautiful little courtyard with fountain. Would check it out as place to stay when in Rome next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCZ1krAEdA090GMFCGBgMkA&fid=0x0:0xcd2239d05db64102"],"When":"2025-9-23"},{"Name":"Megan Hawkless","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJgL5WiVpa6rOQ9sbTunU4BWtT_9GzCyZbmO1RZwU_AjGMrNarkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delightful affordable food and so easy if you're staying at the hostel. The staff treated me so well as I was a little under the weather ü•∞ so grateful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBeVl-1CtV1ZXMJl4zFNQst&fid=0x0:0xcd2239d05db64102"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Lefteris Kakapouras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuWOmYtgQUfreD2S_-q825Nauzxp5M2w-8VqzR_RhnAMc5cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great hostel! Situated in an ideal location in the historical centre of Rome, 5 minutes walking from Fontana di Trevi and close to the Coliseum and other attractions. The room and the toilet were very clean with comfortable beds. Check in is flexible, you can let them know what time you'll get there and check out is at 10 in the morning. You can pay extra 10‚Ç¨ for breakfast but I didn't so idk how it is. Overall a great experience and would revisit if I'm in Rome again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCElI7-3YxD7dlD3WPMJooa&fid=0x0:0xcd2239d05db64102"],"When":"2025-8-21"},{"Name":"Saurav Samar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqYT6ZZU5yZRrnV51nJ9VAGsYo_b1fJ-3Qi40jrQ4OyonkdsRUXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jo&Joe Roma‚Äôs restaurant is a hidden gem in the heart of the city. The atmosphere is modern, vibrant, and social, making it a great place to grab a meal whether you‚Äôre staying at the hostel or just passing by.

The menu offers a good mix of Italian and international dishes, with something for everyone. While not a fine-dining experience, the food is fresh, flavorful, and reasonably priced. Portions are generous, and the quality is solid for the price point.

The staff are friendly and efficient, creating a welcoming and laid-back vibe. Plus, the location is fantastic‚Äîperfect for grabbing a meal before exploring Rome‚Äôs attractions.

Overall, Jo&Joe Roma‚Äôs restaurant is a great casual dining spot with good food, a lively atmosphere, and fair prices. Definitely worth a visit if you‚Äôre in the area!

‚≠ê Rating: 4.5/5 (Great food, nice vibe, good value for money)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDQiKT-9QE&fid=0x0:0xcd2239d05db64102"],"When":"2025-3-8"},{"Name":"dave latour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeqruYNA8jIYU6mqVo4Z1Ar515IzKLN2QGaZExuRL2tMghW-Rr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is definitely not your average hostel. Feels much more like a hotel experience. The best quality fitout, very relaxed vibe. Do not let the club, bar included scare you off, it is not a backpacker hostel. More adult quiet drink spot with fantastic food options Highly, highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7qab3zQE&fid=0x0:0xcd2239d05db64102"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Mel Warhurst","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzaWRnTs6Gcy1FlUL2vvY7JoeyYwJBVNHpNUir_4vrh_noKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience was so great, I ate something here every day I was in Rome.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfVyjtjkE-r4Gpct_hW_LnAqGmuUr0Kw8uijjSplxIJmnf7UtU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Salumeria isn't just a sandwich shop; it's a charismatic culinary experience that immediately became my favorite in Rome and the second-best I‚Äôve found in all my Italian travels. Tucked away with a small, yet inviting and charming atmosphere, this spot perfectly blends a fresh, modern aesthetic with old-world charm, emphasized by the cured meats hanging on display. It‚Äôs the ideal locale for a casual date or catching up with friends over a glass of local wine and a delicious bite.

My family and I managed to sample a fantastic selection, including the Keep Calm, Bacca Rossa, Williams, and Fico sandwiches, along with the generous Iberico Taglieri (charcuterie board). While everything was undeniably delicious, the Keep Calm and the Fico were the absolute standouts.
The Keep Calm is a masterpiece of textural and flavor balance. It masterfully combines Prosciutto cotto with crema di radicchio, stracciatella cheese, cherry tomatoes (pomodorini), and rughetta (arugula). The creaminess of the stracciatella provides a luxurious base that is perfectly cut by the necessary acid from the tomatoes and the sharp, welcome bite of the red radish cream. It‚Äôs a composition that truly compliments itself and elevates simple ingredients to an art form.
Not to be overshadowed, the Fico sandwich was another clear winner, thanks to the star element: the fig. Its rich, sweet flavor was absolutely delicious, providing an unforgettable sweetness that made the whole sandwich sing.

Beyond the food, the service truly sets La Salumeria apart. The guys behind the meat slicers were exceptional‚Äîfriendly, genuinely willing to help, and clearly passionate about the great food they create.

If you‚Äôre looking for high-quality, perfectly balanced Italian sandwiches and charcuterie in a cozy, beautiful setting, this is the place. We highly recommend swinging by La Salumeria; you won't regret making it your own favorite Roman stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC5DkBF9hitQdao-oHe6yGt&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Sheila Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJArK2S1LXB2Cpr3yuYjSECyQBmD35ik_9djflP-jbjegIb6KFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had the best fresh sandwiches here- with ample glasses of wine. The sandwiches were very flavorful and the service was outstanding!  The music was awesome too, which encouraged us to linger over our meal and talk to each other more. Thank you for the lovely experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBPLny4nUlJV0HJyyALcybg&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"matias cocconi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUB9spGE1LmT8UzVVdBRnaL8FCTEBXgBo8qKLLkjBTO6O3DpPR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best charcuterie board ever at La Salumeria! The quality of the meats and cheeses was incredible, and everything tasted so fresh and authentic. It‚Äôs a small, cool place with a great atmosphere ‚Äî definitely worth going out of your way to visit. I‚Äôll 100% come back next time I‚Äôm in Rome! üáÆüáπüßÄüç∑

It‚Äôs worth to deviate from your itinerary to visit it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAQkMTNFQMS-97KSeIcbvW3&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"Carl Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVcto5IMOPpPG2Omb6ar7vAHAp0uXTOpVAwOpep-I6M_DBFR5ZMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food in a laid back setting! The sandwiches are packed with flavor. The are lots of choices for the charcuterie boards. The wait staff are kind and efficient. There's a good selection of wine.and prices are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC8FsKOnG8YvvFN6HbH90W-&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Emelito Dequina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTjBy6SmvWgFW1LDY20zwd287GzhW6aJcvutoJsOiGjOBpeiIWVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food, atmosphere, and service.  Kelly, was friendly and helpful.  I had the Pork in Progress and my wife had the Nordico, both were delicious.  They also have a good selection of beers.

We would definitely come back to try other items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAGahqf1jicK1S0K7ZvCEVh&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-10-15"},{"Name":"Paul P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZzt5ojFLRWBw0ckyPt2HKUvQF6Vq7AZZGZbTjMqzxi6P1SR55=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a place! üòÄ The staff were super friendly to us, even though we know about two words of Italian üòû and the food was amazing. The porchetta sandwiches were great but the best was the Maialina bruschetta, with porchetta, cheese and truffle. Fantastic. We will be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCA45smiBqT1rP2msfY1e9n&fid=0x0:0x8fc050810e1c39c6"],"When":"2025-7-29"},{"Name":"Helene Duns√¶d","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnwTC9AmDrodsWnPIqmtlLiK9cLP9uRVAGKjqI-1qNha3-fVGE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great and fast service! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sara Govero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjMU7z97rdD2svn1-C9GTSS1Q9RqzHUm9ZZLTms7BWSiwdRcMj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch and it's Michelin Starred. Holy ravioli! That was a good call that I'm taking credit for and the artichoke was amazing. If you come to Rome, artichokes are an absolute must! And mine deserved an award! This spot is close to all the things. Service was fast and flipped us in an hour. As tourists, we appreciate that. The","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA5bfRSHtCqgoxSO0IxCZa3&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-11-12"},{"Name":"Madalina Azzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQP8WWtfzxkS07wh9g1RP6p4oPbbqWkKazx9qM6yTf3zjJK5-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An unforgettable experience, truly special

We visited Colline Emiliane in September during our trip to Rome, and it was absolutely unforgettable. Friends of ours from Brazil took us there, they had first been here more than 10 years ago and made a point of returning, which already says everything about this place.

From the very first bite, we understood why it left such a lasting impression on them. The food was exceptional, deeply authentic, and made with so much care and tradition. Every dish felt special, the kind of meal you remember long after your trip ends.

This restaurant is marcante in the best possible way, one of those rare places that stays with you. It has now become a place we know we will definitely return to whenever we‚Äôre back in Rome.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for true Emilian cuisine and a memorable dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCFIbpG6O9tgRQ8Io4ETohE&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Patrick Conlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhh-tSXadAO3qH6JVXDH-I8GzdsB9Yqw6a4lrz3tp9VeYPCm0TWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was truffle season so I tried I couple of the restaurant's specials and couldn't be happier.

My scrambled eggs with black truffle were perfect - not too dry, not too wet, and topped with shaved truffle. The earthiness of the truffle blended with the fresh eggs to bring out the best of each. Wonderful.

Next was veal with cheese, ham, and truffle. The sharpness of the cheese highlighted the truffle and added depth to the veal and ham. It was very cheesy, and very moorish.

Their pasta dishes look amazing as well, my partners tortellini and brodo was soft and dissolved in the mouth. Her milk-stewed veal was soft and plainly one of the specialties of the house.

Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHudV8zq6VpxBjHXJR5S-N&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"Guilherme Herculano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-sBlayuindM62omxXBtxwGqUKhitSrGXECpM47_D6eMG6Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10

Best restaurant I‚Äôve been in Rome.

Absolutely spectacular!

Pumpkin Gnocci with Parmesan Sauce and Truffle are the star dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxiI-asKAM0C0Rs9BLXGzz&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Dima Simbiryov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU46usmBSiaBj3qD_zqbtGTwMVEeh-3XIlbe4Ba-XBDRihRjbv0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very overrated place with bad ignorant service. I was served my dish while I was at the toilet washing my hands which weird for a Michelin place to say the least.
Food was average (ravioli with spinach) while the desert was absolutely tasteless.
You can definitely find better places with tasty Italian food and friendly service for third the price of the check in there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAP6_H92otY7sh1JuKe5qse&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-10-22"},{"Name":"Bruce Seo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIsi6-0CRjfhZt9M63MvPp3Fg7IGWxWlN4aJm5Yed2Ro_Uj8Bo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pasta restaurant in Rome. Hand made noodles and source too. Recipe is authentic like home made one.
Better to reserve first or waiting in a line before opening time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDhkXM6SIpNR3NqMA5Yz1Ss&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-9-23"},{"Name":"Matthew Pendergast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqhsusk22vcd6cQ6HfMLDG2IU4pQD5C1DfWFMW6lTUHzjJtayg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really a fantastic meal of homemade pasta. I am truly pleased with a place offering a small menu of a mix of seasonal and classic dishes with an emphasis on quality and flavor. This place was a triumph in these categories.
To begin, our table share the appetizer sampler, a perfect selection of primarily cured meats from the Emilia-Romagna region.
I then enjoyed the tagliatelle con porcini from the seasonal menu. The handmade pasta was absolutely divine: both airy and light but substantially rich to offer an incredibly satisfying chew.
Zabaiolone for dessert, my mouth was singing an aria all the way home.
You should definitely make a reservation if you can.  If not, arrive 20min before they open and it is possible you will get a table. Many people in our line did (we had a reservation).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAFa-5ZTvxMryHM94VFZGwB&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-9-19"},{"Name":"Joel Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxH1bevZn9Yqj8r1Qa_w2G_Vl6Qcnkhqy8JMlTy7Mh5Af3TsoS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. We followed some reviews to see if they could sit us without a reservation. They did! The pumpkin ravioli, lasagna, and stuff pork chop‚Ä¶. Too good to describe. Wish we could‚Äôve gotten the lemon meringue!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALqyzGHqJQGQbQokSi9rof&fid=0x0:0xf2781bf66cdf53f8"],"When":"2025-7-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fran Herro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJcEGVFxawY7RsCrsdTMfFIXt8nZlmua9R56gP_gDZwm4wPrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food here is good but it is a very touristy restaurant. We didn‚Äôt hear a single French word spoken at any table. That‚Äôs fine of course but it‚Äôs important to note. We ordered the beef stew which was tasty and the meat was tender but it was very expensive and in our opinion not superior to other renditions we enjoyed for far cheaper in the area. That being said the service was great and we still had a very enjoyable experience here. We would recommend it so long as you know you will be dining exclusively with other tourists and paying high prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHM4FHIhqatle82IDIi5c_&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Sabrina Campos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9pCtP6XZJyrWyeWzlfFhrFJ9A-MhCMqNBPgb_txcy2xqL8nna=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Short story short, the kitchen was closing in 5 and my brother & I were running 15 minutes late. I thought it‚Äôd be a reach to call and ask if we could place the order through the phone, but to my pleasant surprise, Taisa (I hope I‚Äôm remembering it right) said of course. Automatically the best service I‚Äôve had in Paris. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

5 minutes in & we had our Filet de Boeuf au Poivre,  Chicken Cordon Bleu, and the Ravioli with mushrooms and ricotta in front of us ‚Äî all of which I‚Äôd order again. I compared the pepper sauce with La Petite Chaise, tbh I think this one wins. It paired perfectly with a 2017 Faug√®res. The cordon bleu tasted like a grilled ham and cheese üî•

You know it‚Äôs a good meal when you don‚Äôt have to ask for salt. Regretfully, we skipped dessert, but I heard the cr√®me br√ªl√©e is out of this world.

No complaints here. The definition of cozy & by far one of the best traditional French bistros.

Love scale: üçÑüçÑüçÑüçÑ
Occasion: With friends, family, date night
Follow @sabrique_ on IG for more from Paris and beyond","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAXe235pzuKqwT6JyPlk6iJ&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"Anne Haapanen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXowPFHFv8mVDYDLVaV6t8yPyjy0FStXlbQdg99rzgFwhTz9YWe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband, daughter, and I came for dinner on a Sunday evening. We were kindly welcomed and well taken care of.

We had the mushrooms, artichokes, and salad with Parmesan to start with. They were all delicious. We each had the steak with peppercorn sauce for dinner, again excellent, with mashed potatoes and spinach as sides, which were also very good. For dessert my daughter and I had cr√®me br√ªl√©e and my husband had the tarte Tatin‚Ä¶we loved them! Lastly, THE BREAD‚Ä¶dreamy!!!

After being unable to get a reservation, the last time we were in Paris a year ago, we were happy to be able to go this year, and look forward to our return the next time we‚Äôre here, it is that good! Thank you to the wonderful chefs and staff!

P.s. There are non-alcoholic drink options for those who do not drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA8AxnSHGvroMxi0DZsjslr&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-12-8"},{"Name":"Pablo Sainz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo4EaSC3CH500nUvLCwWbTWxzrPGaYmX07GeHRosqBfAiYWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was very good. We had the steak both of us. Mine was without a sauce and it was very tender juicy. The only problem that I feel from the restaurant is that the crowd is only American, It feels a little touristy but it was with general notes despite a long way for a reservation it‚Äôs a good place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtI15JJXItZ11d81yB2qzu&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Malte Holm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYanOPOfmTYkXZxcXMAV9bmEatoH91AlLb9twMnKQaGIaU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious, comforting, traditional bistror-food. We had chicken with mashed potato, ravioli, croque monsieur, baba at rum, and creme br√ªl√©e. Everything was very good, our favorites were the chicken and creme br√ªl√©e. The desserts were huge, one is easily enough for 2 people. The service was very friendly, welcoming, and efficient. Book your table way in advance!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBQCjqdmRr9CDSe_hO4Q4DJ&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"Ms May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvpHgrnrLdL3K0KgZUE2YznMhZrAGDEPgdgn_ZF4O8a3FU0k5X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Marais Gem Serving Up Classic Comfort at Bistrot Des Tournelles

In a city brimming with culinary treasures, Bistrot Des Tournelles, nestled discreetly in the Marais, stands out not for ostentatious innovation, but for its masterful dedication to the enduring joys of French bistro fare. It is a place that feels both timeless and vibrantly current, a testament to the idea that classic dishes, executed with precision and passion, will always find their appreciative audience.

The atmosphere strikes a perfect balance: a cozy warmth pervades the dining room, with its polished wood and inviting banquettes, yet there's an undeniable buzz that speaks to its popularity among discerning locals and visitors alike. Service is attentive and knowledgeable, guiding diners through a menu that is a love letter to French gastronomy.

Begin, perhaps, with the Asperges blanches & sauce hollandaise, a seasonal triumph. The white asparagus, plump and tender, arrived perfectly cooked, their delicate bitterness beautifully complemented by a rich, silken hollandaise that was a marvel of emulsification. It was a simple dish, elevated to an art form.

For mains, the choices are a celebration of hearty, comforting flavors. The Filet de boeuf, sauce au poivre is a robust and deeply satisfying plate. The beef, cooked to a perfect medium-rare, was fork-tender, its richness cut by a classic, impeccably balanced peppercorn sauce. Equally impressive was the Poulet fermier √† la cr√®me & aux morilles, a dish that transported one straight to the French countryside. The farm-raised chicken was succulent, its earthy flavor amplified by the creamy, intensely mushroom-laden sauce that begged to be sopped up with every last piece of bread. And for those seeking a playful yet indulgent classic, the Cordon bleu de volaille, comt√© & jambon delivered in spades. This was no ordinary cordon bleu; the chicken was impeccably tender, encasing a generous, gooey heart of melty Comt√© and savory ham, all encased in a crisp, golden crust that crackled with each bite.

Bistrot Des Tournelles is more than just a meal; it's an experience. It‚Äôs a reaffirmation that, in an ever-changing culinary landscape, the soul of French cooking, rooted in quality ingredients and traditional techniques, continues to thrive, offering genuine pleasure and a profound sense of culinary well-being. This is a bistro to bookmark, to return to, and to savor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCkO-BcBhodbkhgiASUJkwZ&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-6-27"},{"Name":"Jan Potts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMmKOhvzGZyPpUIEDAiKixFxLVU235la7ZG5rZA0eVLusdXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was our second time at Bistro des Tournelles. We‚Äôve also recommended the bistro to several friends who have also dined there.  Each time we ate there  the food was excellent. And, overall, the service was very pleasant. But we felt we were rushed through our meal a bit. And at the end, as we were sitting, enjoying a last few minutes chatting with people at the next table, we were presented with the check without requesting it and asked to leave. That was unacceptable especially to my husband who said he‚Äôs not certain he wants to return. Given that our meal was over 300 euros and we hadn‚Äôt been at the table 2 hours it was very disappointing. And this after we accommodated the restaurant‚Äôs request that we dine earlier than our original reservation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuBbJEXmI7WoOIQfn5ZZ7N&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Henry Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAofANalbgzdLecTwe4vScNwPQyewX3PHZtzTcMO4yLMW47Jpn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We showed up 1 hour late to our reservation because I had a food coma from eating croissants and pasta all day.

I woke up from a phone call from the restaurant saying we were late for our reservation so we hurry up and got dressed and ran to the metro. We hurry to the restaurant and I was worried our table was gone but the lady was so incredibly nice and said we can still have dinner but need to finish in one hour.

The next hour was the filled with unforgettable memories of things I put inside my mouth. The cordon bleu was so creamy and delicious. My steak filet was cooked perfectly and very tender. The creme brulee was the best I ever had in my life.

I would trade both of my kidneys and my knees for this creme brulee recipe...

Very recommended. 10/10

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCUk8OCSDIGQruG0yQ7dFXd&fid=0x0:0x3786d8da5b343efd"],"When":"2025-9-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Weiting Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxDMoVJ61h-eMmFUHrAlH_67r2Sm-Q3RohBZCC8Lax9isnujxB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for lunch on 12/25 and only then realized our reservation was for the following day. The staff were so kind and still accommodated us.

From start to finish, it was an outstanding experience‚Äîattentive service, a relaxed yet elegant ambience, and truly memorable food, desserts, and views.

Our waiter (half-jokingly) said dessert would be the best part of the meal, and he wasn‚Äôt wrong. Every dessert we ordered was exceptional.

The oysters and the French toast were the best we‚Äôve ever had!

Don‚Äôt miss the terrace‚Äîthe view over the Seine with the Eiffel Tower in the distance is stunning.

Dining at Le Tout-Paris was one of the highlights of our trip, and we‚Äôre very grateful for the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCU2bubYJjEO_L-bZYGppLM&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-12-27"},{"Name":"Christina Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyL-RLdaIOjA5hbaPZqnL2N9vfnHXKObk3ArCw0rHsjIJ-_v1DeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed our dinner here. The pigeon, mushroom tart, and mashed potatoes were delicious! My friend liked her lamb. Great wine choices per the sommelier. Relaxed atmosphere, not a rushed dinner at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDaq7to2SEadK13Nv4G2nnp&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-10-13"},{"Name":"Christopher Taylor II","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR1aDf9yNDzKE1lQM__tJzzbBrTSfuBCk_uwwTd3H4635v4s4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Le Tout-Paris marked our first Michelin Star experience, and it certainly delivered on ambiance and service. Perched high above the city, the view from our table was absolutely breathtaking; definitely an unforgettable backdrop to a luxurious evening.
Service was superb, with staff that made us feel genuinely welcomed and cared for. The food was good, though not exceptional. For nearly $500, we felt the overall experience didn‚Äôt quite justify the price tag. Some dishes leaned heavily into complexity, which occasionally made them less visually appealing, though the flavors were usually solid.
If you're seeking a refined night out with world-class hospitality and stunning views, Le Tout-Paris offers a memorable experience‚Äîjust be prepared for a splurge that may not fully deliver on culinary wow factor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBrhAHMlYSoMUdoZ4NTPSGq&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-9-5"},{"Name":"Oliver Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpIYPgw8z-ksRLTJLwb0wVBpO9ESRQgsELGG1IkZjpbIzoqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a lovely dinner here whilst in Paris.

The views of Paris are stunning and rare to find a gem with such a beautiful view.

The service was very good and highly attentive.

Food was amazing and definitely worth the trip. We had the tomato tart which was excellent, the pork chop which was equally brilliant and the sea bass which was very good

Drinks are extortionately expensive but you know what you‚Äôre getting yourself in for when going to a restaurant such as this

Atmosphere is luxurious and everyone is smartly dressed giving it a wonderful feeling for a special Parisian evening

Overall it‚Äôs great for a special occasion and would recommend to others","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAp7I5P_25F2xaTdqULjh-b&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-10-11"},{"Name":"Crystal T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-SRcbNevgtgqvtYsKB0EZItPi-E3crvX_vetjM_BSR3xY4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely lunch during my last trip in Paris.
The service was outstanding and they even provided coffees and mignardises to go as I had an appointment right after.
Will definitely come back in summer to enjoy the beautiful terrace.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAAzTaHYGIHHLatIh1umVpa&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Casey Nicole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtB5ujgr4Yvnq6qwqjg_TacyOJeEIMXiVvtCKVMMJyMWO0b4QVwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I simply cannot recommend this restaurant enough. From the views, to the level of care presented by the staff, and last but certainly not least, the food! I was absolutely wowed at every moment. I asked for some hot tea to warm me up as it was getting slightly chilly on the terrace and they immediately brought me a blanket as well. They brought my daughter a surprise congratulations treat (we are here for her senior trip). Just went above and beyond to ensure we had a wonderful experience. We didn't do the tasting menu but we were stuffed by the time we left (4 hours later) and they kept bringing little dishes out to us. Truly a magical experience. It was also nice that they stop people from coming out on the terrace to take pictures, so if you want to be out there you just book a reservation and be seated on the terrace.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBVCIMU9OVohK8YN1iMEWBJ&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-7-23"},{"Name":"Louise Louise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQd26-zzhcHiQIo0tEUn_tGkNisnrHUoe41Nq97ocyXjT2RTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I rediscovered this rooftop restaurant after a while, and it turned out to be an incredibly satisfying dining experience.
Although I usually enjoy wine with my meal, there are places where, if you don‚Äôt order drinks, the staff clearly show their displeasure because it affects sales. However, at this restaurant, the staff were polite and respectful from start to finish, which made it a rare and truly enjoyable experience with fine dining.

We started with a welcome snack that had a lovely contrast‚Äîcrispy on the outside and soft on the inside, with a fresh taste that stood out. The bread came with butter that was so perfectly salty and rich, I was tempted to ask where they got it from‚Äîit was exactly my style.

With such a strong start, we were excited for the starters and mains we had ordered.
The langoustine dish‚ÄîLangoustine vivant et girolles et chanterelles (‚Ç¨49)‚Äîwas beautifully presented, with vibrant colours and charming plating on a gorgeous plate I wanted to take home! The only slight letdown was the sauce‚Äîit could have used a bit more nuttiness to bring out the best in the dish.

The sea bass and lamb dishes were visually stunning, with thoughtful plating and creative touches like round slices of courgette and a lovely yellow ingredient in the sauce. The whole presentation felt detailed and playful, and I was genuinely sad to see the food disappear as we ate. The lack of any fishy smell made it all the more perfect.
The only downside was that the lamb portion felt a bit small. A few days earlier I had a tough and disappointing lamb dish elsewhere, but this one was tender, flavourful, and came with a sauce that felt almost comforting‚Äîlike it was making up for that past experience.

Originally, we hadn‚Äôt planned to order dessert as we weren‚Äôt that hungry, but one of my friends insisted‚Äîand it turned out to be delicious. After seeing the desserts at the table next to us, we even considered ordering more, wondering if we could manage despite being full.
I‚Äôm usually not one for desserts, and often just take one bite to satisfy my curiosity, but this time I decided to wait for another visit and end the meal on a high note‚Äîwith a great view and even better service.

The prices are higher than at a typical restaurant, but for the view, the quality of the service, and the food itself‚ÄîI would definitely recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBeHpJhq4Ke5rzN6Zq9luje&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-8-2"},{"Name":"Mark Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1uBUXRFIZYKZMclLbQl-Wiuec5S6Z91r5k4mHtHQHNGmrSZvh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and outstanding service! The staff were warm and attentive, making the experience even more special. The terrace offers breathtaking views, the perfect backdrop for a memorable meal. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtQmGQ8UX8njYR-SzHOSsL&fid=0x0:0x6568bfb659691796"],"When":"2025-9-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu0Oze1MTN1k4ud6Cn_snX-IwQXtlC6NpNNyWigxr4V-wo1Fk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We reserved a table right when the restaurant opened. We arrived 20 min early and people were already starting to line up in the reserved table line. Right before opening the staff hyped themselves up by signing. They then welcomed everyone extremely kindly and energetically. It felt very special. We got a table on the top floor where the room was decorated very nicely! We ordered two truffle pastas followed by a tiramisu to share. Everything was absolutely delicious. The pasta was not too creamy and tasted in just the right intensity of truffle. The tiramisu was scooped out for us and served on our plate. Tasted fresh and strong- just right. Definitely recommend trying this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBEHtrlIGsmK9aZmqRv4916&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Katie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIISxBGbSUYKExe03FvhcTo-i2TRwpDukfIiqShf2fUp3hTWOUY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emanuela was our server for lunch. She was very helpful and kind to speak with and help narrow down our selections. We sat at the bar and it was fun to watch them prepare some of the dishes. We had two appetizers, two entrees and some drinks. I wish we had room for dessert because every one that we saw prepared looked amazing. Would highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAcIcqv2ksK6upL7wnbbzg_&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2026-1-5"},{"Name":"Brandon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmRp08NhJKFA_PbpttCbbdeu_Zz5BHa8NWWrYdiwj3VFxrC1AXRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Extremely beautiful place, we were fortunate enough to sit at the rooftop garden for lunch. We came on a weekday and had a reservation.

The food however, is nothing to shout about. The truffle pasta is quite like a cream of mushroom soup pasta with an ever so slight truffle aroma, however as someone who likes mushroom soups I still quite liked it ‚Äî albeit disappointed.

The pizza was also quite disappointing, having heard alot about it. The dough was too soft and squishy, and the slice couldnt even hold up on my hand. It was just overall lacking in that body and crunch. The flavours were quite nice though.

Finally, the tiramisu was the absolute worst thing we had. The ladyfingers were so bland and had no coffee taste no alcohol nothing. It was just a bland sponge in a sea of thick cream that also did not taste of mascarpone.

All-in-all, an okish lunch which was made nice thanks to the interior design and nice service. The food wasnt really that good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKg7RXpV26hSO668YLUjSY&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Alexander R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTLPH1ePt0OaDQkAyZKepQPzeZXnf0Ng5jjvNJtSMTBXlh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good, but hyped. Reservation recommended! A breakdown.

- staff is superb 5*, very attentive, if you‚Äôre a tourist or not
- food is quite good, but the specialties are not spectacular. Steak tartare we liked a lot. Burrata pappa nice with red sauce. Pappardelle lobster was ok, not memorable. And the specialty pasta with truffle.. yeah it is nice but I've had better Italian pasta
- full of tourists and not all suited for a nice night out (see Asian tourist who sit in the place with hoodies, while others dress up). The door swings open a lot and it gets uncomfortable cold
- a few nice cocktails and the wine selection is quite good

Nice restaurant, hyped, and we think that a typical Italian would have been a better option. We booked well ahead, as soon as the dates came available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD7e9dXLTUNVLTfUzpEyTUf&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2025-12-25"},{"Name":"Lucifer Reborn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8CSp4EhIlPCYgnrgK-XXpDTh3GCR-_9m9VFZxouRxzzVmfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Reservation was made right when their booking window open, to get the table at the top floor.

During the meal there, there were at least 5-6 groups of people trying to ask the staff if they can take the empty seats at the top floor, but the staff held to their guns, and did not bend the rules!!

Good on them keep that standard!!

Food was nice, each dish was individual portions.

Ambiance and decor was nice!  Worth the trip down.

Asked the service staff for recommendations they were helpful and informative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBzER_5ivZNLb0ii_uNJLFQ&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2025-10-30"},{"Name":"Sabinesh Pottekkatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvckgNs20IKmeDl-RyUdFsWInwD5mhTYHHRzb8wvcdkGx0fCEDpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been to several of their restaurants now and each is uniquely eclectic, the staff is pleasant and food has been consistently great. This place is no different, loved it!!

BTW the Dirty Caprese at Pink Mamma was distinctly different to the one at Ober Mamma. That was a surprise","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjmzKdxdLw9nhQ-UOwYAYM&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Joanna Toh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN4jedBjEM_cGmByJDLsbcldxnVEh_SO3HpyajZi1U5JaHdv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We got the smoked burrata appetiser, pizza, truffle pasta and the tiramisu. Everything was great. We didn‚Äôt know what to expect when we ordered the smoked burrata, but it was delicious! Glad we gave it a shot. The tiramisu was light and creamy. We agree with some of the other reviewers that the truffle pasta doesn‚Äôt have the truffle taste that we were expecting, however, it still tasted great. Overall a great first meal + start to our trip. Definitely make a reservation if you plan on dining here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6Em-k689OvQYCWOl3a8l6&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Laudan J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuhEVepGafZ0jHK2gFImJL3r5g4PkWUxksbncZGZJQ2ykPsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for lunch and ordered the Burrata pappa al pomodoro with Focaccia and Pizza Mammargherita to share and I ordered Tagliata di manzo e chimichurri for my main. The others in my very foodie group ordered Pasta truffe and paccheri al rag√π bolognese. All delicious! And our waiter Alessio was superb! They also brought out a tiramisu to share that was quite frankly the best tiramisu I've ever had. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCbrbnpeFmWN-8ldyzpKHV6&fid=0x0:0xc26d9bf3451087c"],"When":"2025-12-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gyu MMMars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6VoW2b-b7XH0kYqVi3wZ_OaKc2m2zAUAD0es8RhS96e53TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In my opinion, this is the best restaurant in Paris. Beyond the absolutely stunning food‚Äîwhich is arguably the most authentic French cuisine you can find‚ÄîMamie was incredibly kind and welcoming. She made a real effort to communicate with us even though our French isn't the best. The free sangria, complimentary dessert, and the lovely Paris souvenirs really made our day! A truly unforgettable experienceÔºåand I would recommend it to any one who visits Paris.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAy6bjr-YuJU1erTKBm1SZx&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"J Wo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX0OOB5ymbsBy4Rsy8BCKl0GB4DQAM6WwdMXU_faslFzT7taY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little restaurant run by an elderly couple. It was highly recommended by the locals if you want real, authentic French food that they also go to.
I visited right at it opens and had to wait a little because the space only fitted two to three tables. However, I was given a glass of sangria as I wanted. The owner is really friendly and charming. The food was great and very affordable, I ordered the beef stew and a bottle of their red wine, many sauces to go with my plate.
The atmosphere was just amazing, very cozy and warm and welcoming.
In the end, the owner gave the guest each a small gift, such a lovely and hospitable place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCLrqFKRBrS-o4O_ty7NVTa&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"Laurent De Froberville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLy2p6z12r-_Ky8t02dW1Ckc_GuBYvGd6EWhWmTtFQHTgkclA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a place. We can‚Äôt recommend it enough. Mamie Susan is an absolute gem who will welcome you like family. We ordered and loved the famous boeuf Bourguignon and the Poulet R√¥ti.

Thank you again Mamie Susan for the evening, we walked back home with our belly full and our heart filled with gratitude.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDmcqVurA6LOjxtfSYqD_IL&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"B M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgQxZ9rAtQJgsbN1A5iXl3Qove-UCBG6CgmKNQn4W7RRchuka-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mammie was very kind! We went to the restaurant at 10pm but she still served us ‚ô•Ô∏è The food was great and affordable! She even gave us some treats to take home.

Her mustard was very very good omg! ü§ó She doesn‚Äôt speak english but thank god for Google Translate hehe üì±More power to you, Mammie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBiuOIuyWp3hXKEgoz6XMkg&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Sohail Hamid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIO_3xIsreqxiDA8T7pGD_nVlpzA8CnZc2Jez97R82gCUxBKeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is beautiful and the owner is lovely. She will remind you of your family. We went twice and she greeted us like a family. The place is small so waiting can be a pain but its all worth it. She is old and very busy handling things alone so make sure to go there opening time and wait for table to get free.
We love Mami and would have went again if it was open on Sunday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDXaPTochnhducol_dFoTQR&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-11-23"},{"Name":"Andy Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZtzlc5Z7Xlsn-TOL_xMNZ7gKBHJCb-YNBYl1MiH-KmI-6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Contrary to the other reviewers, we didn‚Äôt think that the food was that special (we got the two most popular dishes - the beef bourguinion and the roast chicken). However the vibe was heartwarming. It‚Äôs a cozy family restaurant owned by an elderly couple with the gentleman cooking and the lady serving. She was a gem. The interior decor was adorable. I think it‚Äôs worth dining here not for the food but just for the authentic grandma‚Äôs house dining experience. We came at 9pm right when tables were turning and had to wait 25 min which I think was a fortunately short wait compared to what other reviewers have said.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjVNLYSLd4B0BbGjhV1bWO&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Hanna Maslichenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtM7eoK_k3cnq5FaCdy2Hq5RILpMpgdJaCet3xp3InvMMUNLS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an experience! The lady is lovely and the food made with love is delicious!
The restaurant tiny, up to seven people can be served. I came at 7:10pm and there already was a queue, so I had to wait for and hour and forty minutes..
Some people don‚Äôt really care that others would like to be served today too! That was something that annoyed me at first, but once i got a seat and tried some food - all problems were gone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAF5aMUgrAzLwCmioUUIKLY&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-8-18"},{"Name":"elli huizinga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIt52eCaJkb--Yhok5S5Gc1OjmZT4IheE8XKkyGQ-AOgec6Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic home cooked meal! Very kind people and good service! Worth the bit of a wait while others were finishing their meal. Guests are treated like family in this cozy little restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDkbpCYuUMursdTlXIsr846&fid=0x0:0xa1248d54d397d2c1"],"When":"2025-12-5"}]

title: La Jacobine
address: 59-61 Rue Saint-Andr√© des Arts, 75006 Paris, France
descriptions: Traditional French dishes like onion soup & coq au vin in a snug setting in a historic passageway.
