user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amanda Galal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWezA_HAekM406SQFQR5Re6T0Mg3DpeVNnwfPBzJI4de7EnAy3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolutely incredible French restaurant ‚Äî authentic, beautifully prepared dishes at truly decent prices. Everything feels simple, honest, and done with care, from the seasoning to the presentation. The service is impeccable; warm, attentive, and professional without ever being intrusive.

It‚Äôs a rather small space, which makes it cozy but also means it can be a bit tricky to get a booking (and could use slightly better ventilation on busy nights). Still, it‚Äôs completely worth the effort. A real gem of a place, one of those rare spots that should definitely be on your list if you love genuine French cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDzxtIn5HSyFSI-GCGfJeN8&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Julia Vaninger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0qPovmFiH-qS7MCQu5Fhl5oApEvvipsIZV3l4RHUNDbg-9rR9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WORTH THE HYPE

This place rocked my world on quality and value.
4 course and 2 glasses of wine for $71 euro.

Make a reservation- you need it.

Snails, French onion soup, beef stew and cheesecake.

Service was excellent - regret not asking his name.

Best French onion soup I have had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDm0Ry6jILbnolN4w1UPbCR&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-12-20"},{"Name":"ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkUdHioY5kDaMVBNzuSH35W04aQMF6vo8T5_rLws-mfJEBYUjt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Reservations are strongly encouraged. We arrived on a weekday afternoon and were lucky to snag the last available table. The group after us had to wait over 30 minutes for the next one.
I ordered the onion soup and the restaurant‚Äôs specialty, coq au vin. It was my first time trying coq au vin, so with no reference point, I can only share my impression of it. It had a rich, savory flavor with deep notes of wine. The braised chicken was tender and practically fell apart. My friend ordered the salmon, which was also very delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuUX9A_waKH1RhfaMJnSiE&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Miguel Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyfZbaWY9WdPpVyYJE3Z2WlXR-m2tWDrsV8u6H-nfSp20Abf-m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional stop during a Paris layover. Classic French onion soup was rich and deeply flavorful, perfectly gratin√©ed. Finished with a thick, velvety chocolat chaud and a beautiful raspberry tart... both outstanding. Cozy atmosphere, attentive service, and ideal location near Notre-Dame. Absolutely worth stepping out of the airport for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5eXNCA6otTyihCa5Zs723&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Hans How","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAHh-_obmEHx2fzQ4RwBJ1gGqRJVPEFCFRl2RJjyuw88LsA_4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I did my first Paris solo trip in 2023 and fell in love with the food here - I‚Äôve been back for the third time now for my birthday treat and it‚Äôs as good as the first time. I got the onion soup (it was deliciously cheesy) and the beef stew (like a warm hug in a cold day) and was satisfied by the end of my meal. Thank you for the memorable birthday meal. The waiter‚Äôs dessert recommendation (raspberry tart) was spot on!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDwanHiGbh1xfxRqV09J-jc&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-11-25"},{"Name":"Janice Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJQK5VIa-Htgap00oKgbfvo3OC6mOXMQe85_zEwvqfLLLS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You must make a reservation! We had the delicious french onion soup, the beef stew and the duck tajine. The mains are deliciously cooked and was a very memorable meal. Portions are huge and is somewhat difficult for one to finish so it makes sense to come and share them as a group. The duck tajine is very flavourful, reminds me of a spin off of a butter chicken in its own way as it‚Äôs sweet and savoury! We finished off the meal with coffees and the lemon meringue tarte which was also delicious. Would highly recommend the visit as it‚Äôs also in a very cute alleyway to see stores and restaurants!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCKcA8GhZ7p6PCUemvtd9nP&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-10-14"},{"Name":"Mark Whitmore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV-WNZdKjlddlkUyL0Csl9tnBl0kmBKX-mr9E-J6KFq2JSk9cu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Jacobine gave us the best meal we have ever had in Paris. We booked three months ago or so we thought we did, but they couldn‚Äôt find our booking. Probably best to book on their website. Nevertheless, they managed to squeeze us in after a short wait. We were in luck as ten minutes later people were queueing outside the door.  My wife had the lamb shank with prunes and figs and I chose the slow cooked Beef Casseroie.  Both meals were cooked individually in their own cast iron pots.   Consequently, they came out quickly and were lovely and hot.  The meat was so tender and there were plenty of vegetables to add to the flavour.  I can highly recommend this little gem. So much character and the staff were super friendly.  Be sure to try their wonderful desserts as well. The wine list, while not extensive was still perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBG81m_wX3400rq_E8rqmdx&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Patrick Tuniz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRdESjBH2mvwbzyNLuOV52NCF1Aqgp8e5cLBAkY0i7TCg6LL_Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Jacobine in Paris is such a wonderful spot! The food was absolutely amazing, full of rich flavors and perfectly cooked. The French onion soup was just superb‚Äîwarm, cheesy, and so comforting, easily the best I‚Äôve had in Paris! The waiter was incredibly professional and kind, taking great care of every detail. The cozy atmosphere makes you feel right at home. A truly lovely place for a delicious meal and great service. Totally recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDaqL-Hgnz8h9rByFkGRVnJ&fid=0x0:0x274e05037fc4d75b"],"When":"2025-10-14"}]

[{"Name":"–ë–æ–≥–¥–∞–Ω –ó–∏–Ω–æ–≤—ä–µ–≤","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ18tWAXuGytGwNR-J-MCgP-17A1-mUS53rbOY8SBSeGqOl8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good place, especially for cocktails in the afternoon! The staff were very welcoming  and friendly! Good prices and great cocktails! The atmosphere was so nice with good music! We recommend this place and we will definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBtl3eNipfPu4h5BSFm6LKU&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-8-14"},{"Name":"Ryan Lawler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHyXh9sWkzSUvTrdeZ_S6e1MuYkg0gL_ll2CLFFoxTYfP_pX0l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant meal along the street in a nice area with a wonderful vibe. We ordered 2 pizzas for 2 people which was too much food. Prices were decent for food and drinks, which was appreciated, although taste wasn‚Äôt anything we‚Äôd go back for; the pizza seemed a little under-seasoned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAHHXSrrqLUWAlQoJnhzJyt&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-8-27"},{"Name":"Dallas Wulf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIKY1-0J0GTFfLpqeV5cZxIeJTGLNj6Hnao-Hyh-VwV5at-fvf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed our dinner here. The Burratani poires was our favorite part. We've never had this combo before....the pears and burrata complemented each other so well!
My steak and fries were great. My wife's salad was wonderful as well. We had the appetizer, 2 mains, and 2 drinks for $84. It was a great experience. I would go back if I were looking for a fine dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEKy0mOiry-yIzwE&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-6-4"},{"Name":"Gloria iYare","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXISxAHViq6zfr91GuLm02wgAqSICFIvp_8rOQgFRsuwEl9M4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a coffee and a cheesecake but the cheesecake was a bit pricey (‚Ç¨12) compared to the size.

For the rest friendly staff and good atmosphere and nice playlist.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAevGJraSUrwhJHNQxS0bNS&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Chad Prahl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnh0vCRe1a_31L3VFQpMvb4rhJYSER_pa8g9T3_oxtl3bqjtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Across the board 5 stars for this gem!  The Burrata truly is unique, and absolutely delectable.  The slight taste of honey with thinly sliced pear‚Ä¶. pears perfectly with the fresh cheese.

The penne with chicken and mushrooms also had us coming back for multiple visits during our stay in Paris.  As self certified foodies, we know what we‚Äôre talking about - trust us on this one!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBVV9eMsxurDFWRZBHDN-BV&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-5-30"},{"Name":"Marceline Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV15dn3sWSAoSu6BAbWInDwbsJIYRAD4yYLj7OHSjd0DMbPRpmn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful dinner here. The steak was juicy with a warm, rich sauce. The pizza and the tiramisu also tasted amazing.
It was cold outside, and we were wearing T-shirts, but our server Mehdi made us feel so welcome and he offered us cozy blankets. Super friendly service and great vibes :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMeJibaSgs3B0gE&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-5-10"},{"Name":"S. Richard Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgyk9Au22MSbIKpkQXLXXGmB2_ILI0_638c-IKiOsN0bb3zh7StA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The hostess was great but food was only good. The Espresso Martini was only okay and the dishes all were well presented but not rich in flavor. The tiramisu is as good as advertised.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICbk_PsmwE&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"munkymandee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_apQC1Jw1sxGTV0K93zs5WaVfr-MfKgCM3WHWmpxT8F8_u7am4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I shared a duck pate, croque monsieur and goat cheese salad.

The duck pate was delicious but i found it odd that it was served with plain white bread. Could have been better on toasted baguette or something. The croque monsieur was excellent and goats cheese salad simple but delicious.

We also enjoyed the house red wine. Lovely ambience overlooking a church, and a nice cosy place to relax for a chill simple lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDAyICougE&fid=0x0:0x67566da1302e03c5"],"When":"2025-2-6"}]

[{"Name":"Karina O'Flynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0YvolGfEVVGXc_Tq3twZCd5PETytCh7yUKAEsLjAJ1DrJm6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stunning, stunning, stunning. Food was stun. Both the salmon tagine and the salmon in cr√®me sauce were DIVINE. I actually cannot recommend these dishes enough. The cr√®me sauce was surprisingly rich and decedent and had such a depth of flavour that paired perfectly with the melt in your mouth salmon. The tagine was yum yum yummy and was served with a huge plate of couscous.
The service was great and had some really good drink recommendations","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCzowh6puoSwDxaqcN_3Zqw&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Flora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO6JGsg0hM77cuAhH2UVjl2hQSOM1SnH_pgfIx_a7ZajmZeOXFvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The confit de canard here is outstanding. The duck leg was incredibly tender with perfectly crisp skin, rich in flavor without being greasy. Well-seasoned, comforting, and beautifully executed. Easily one of the highlights of the meal and a dish I would come back for. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaXmJKTN8OC-2Yy16weqGT&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Zhaun Foo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcUIlO3mgYJmLFvaWwnXFYHjCY8oy3MWYpUt9PafTYfR3RsfPfzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch on a Friday. Delicious onion soup, tender beef stew, full of flavour, escargots. Expected better presentation for the landaise salad though. Large dining area with ample space and quick service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDwJjtj8e4cXd3jBg3jNCIj&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Justin lester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQGursn1YmYBA35cbh-vOc6EazlxmGlQn36Uciq8fJLihuzaBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful food.  We had the lamb skewer and the salmon with a plate of escargot‚Äôs and I finished it off with cr√®me br√ªl√©e.  Easily one of my best meals in Paris so far.  The atmosphere was creat and the beer was cold.  Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUXwmkhIOm1bY5q8VQbd1o&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"È©¨Êôì","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIT34b0zrZY5ff3YNInO6203Y2zNGW10yW5Y04tPGvXTIMztA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dining environment is really great! The restaurant even has disinfectant gel. How thoughtful!! The service is top - notch. Thanks to Anais for the service. I highly recommend this place. The food is yummy too, and the portions are huge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCUYFHBztwgZSvZEMCJUHIX&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2025-11-29"},{"Name":"cao tingyi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6P5rXN74_rDjur97r4d_BCzN5QTqElLKp8WBg3BocWCpJvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant served a very generous portion of bread before the meal, along with delicious mint tea. Overall, it was a highly satisfying experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8areT8GPJlyM_G-SJY_HF&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Andrew Mallinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKys2jYrJ5jqcweJwwmKjvfdCUNbCLfgBUvDYmHkK2Whhk6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This meal was excellent.
We had the escargots coquilles,
boeuf bourguignon, pommes vapeurs,
& Couscous poulet Dajaj.

The chicken & beef was so tender and the coucous was fantastic. The escargot was tasty.
Great portions, topped off with good service, would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCMm40bhddjzIZxQ-YEl9hL&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Pasha Parmar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzucotJ5pYjnzTuuBCes9e43ViKyfi6UdOzEjt80u9_O_JbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Salmon tagine was exquisite and beef tartare (raw) was delicious! The servers were attentive and super friendly :) Drinks are strong!!! but a perfect way to start the night will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCx6xwKrpcmsvKzi4LNc-sF&fid=0x0:0xa168c03346f62a0a"],"When":"2026-1-23"}]

[{"Name":"Ropl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS6TWbZXQh8Rm-I7kNqC9eZrO0RBCY6Q9jzn4KWuw4zWN7bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Scrambled egg (weird & runny) with the set breakfast was 3 stars.

All others was just ok nothing to write home about with the le petit d√©jeuner anglais 9.90‚Ç¨ which includes their signature coffee in a soup bowl, small oj, their style of bacon which was not bad, 1 croissant+ sliced baguette, not a bad value.  Ala carte items are higher.
Service staff spoke English and helpful, thus 4 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDO58UX8U1StD7gmn8FnvFn&fid=0x0:0x82acdee8062c0b85"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Vlad Ivancu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKZ7DVSnuVohs1_JdEcSJpEjCpP4VfeVI345t5apcSKw2WhOrh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff were friendly, welcoming, and spoke English, which made the experience even better. The breakfast menu offers a wide variety of choices, and the coffee was excellent.

I ordered the Maxi Brunch, which came with a delicious bacon omelette, a well made coffee, and a fresh, flaky pain au chocolat. The granola was also very good, fresh, and flavorful. Overall, a great spot for a hearty, quality breakfast in Paris. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcj0DsRJ_fBi01xErauodK&fid=0x0:0x82acdee8062c0b85"],"When":"2025-8-10"},{"Name":"Daniela Campos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgKBYOnhegm7NyuYNfzb1e-LE-GZoDiSxTot5CDwCXF51eUv-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the gayest place I've ever been to, and I mean it in the best way possible. I wish there was a place like this in Chile (and everywhere else in the world). They SLAY in every single way possible:
- staff SLAAAY
- food SLAAAAY
- atmosphere 100000/10
Queens we loved you üíï","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdLw9HvpvNoDCuSLoBfT_8&fid=0x0:0x82acdee8062c0b85"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"Pokemontpeee Tpeee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw4a8-KsBaCgUctPWQEPc_uOtFtao5XlK8IJBN9vKmLett8Y0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My baby finally found his soulmate in Paris! w the Queen's blessing üåà, of course!

Thanks!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBAgRBIw7FVNU0zegvPQfZi&fid=0x0:0x82acdee8062c0b85"],"When":"2025-9-12"},{"Name":"M Rabbat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwDFODufX6m9Z387ebZkuv7JPUBBAW6Tjz9knbTX1o1HsiGyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good choice of food at good prices
Portions are a bit small but prices are really interesting. Location is really great! Just behind the BHV mall
We had a croque madame which was nice - a bit small as only 1 layer
The smoothie is delicious for 6 euros excellent price
Another salmon and goat cheese tartine was also good - the dessert du jour or apple pie was large and good - nothing exceptional
We sat indoor to avoid the smoke and it was nice
Very busy so better show up early","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDnJV-H_LIi-r57SyRcNXz-&fid=0x0:0x82acdee8062c0b85"],"When":"2025-6-16"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Josh Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPylP1UnocFPkF6B5OSqJ6vDmCbKh-j8hfLDVctOH6U1VnXWuLPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a delicious dinner here, all ingredients tasted very fresh. The staff were very friendly and welcoming. There was also a good variety of mocktails on the menu that were fantastic. Would definitely come here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpIUC8Nl-3m1zHCMVet6VY\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"C and M Zimmerman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9WUaL3YORsFFjYWNhi8frCkLHHUkbtZM-dwUrt96Jri4DkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good but not great.  Certainly good value for money and the home made profiterole off the Euro 21.50 lunch menu was excellent but the steak and moussaka were only OK, as were the salad and charcuterie appetizers, and the food really was dumped unceremoniously on the plainest plates possible.  See pictures.  A good deal overall and the staff are friendly and efficient and the atmosphere kinda kitschy and cute and you‚Äôd better like bouzouki music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAivzzPKsiEpRVdnxcY3_s2\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqBhkRbkhx5ySgfQHcRWibaKmVjp99xaIkxQl9zwjoCvaYPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly a perfect meal. The owner was so kind and welcoming. The staff was very attentive and the decor was warm as if you were in a French home. I had the spritz, shrimp with warm goat cheese, and the filet de boeuf. Excellent!! This is a special place. I will return. Merci!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsgig74qka4CzsLJf3LiIB\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-10-5"},{"Name":"Belle Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUDgHNJ0pHDVRsG65XwhBnVySvbwJ8n4rOR6uDXgIZRyeWWTHj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can‚Äôt rate this place highly enough! We were lucky to get a spot, were seated and our order was taken within minutes and the food came faster than we anticipated which we appreciated. I had the Boeuf Bourguignon and it was hearty and melted in my mouth. The food is really well priced. One of the best food experiences on our trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAe79vM444a5pKdppqqqSEZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-9-27"},{"Name":"Taurai Kurebwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9ra_GXDuaH9nII-OZxrRX0Ewtc3ox9UjfVSkf0-7Ipnmskvwl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Magnifique! That‚Äôs the one word I would use to describe my experience at Les Baux de Paris. If you‚Äôre looking for a beautifully set small restaurant with charming staff, amazing chef and Parisian cuisine look no further. Loved the plat du jour and chefs recommandations. Must visit if you‚Äôre ever in Paris.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBeAu075aodVo0edEdZeT5F\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"vincent VirUx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDVOpoE6gJMfxhU1zny54bAQtg58iBauuzLgcOYWwWMJ50nuTu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Homely diner offeting French mains and greek sides. Lunch menu is very worth it. Service was very hospitable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQJ4sbQUBaw53e17ZzJX_r\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Carlos Romero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_ls51lWT7Z0Kan72J3xUXcjWthfBW4iUz6vQT9uLiTk5qTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service are absolutly amazing! We came to Paris for our 10 year wedding anniversary and we found this little gem by mistale. Felt welcomed the minute we stepped foot inside and have back again in a week, maybe another 2 more tikes before our trip is over!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7mHxcNU9FMLVxxSCJwYNn\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b056f83aebf2035"],"When":"2025-9-9"},{"Name":"Daniela Rocha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZVScqSwBVI2kW_qZFN_OdJWYBfjdT9ngDtbCg9hxDnrRAiE04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful food and wonderful service! user_reviews: [{"Name":"Barbara Kasasa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlT11MmIFwsSxyc84gvJT14fQTNFC6G62TPcVVpE_8ZWr8ca-YQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the middle of busy Paris we found this little gem, like a very local restaurant with true and true French flair and fare. Simple and tasty menu, exactly what we were looking for. The owner and the waiter we're very friendly and funny. Better to reserve, the restaurant was full. We just got lucky that a couple did not show up so we could get a table. Merci messieurs, on a pass√© un bon moment chez vous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCfTm59zQbgfoi6ytQgL5AD\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"Stephane Carrou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSb0RARUKKy3ZcSyi5D3dp2A2Auzpi71AkC0R-YR1yDBnARLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food at reasonable price with great service. We had the saucisse d‚ÄôAuvergne with Aligot, a must try if you never had this plate before. As starter, we had the salad with hot goat cheese. it was delicious. Deserts were also top notch. It‚Äôs a small place that deserves to be known. Need to reserve as place is limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUo5oQCofPHeqeu5RijgeF\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Allan Minds Ladegaard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4Yz4ZtSMb5VxGYDcsoI6hzuVwrimklIjwIW-JDGXtvEf6IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice and cozy restaurant with friendly staff and good atmosphere. The food was very delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAECL3TLF4aWH2PlamlfmZy\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-11-23"},{"Name":"Lynda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVNAnMUIgOn2Aqu5azaP4toQUy7XImMsxOptO7XFVYcpZQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A quaint restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating but the best is downstairs in the cellar. Super wine recommendations and Noelle has a friendly and helpful disposition. Escargots and saucisse aligot was fantastic . Highly recommend the food and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDZZ2_AiErmMHNsYEFubz9_\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-6-29"},{"Name":"Tatiana Mendes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdUAaK4rwIrUbglfEbIEtwPNmxV0m91cDryh-xL_8yuce88KEO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good French food. Gregory was amazing! Great recommendations and very good vibes. It was our first meal in France and it did not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELDHpt20gcTaTQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-5-29"},{"Name":"Pamela Hanson Carbone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIepqtkHL_2-3gmuDSxAU18cjjmggvrc1RecBg_AezGzLuVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic!  The beef bourguignon was the best we've had in Paris.  The warm goat salad is simple and honestly we considered getting it again instead of dessert.  We loved every bite of our dinner here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Macy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWapWHqS6rWNCPxe58pXk02Ccf9escmw04jEKic05K1hUIngDs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible local spot with lots of charm and amazing food!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-qOjP8qbq6zFaKF_8csdv\u0026fid=0x0:0x56e67fd92d9bafe6"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"Marc Goldfried","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKORnO0ut9sA_QYoLCVDQjiwVod86VLIt5lt2NO1XwYTkuvCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent meal highlighted by Aligot (potato pur√©e with La Tome fraiche de l‚ÄôAubrac cheese). user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aaron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk4_NAhMyDInLJvg_LeUNb_Z8Pm8XFykLxvkLVvDr6FVnneDM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I discovered LouLou on the final day of my trip to Paris, and I wish I had discovered it sooner! Pretty much the entire menu can be made gluten-free, and I was spoilt for choice; if I had stayed longer, I would have liked to return to try many dishes. In the end, I went for the fish and chips.  The location is a short walk away from Notre Dame and Pantheon with Metro access nearby, but it is worth making a special trip to visit, especially if you are gluten-free.

The food was really good, it was super tasty and fresh, the batter was crispy, and the fish was of very good quality. The salad was good, especially with the dressing, and I also liked the pureed peas too which elevated the dish. Portion size was slightly small, especially for the price, but I did enjoy my food. I did find this place to be a little pricey, with my food coming to ‚Ç¨30, there was also a small fee for paying via the QR code, so I opted to pay with a waitress instead.

For my drink, I went for the orange iced tea. I wasn‚Äôt a huge fan of this as it was slightly bitter, but again, it was fresh, and garnished with a generous chunk of lemon.

The staff were friendly, although I would have liked them to repeat gluten-free back to me so I felt more confident and relaxed eating here. The overall ambience was pretty comfortable and relaxed; it felt like a casual vibe yet with high-quality food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBYV0SxezryIYC-N6qUOwbY&fid=0x0:0x31d8bafe75893cec"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Anannya Roy Sen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQuVRi7RX2u7c3bRE6vviTh0Z1pJaP9Oyw9WiUziiWE34IP3gKCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We showed up at Loulou without a reservation on a cold, rainy Sunday morning. As tourists, we were hoping to avoid the usual touristy spots and enjoy a more local brunch experience, and this place delivered.

We only waited about 10 minutes for a table, and the service was excellent throughout. The staff was happy to customize my order, adding two poached eggs to my Bali Bowl, which I really appreciated.

We left feeling very happy and satisfied. It was the perfect start to a long day of exploring the city!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCA5Nw1v8xLKKrWJbZFpTwW&fid=0x0:0x31d8bafe75893cec"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"Faith Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7ClZpcbSPHD1VIIBHtjKbUHv3BeKwZIB9mMX_hyrkHZ42RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was pretty good, I ordered the Benedict and added avocado. The bacon was either too crunchy on one end and then not crunch and slightly cooked on the other end. Hollandaise sauce was really good! So was the recover pressed juice! Our server didn‚Äôt come besides taking our order but one girl helped us out more and was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA0l7BnoCtw4SSpF60Sl6Z8&fid=0x0:0x31d8bafe75893cec"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Skylar Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSvbcSlKHxivznI-MEF_FuQX0vnoBQvYPJQ7BBBgE_u3Iuv8769g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome meal. Who would've thought we'd stumble upon an Australian place in Paris. My wife has Celiac and this place has a menu that is almost entirely gluten free and you'd never know (I'm a gluten connoisseur haha). Awesome awesome place and super nice service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDRTiFuTzQjSmZoD9k6Po4e&fid=0x0:0x31d8bafe75893cec"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Zachary Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPBaDYnxqNMhped53Qq2SXbTIKyxEby8igmP5D76d8CgwNSzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best French toast of my life. The apple French toast had such a fluffy yet custard texture, and also the apples were cooked like a tarte tatin. The side of bacon was cooked really well, and the flat white with oat milk was well made.
